24 ngut ki thei bhabriew ki ban ia aireng ha katei ka lympung.Kum ban shu pyntip sha ki paitbah kiba don jingmut ban wan peitkai ha katei ka Fruit wine festival, kin don ruh bun jait ki jingpynbyrngia kiba kynthup naduh ki jingrwai, ki jingshad bad kiwei kiwei, namar ka jingrit jong ka jaka, ka society kaba pyniaid ia katei ka prokram ka pyntip paitbah ba kin thied noh kham kloi iaki ticket namar ioh ba kim ioh ban rung sha katei ka jaka kaba pynlong ia katei ka jingiakop Miss Nongstoin.
title: MISS NONGSTOIN: Haduh 24 ngut ki thei bhabriew yn iashim bynta

content: Jowai,3 Nohprah:Ka Rymbai Elaka Tourism bad Environment Society (RETES) East Jaintia Hills District ha ryngkat ka jingiatrei jong ka District Administration East Jaintia Hills, ki la pynlong ia ka tamasa kaba la tip kum ka Latuthiñ Festival 2017″ ha kane ka sngi thohdieng ba ladep ka 01 nohprah ha kshaid Lamu ha ka shnong Iapmala, kaba jngai kumba 15km na ka shnong Rymbai, East Jaintia Hills District kaba don ha ka lynti ban leit sha Leshka.Kane ka tamasa ka la long kaba iphuh iphieng bad shongshit bha, ha kaba ki shnong bapher bapher jong ka Elaka Rymbai ki la wan ban iashim bynta shitrhem haki jingshad tynrai bad haki jingrwai tynrai. Ha kane ka tamasa la wan ban pynshongshit ruh da u kaitor ba pawnam ka Ri lum Khasi u samla Banker Kharkongor bad ruh ki kynhun tem kiba kynthup iaka Green Leaves na Nagaland, Twilight na Jowai, Menders na Jowai, Emperical Tribe na Shillong, The Lynox Band na Shillong, bad ki Lynx na Jowai. Katno ka long kaba sngewtynnad ia ki nongwan sa kane ka tamasa ka long ba ki ioh ruh ban peitkai, ia ka jing itynnad jong kane ka kshaid Lamu kaba noh rymphum ha jan ka jaka ba long tamasa.Latuthiñ u dei u syntiew khlaw u ba phuh itynnad ha ki sharing lum ha pdeng ki jingitynnad ka mariang bad u long u syntiew uba kham ñiar ban shem ia u tang ba u long uba phuh itynnad. Ia kane ka tamasa, la ai kyrteng Latuthiñ, namar ki pynwan dur iaka baka long kaba itynnad hapdeng ki jingjyrngam jong ka mariang.Kane ka long ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ba la pynlong ia kum kane ka tamasa ha kane ka jaka; ka jingthmu kaba kongsan eh jong ki nong pyniaid jong kane ka tamasa ka long ban pynithuh sha ka pyrthei ia kane ka jaka kaba ba don ka kshaid Lamu bad sa ar tylli ki kshaid kiba don mar jan bad ka ba ki nong jngoh kai pyrthei kin tip ba ha East Jaintia ki dang don shibun ki jaka jongoh kai kiba itynnad.Ha kane ka sngi u bah Kennedy C. Khyriem Parliamentary Secretary Tourism u la long kum u kongsan ha ka jing iadon lang u ma Vincent H Pala MP, u ma Justin Dkhar MLA ka thain, u ma J.R. Pyrtuh MDC, kong V.Lyngdoh MDC, ma Elios Swer Daloi ka Elaka Rymbai, u ma M.S.Lhuid u DC EJH, bad kiwei de ki riew khmat.
title: Ka tamasa Latuthin  hajan ka Shnong Iapmala

content: Shillong, 3 Nohprah:Kumba 350 ngut ki riew ngeit Muslim ki la iaid proseshon ha ka sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ka 2 tarik u nohprah ha nongbah Shillong. Katei ka dei ka proseshon jingsuk jong ki riew ngeit Muslim kaba ki khot ka Eid Milad Un Nabi kaba ki kynmaw ia ka lyngkhuh sngi kha jong u Prophet Hazrat Mohamed.Katei ka jingiaid paidbah jong ki ka la sdang na Mawbah-Jhalupara bad ki la iaid ter ter ka surok bah lyngba ka Rhino Point, ka Barik, St.Edmund’s haduh ban da poi ha Masjid jong ki kaba don ha Fire Brigade Laitumkhrah, la ialam ia katei ka jingiaid paidbah da u President jong ka Eid Milad UnNabi Celebration Committee u Janab Mustafa Shabong.Ha katei ka jingiaid paidbah ki la rah la ki pla kad kiba don ki jingthoh bapher bapher bad ka la don ruh ka jingiapyrta jingsuk ha ka ktien niam jong ki. Haba la poi ha katei ka jaka mane blei jong ki-ki la pynlong ka jinglehniam leh rukom bad nangtei ki sa ia pra noh la ka jong ka lynti.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba kane ka dei ka jingiaid proseshon paidbah kaba-ar kaba ki riew ngeit Muslim ki la iaid ha nongbah Shillong, kaba nyngkong ka dei ba ki sngewlem ia ki Rohingya Muslim bad ha katei ka jingiaid kaba nyngkong ki la don kumba 700 ngut eiei. Hynrei ha kane ka jingiaid kaba-ar pat ka dei da kawei pat ka kynhun bad katei ka kynhun kaba nyngkong kaba 700 ngut eiei kam shym la ia shim bynta satia naba ki ong ba kam dei ka jong ki, ki dei da kiwei pat ki kynhun.
title: “U Muslim, um dei u Muslim,  lada um ngeit ia U Jisu”

content: Jowai, 3 Nohprah:Ka JHADC kam shym la khot satia ia ka dorbar tlang haduh mynta bad bun ki MDC ki la pynpaw ia ka jingdiaw mynsiem halor kane ka jingbym shym la khot u Chairman ka JHADC ia ka dorbar tlang.Katkum ki kyndon, ka JHADC ka dei ban don ia ka Dorbar Tlang ha u bnai Nailur, Naiwieng, hynrei ym lah ban tip ia ka daw ba u Chairman ym pat shym la khot ia ka dorbar wat haduh une u bnai.Ka JHADC ka la ioh tang ar tylli ki dorbar ha kane ka pali, katta ka dorbar Mang Tyngka bad ka Dorbar Lyiur katba ia ka dorbar tlang pat haduh mynta ym pat shym la khot ia ka dorbar tlang.Haba pyrshang ban iakren lyngba ka phone bad u Chairman ka JHADC halor kane, ka ym shym la ioh satia.
title: Khlem khot dorbar ka JHADC

content: Shillong,3 Nohprah:U President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee u bah D.D Lapang u la leit ia kynduh ia ka President rangbah jong ka seng Congress ka Sonia Gandhi ha Delhi ban iathuh ha ka ba un ym ia khun shuh ha kane ka elekshon ka ban wan namar ka jingbym shait ka met. Ka Sonia ka la pdiang ia katei ka rai jong u bad ka la kitbok kitrwiang ba un shait un khlain noh bad ka la kyntu ruh ba un bteng ban ai ka jingshakri ia ka seng Congress bad ban long kum nongaibuit jong katei ka seng. U bah Lapang u la ia kynduh ruh ia u C.P Joshi uba dei peit ia ka Congress ha kane ka jylla ia katei ka jingbym lah shuh jong u ban ia leh elekshon.U bah Lapang bad u Dr.Mukul Sangma kin don ha Delhi lashai ka 4 tarik bad la 5 tarik ruh ban ia shim bynta ha ka jingjied President thymmai jong ka seng Congress (AICC).
title: Iathuh u bah Lapang sha ka  Sonia, bym ia leh elekshon shuh

content: Shillong, 3 Nohprah:Ka ophis u myntri rangbah bad kumjuh ka ophis jong U Chief Secretery, ki lehrain ban ai jingtip, ia ka jingwad jingtip jong U Ma Madal Sumer, ha kaba iadei bad ka jinglut jingsep, ba kynthup ia ka tulop bad kiwei de ki jingioh, kiba ki ju ai sha ki Parliamentary Secretery, wat la utei u rangbah, ula pan da ka ain jingwad jingtip paidbah na ka sorkar.U Ma Sumer, u iathuh, ba ula wad jingtip, ha ka 20tarik Nailur 2017 bad la iathuh na ka ophis U Chief Secretery, ba ia katei ka jingtip, kin hap wad na ki tnat bapher jong ka sorkar, kumba la wad da utei u nongpan jingtip.Ka jing ujor jong utei u rangbah, (kaba ka Meghalaya High Court ruh, ka la khein beain ia ki kam Parliamentary Secretery) ka long ba namar ba kitei ki kam, ki long beain, kumta kitei kiba bat ia kitei ki kam, ki dei ban pynphai noh ia baroh ka pisa, kaba ki la shim, namar ba ka riti synshar ruh, ka khang ia kaba kum katei ka jing pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa paidbah.U Ma Sumer, u dawa namarkata, ba kito kiba pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa paidbah, kim dei ban ioh ialeh elekshon satia bad u dawa ba ki MLA, ki dei ban pynphai noh ia ka pisa, kaba ki la pyndonkam bakla ha kine ki saw snem tam ba ladep.
title: PYNPHAI TULOP RIM: Ym lah jubab  ka ophis U MR & U CS ia U Madal

content: Shillong, 03 Nohphrah:U President ka Seng Khasi kmie u Bah O Pyngrope u la ong ba ka Seng Khasi kmie kam shym la treh ban ia leit iashim bynta ha ka tamasa jingsuk ba pynlong da ka KJP Synod ha Mawphlang ha kane ka 2 tarik hynrei kam khang pat ia ki tnad seng kiba kwah ban leit.“Ma ngi na ka Seng Khasi kmie ngim treh ban leit iashim bynta namar ba ka dei tang ka jingshad tamasa ban iapyni jingshad hynrei ngim khang ia kiwei ban ia leit namar ba ka shong ha ki”, la ong u Bah O Pyngrope.U la ong ba ka Seng Khasi Kmie kam sngew myntoi ban ia leit shad sha kane ka tamasa namar ba la khot ruh tang ban shu iashad khlem kano kano ka jingiakren iaphylliew jingmut.“Ngi sngew ba ka tamasa kam don jingmut ban shu ai jingshad jingrwai”, la ong u Bah O Pyngrope.Halor ka jingleit iashim bynta ka Seng Khihlang ha kaba u nongai jingmut u bah SK Sun u la leit ban ai jingkren ha katei ka tamasa u Bah O Pyngrope u la ong ba kata ka shong ha ka Seng Khihlang namar ba na ka liang ka Seng Khasi te kam shym la phah briew ban leit hynrei kiba leit dei kiba leit shimet hi.Ia shim bynta ki kynhun Niam bapher ha ka Tamasa JingsukKi kynhun niam bapher, ki la iashim bynta ha ka Tamasa jingsuk kaba la long ha ka sngi saitjain ha Mawphlang, kaba la pynlong da ka Social & Economic Life Development Department jong ka Khasi Jaintia Presbyterian Synod Sepngi.Ukongsan ha katei ka sngi u dei u Dr.Henry Lamin Pro-Vice Chancellor ka skulbah NEHU.Ki kynhun niam kiba la poi sha katei ka tamasa ki long u Dr. Fr. Festus Shadap, Prof of Theological Sacred Heard Mawlai uba dei ruh u Parish Priest ka Laitkor, u Bah Moses Lyngdoh Adviser ka Sein Raij Diengshynrung, u Bah SK Sun, Adviser ka Seng Khihlang, pastor na Balang u Blei ( Meghalaya & Assam) bad na ka balang Presbyterian pat ki long u Rev. SS Majaw uba dei u Moderator ka KJP Assembly, u Rev. WC Khongwir, Chairman ka SELDD bad kiwei pat ki pastor ki riew rangbah.U kongsan haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba ka jingpynlong ia katei ka tamasa jingsuk ka long ban ia phylliew jingmut ia ki riti ki dustur. U la ong ba ka jingwan ia shim bynta ki niam kiba pher ka pyni ba ka jaitbynriew ka ia tylli bad ka thong jong kate ka tamasa ruh ka dei ban pyntylli ia ka jaitbynriew.La pynphuh pynphieng ia katei ka tamasa da k jingrwai jingshad kiba bunjait kum ka Shad Suk Mynsiem na ka Seng Khasi Mawphlang, Shad pliang na ka Sein Raij Jowai, jingrwai tynrai na KJP Synod Ribhoi bad KJP Synod Mihngi, Shad Kiew ing na Seng Khasi Riwar Mihngi, Shad Thma Seng Khasi Laban, Shad Lahoo na Sein Kyntu 12 dolloi, jingpyni riam tynrai na Jingiaseng Kynthei KJP Synod Sepngi, Shad Wait Seng Khasi Darrang, Phawar Khasi na Seng Khasi Nongthymmai bad ha ka jingialang plie la ai jingrwai da ka KJP Synod Sepngi bad BSI Standing Choir.
title: Khlem khang ban ia leit Tamasa Jingsuk  ka KJP, ong u President Seng Khasi

content: Shillong,3 Nohprah:U Waheh Chnong ka Ummulong uba la shah sloit bor ha ka JHADC u la ong ba un ym hiar shuki hi tdot bad un dang iai bteng kum u Waheh Chnong jong katei ka shnong. Ha ka kyrwoh khubor u la ong ba ka jingshah sloit bor jong u kam dei satia ka mon jong uba bun balang hynrei ka dei kaba la shu leh sop sop tang da u Daloi bad u AO ha ryngkat ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad ka EC jong u bah Andrew Shullai hynrei ki la don pat 2 ngut ki EM ki bym treh soi.U la kynnoh ba kate ka jingjia ka lah ban dei na ka kam politik jongno re jongno. U la byrngem ruh ban iaid shakhmat lada jia ba hap ban iaid sha ki bor jong ka ain.
title: “Ngan ym hiar shuki Waheh Chnong”

content: Shillong, 03 Nohprah:U MLA ka Sohiong uba dei ruh myntri sorkar jylla, u Bah Horju Donkupar Roy Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka elekshon 2018 kan long kaba thymmai ban jied biang ia ki nongmihkhmat sha ka iing dorbar bad ma u, kum u MLA un long kum ka um ba thymmai ban shah jied biang.Haba kren ha ka jingialang ha shnong Nongpathaw ha kane ka sngi Saitjain, u Bah HDR u la ong, “Nga uba la shah jied 25 snem, mynta ha kane ka jingjied ne elekshon kaban wan, ngan long kum ka um ba thymmai ha u bilor rim, ym kum ka kyiad rim ha u bilor thymmai”.Ha kajuh ka por, u la pynsngew ba ka pali ka kam myntri rangbah ne ka symbud myntri rangbah kan dei ia u lada un ioh biang ban jop na ka Congress namar ba baroh ki MLA ba kham rangbah kynthup u Bah DD Lapang, u Dr RC Laloo ki la rai ban shong thait noh na ka sain pyrthei.“Lada nga long symbud myntri rangbah ngan kham lah shuh shuh ban wanrah ia ka roi ka par jong phi sha ka konstitwensi”,la ong u Bah HDR.Ha kane ka sngi, la pynkup burom ruh ia u Bah HDR namar ka jingtrei borbah jongu ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi sha ka shnong Nongpthaw bad ka thain.U la ong ba mynshwa haba u jop na ka HSPDP, u la leit iakren bad kyrpad ia u Bah Hoping Stone Lyngdoh (bam kwai ha duwar u Blei), ba un phet noh sha ka Congress namar ba um lah ban iai neh ha kane ka party namar ba um sngew lah ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi.“Shwa ban phet na ka HSPDP nga iakren bad u bah Hoping markhmat bad u bah Hoping ula bat ia ka kti jong nga ban duwai hadien ba u la shoh mynsiem ia ka jingkren jong nga ba nga kyrpad ia u ba ngan rung noh sha ka Congress ba ngan kham lah ban rah ia ki kam pynroi”, la ong u Bah HDR.U la ong ba u khlem phet jyndat na ka HSPDP bad dei na kata ka daw ba u ioh ia ka jingkyrkhu na u bah Hoping. U Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la jop MLA naduh 1988.Ha kajuh ka por, u la thalain ia u kyrtong ka HSPDP u Bah Samlin Malngiang uba la pyrshang ban kynnoh da ki ktien kiba khlem nongrim tang ban pynjah burom ia u bad ka longiing jongu.“U kyrtong HSPDP u long kum u nongialeh eksamin ba leit ialeh eksamin khlem khreh kot ban shu peit tuh bad namar ba um don daw da kumwei pat, u la shu pynsaphriang pyrshah ia nga da ki khubor lamler”, la ong u Bah HDR.U Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong, “ha kawei ka jingialang, u kyrtong HSPDP u kynnoh ba haba nga lap lap ia u ha kawei ka jaka, nga la kyiuh bad nga la ong ia ki nongbud jong nga sei sei kumba phah sei pistol hynrei haa, nga la sei pynban da u bilor bad nga dih krak krak hana”,.“Kum kine ki jingkynnoh ba khlem nongrim ka dei bym don nia. Balei ngan tieng ngan kyiuh. Haba kwah iakhun, sei da ki nia rangbah ba shongnia ym ban kynnoh khlem nongrim”,la ong u bah HDR.U la ong ruh ba don kiba kynnoh ba ka rot (thei awria) na Mawiong ka la ar met na u khun jong u bad tang namar bym treh kam khun u khun jong nga, hana nga phah da ki kunda (Gang) jong nga ban leit shoh leit dat.U la ong ym tang katta ki la kynnoh ruh ia u ba u dei u nongkhaii kynthei nongshalan kynthei bad ki pynsaphriang ruh ia ka dur ka briew kaba dei na Aaudi Arabia kaba trei missionary.“Ngam ju pynsngap haba ki kynnoh hynrei namar ba ka jingkynnoh ka la ktah ia ka burom jong nga, ngam banse ban ujor sha ka ain”, la ong u Bah HDR.U la ther ruh da kaba ong, “Ka jingkren bein u kyrtong HSPDP ka long kumba haram ia u trai ba la lehbha ia u”.“Naduh ba nga aiti sha ka ain la thanda ban pynsaphriang khubor lamler ha whatapp ha facebook. Lada kum kine kin long MLA tip ka ri kan long kumno”, la ong u Bah HDR bad bynrap, “Ngam ju pynsngap lada ki kynnoh katno katno ruh tangba haba ka la palat nga aiti beit sha ka ain”.Ha kajuh ka por, u la ong ba kum u nongmihkhmat um ju pyrkhat shuh ialade hynrei u pynleit jingmut beit ia ki paidbah.“Nga long nongmihkhmat ngam ju pyrkhat shuh ialade. Kum u khun Khristan imat u Blei ula thoh ia nga ban ialam iaphi ki paidbah bad ba ngan aiti lut shaphi ki paidbah ki khun bynriew. “Kum u khun Khristan haba phi shakri ia ki paidbah shiteng ka jingshakri ka long kumba shakri ia u Blei”,u la ong.
title: SHUKI MR: Dei sa  ka pali U Bah HDR

content: Jowai, 4 Nohprah:U Dkhot ka National Commission for Safai Karmacharis lane u dkhot ka Commission kaba dei peit ia ka bha ka miat ki Kharmetor kane kito kiba trei na ka bynta ban pynkhuid ia ki jakhlia, ki jaboh jabain, U Jagadish Hiremeni u la wan hiar sha Jaintia Hills mynta ka sngi Nyngkong.Ha kane ka jingwan utei u dkhot ka National Commission for Karmacharis, u la pynlong ka jingialang bad ki heh District ha DC Office ha Khliehriat bad ha Jowai.U ma SC Laloo, uba dei u ADC bad ruh u CEO ka Jowai Municipal Board, u la iathuh ba ka jingthmu ba kongsan jong utei u dkhot ka Commission uba dei peit ia ka jylla Meghalaya ka long ban wad jingtip shaphang ka bha ka miat jong ki Karmacharis (Kharmetor) bad kiwei kiwei kiba trei ha ki kam pynkhuid ia ki jakhlia.Ha ka jingshisha la khot ia kito ki nongtrei jong ka Municipal Board, kiba trei ha ki tnad bapher bapher khamtam ha ki Hospital ba kin donlang ha katei ka jingialang hynrei bun ki bym shym la wan satia.Utei u dkhot ka Commission u la bthah ia ka bor District ban pynlong ia ka jingai sumar ei kaba shisien ha ka 3 bnai na ka bynta ban jurip ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki, ban pynioh insuran ha na ka skim Dr. Ambedkar Foundation bad ban iarap ban pynioh loan shna iing ia ki katkum ki kyndon jong ka ain Karmacharis.Na ka liang ka bor District ka la kular ha khmat utei u dkhot ka Commission ba kan iarap katei ka kynhun batrei ia kum kitei ki kam bad ha ka juh ka por u la iathuh ba la pynsngew ruh ha utei u dkhot ka Commission halor ka jingeh jong ki nongtrei ka Jowai Municipal Board.U ma Laloo u la iathuh ba ki don haduh 33 ngut ki nongtrei ban pynkhuid ia ki jakhlia hapoh ka Jowai Municipal Board bad 10 ngut na kitei kidei kiba shu trei bylla nongsngi ha ka jingsiew kaba 6000 tyngka shibnai.Ka bor District kan pynkhreh ruh ia ki list jong ki na ka bynta ban ioh phah sha ka Commission.
title: U dkhot ba peit  kharmetor sha Jowai

content: Shillong, 04 Nohprah:U president ka BJP Meghalaya u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jinghiar shuki noh u bah Comingone Ymbon ka la paw ba ka la don ka jinghuri hura kaba jur bha ha ka Congress kaban sa bthei shen.Haba twad jingmut mynta ka sngi, u Bah Shibun u la ong ba ka Congress ka la don hapdeng ka jingsyier bad ka jinghiar shuki u Bah Comingone ka la nang pynpaw pyrthei shuh hadien ba u president ka MPCC u Bah DD Lapang u la rai ban nym iakhun shuh; nangta u Dr RC Laloo ruh u la rai ban shong thait noh bad kumjuh ka myntri tnad ka koit ka khiah ka Kong Roshan Warjri ruh.“Ka jinghiar shuki u bah Comingone ka la paw ba ka huri hura hapoh ka Congress ka la jubor”, la ong u Bah Shibun.U la ong ba ki nongialam ba kham rangbah ka Congress ki la rai ban nym iakhun shuh ha kane ka elekshon namar ba ki la sngewthuh ba ka party kan nym poi shuh shano shano ruh.“Baroh ki ju iaknieh ia ka kam myntri sorkar hynrei ka jinghiar shuki u bah Comingone ka la paw ba kane ka party kam don jaka shuh ha kane ka jylla bad ka BJP kumba la kam u nongialam u Nalin Kohli kan sa thaw ia ka sorkar ha ka jylla hadien ka elekshon”, la ong u Bah Shibun bad bynrap”U Bah Comingone u long myntri tang khyndiat bnai ruh u la mad ia kane ka sorkar kaba ialam da u Dr Mukul Sangma”.Hynrei ha kawei ka liang u bah Shibun u la ong ba ka BJP kam pat kwah ban pynpaw ia ki MLA kiban iasoh namar ba ka ap haduh ban kut ka dorbar tlang kaban sdang shen mynta.“Ngi la don ka jingiakren bad ki MLA ban iasoh hynrei ngim pat kwah ban pynpaw namar ba kan ktah ia ki ba ki dang don ha ka jinglong MLA”,la ong u Bah Shibun bad bynrap, hadien ka dorbar yn sa paw pyrthei baroh.
title: Hiar shuki u Ma Comingone, ka Congress, ka la jan bthei, ong ka BJP

content: Shillong, 04 Nohprah:Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ka la pynbna ba kan pynlong ia ka jingiakhih pyrshah ia ka jingkuman kane ka sorkar ban dawa ban pynlong kam ia ki 14 tylli ki mat kynthup ka Inner Line Permit (ILP).Shi bynta ban pynjur ia ka jingdawa na ka sorkar, ka HYC ka la rai ban pynlong ia ka jingshah thngan kaba lai sngi kynthih naduh ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai haduh 9 tarik ha mot u Bah Bull N Lyngdoh uba dei u president barim ka KSU bam kwai ha duwar u Blei.U general secretary ka HYC u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin u la ong ba kane ka jingiakhih ka long shi bynta na ka ‘Save Hynniewtrep Mission’ kaba bteng biang na ki jingiakhih ba la leh naduh kham mynshwa.“Ngin sdang ia ka jingiakhih da kaba shah thngan naduh ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 10 baje mynstep na u mot sah kynmaw jong u nongialam barim ka KSU, u Bah Bull N Lyngdoh ba don ha Dhankheti bad yn pynlong ia ka jingshah thngan haduh lai sngi lynter naduh ka 7-9 tarik”, u la ong haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.U la ong ba lada ka sorkar kam wanrah ia ka jingiatai ha ka dorbar tlang ia ki mat jingdawa ka seng khamtam kiba iadei bad ka jingioh rung ki bar jylla na ka liang ka seng kan sa pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ba kham tyngeh ka ban sa pynbna hadien ka 9 tarik pyrshah ia ka sorkar bad ki MLA kiba don ha ka liang synshar.U la byrngem ruh ba lada ki seng sain pyrthei kim lah ban pynrung ia ki mat jingdawa jong ka seng ha ki mat elekshon ne manifesto jongki, ka seng kan ialap pyrshah ia ki ha ka elekshon.U nongialam ka HYC u la ong ba ka jingiakhih kan iaid ruh ha ki sngi ba long ka dorbar tlang.U la ong ba ka CEC ka la rai ban bteng ia ka jingiakhi pyrshah ia ka jingkuman jong ka Sorkar MUA-II ia ki mat dawa jong ka seng kaba la ai ruh ha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma naduh 23 Rymphang, hynrei ka Sorkar ka khlem leh eiei.Halor kane ka seng ka la khot ruh ban iakren bad ki myntri sorkar hynrei kim shym la poi satia, bad na ka liang ka seng ka la leit ban pynsngewthuh paidbah kylleng ka bri Hynniewtrep.U la iathuh ba ka seng ka la iakynduh ruh ia ki seng sain pyrthei kiba don ha ka liang pyrshah, kum ka UDP bad HSPDP, bad wat ki party ki bym don ia ki MLA ha ïing dorbar kata KHNAM bad PDF, ha kaba u la iathuh ba ka KHNAM ka la kular ban pynrung ia kine ki mat ha ka vision document jong ka, bad ka HSPDP ka la rah 5 tylli ki mat ban shimkhia, katab ka UDP wat ka la kular hynrei haduh mynta kam pat ong eiei.
title: KWAH ILP: Ha u Mot u Bah  Bull, yn shah thngan ka HYC

content: Jowai, 4 Nohprah:Ban pynshlur ha ki kam rep kam riang na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot ki paidbah ha ka thain khappud, Karbi-Anglong bad West Jaintia Hills, ka Chankylliang Development Society (CKDS) ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ba la lah ka la thaw ia ka Club jong ki nongrep kaba la tip da ka kyrteng kum ka Psiar Farmers’ Club ka ban treikam na ka shnong Psiar, West Jaintia Hills.U Executive Director katei ka Club, u ma D Shadap u la iathuh ba ka jingthmu ba kongsan kane ka Society ka long ban iarap ia ki paidbah katei ka thain ha kaba iadei bad ki skim sorkar kiba ma ki kim ju bna satia baroh shi katta.Kane ka Farmers’ Club kan iarap ruh ia ki paidbah ha kaba iadei bad ka kam pyniaid iew ia ki mar rep jong ki khamtam eh ia u Sying, u Shynrai bad ia u Sansar.Ka Club kan pyntikna ba ki paidbah kiba shong bas ah ha ka thain khappud kim dei an don ka jingsnew ba ki la shah iehbein ha ka sorkar namar ka Block Officer bad ka bor District ka donlang ryngkat bad ki ban peit ia ki jingeh jong ki.Ka CKDS ka don ruh ka jingthmu ban plie ia ka ‘Miej Iarap’ (Help Desk) bad ruh ia ka Information Centre lane ka Meij ban ioh jingtip halor ki jingeh bad ki jingdonkam jong ki paidbah. Ia kane ka Help Desk bad Information Centre yn buh ha Jowai kaba dei ka nongbah ka WJH.
title: Ka Club jong ki nongrep, thaw  sha khappud Karbi Anglong

content: Shillong, 4 Nohprah:Ka samoi hikai Khasi kaba lai jong ka Skul Hikai Khasi jong ka SBUK, kan sdang naduh ka 17 tarik u Rymphang jong ka snem thymmai. ?a ki application forms dei ban pynpoi ha ne shuwa ka 20 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2018, bad kito kiba kwah ban nang ïa ka ktien Khasi ki dei ban long kiba la 18 (khatphra) snem shaneng ka rta. Na ka bynta ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka ktien bad ka thoh ka pule Khasi, bad ban pynsuk ruh ha ki jingïadei ba man ka sngi, ha ka imlang ka sahlang bad kiwei ki nongshong shnong ki bym dei ki Khasi, ka SBUK ka ai jinghikai halor ka ktien Khasi ïa kito ki nongshnong shnong ki bym dei ki Khasi, ha man la ka Sngi Saitjaiñ, ha Shillong Law College, naduh ka por 5 baje janmiet, bad ym donkam jingsiew eiei. Ka dei ka skul maphot! Na ka bynta ki jingtip kiba bniah, kylli na une No.9863023736, ne email: wankharkrang@gmail.com.Ka SBUK ka kyrpad ïa ki jingkyrshan lem jong ki para-ri. Khublei ShiSBUK!
title: Ka samoi hikai Khasi ka SBUK

content: Nongstoiñ, 04 Nohprah:Halor ka jingdawa pynkynriah kam ka HNYF ia u BDO ka Mawthad-raishan C&RD Block, na ka liang jong ka seng Khasi Student Union (KSU) Mawthadraishan Circle ka la ai ia ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ia ka seng HNYF bad ka sngewiahap ruh ia katei ka jingdawa ban pynkynriah kam noh ia u BDO u bah L. Diengdoh.U samla A. Hoojon Publicity Secretary ka KSU, ha ka kyrwoh khubor ba la phah, u la ong ba ka Mawthadraishan Block haduh mynta hi ka dang long kawei na ki Block kaba dang sahdien tam haba ia nujor bad ki wei pat ki Block ha ka West Khasi Hills District.“Ha kine ki snem ba don u tei u BDO u bah L. Diengdoh ka Block kam don satia kata ka jingkiew ha kano kano ka liang , kyrpang lei lei ia ka tei ka ophis kaba la long kum ka sem masi sem blang, kat ka jingshisha ka iing (building) jong katei ka ophis ka la biang palat hynrei namar ka jingbym shim khia da u tei u heh katei ka ophis, ka la long ka jingilehrain ia ki ba hap hapoh katei ka Block” ong u tei u samla ha ka kyrwoh.Wat la ki sengbhalang jong katei ka thain, ki la dawa ban pynkynriah kam noh ia u tei u BDO, hynrei na ka liang jong ka Synjuk ki Rangbah shnong Kynshi Area pat ki la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor katei ka jingdawa pynkynriah kam jong ka seng HNYF ia u tei u BDO jong ka Mawthadraishan .“Ka jingdawa pynkynriah kam, ka long tang namar ba u BDO u bun kam ha ka kam election ha ka jingshisha sha katkum ka jinglap jong ka synjuk u tei u BDO ba mynta u long shisha u briew u ba kit khia ia ka kam u bym ju pep ban wan ophis kumba la kam da katei ka seng” ong u bah Aiban Syiemlieh President ka Synjuk ha ka kyrwoh khubor.Shuh shuh ka kyrwoh na u tei u nongialam ka synjuk u la ong ruh ba u BDO u long ruh u briew u ba kloi ban iarap ia ki shnong ki thaw ban pynbeit wat ia ki jingduna kiba ki shnong ki ia kynduh ia ki jingeh naduh bala wanbah L. Diengdoh kum u BDO ki kam ki kam ki iaid beit iaid ryntih kam ju don ka kam kaba dkoh kumba la kam da katei ka seng.
title: WENG BDO: Kyrshan ka KSU,  pyrshah ki Rangbah Shnong

content: Nongpoh, 24 Naiwieng:Ka ju don ka jingong, nang lur u sniang, nang ioh burom u ksew bad halor kane ka phang ruh, la imat kumba ka thew shata bad U bah FD Ramsiej, ula ong, ba ula trei shitom, na bynta katei ka seng, hynrei ia katei la shu wan knieh, da uba dang shu rung thymmai ha ka seng.Katei ka dei hadien ba ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la pynbna ban ai ticket ia Bah Mangkara Pathaw na Umroi constituency bad U Bah Firstforce Deki Ramsiej, uwei na ki nongialam ba radbah ka Party bad uba dei ruh uba trei shitom met bad mynsiem ban pynkhlain ia ka Party ha katei ka Konstitwensi, ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki nongkyrshan ka Umroi Circle, ki Primary Unit kiba don haduh 72 tylli bad ki phew tylli ki Sub-Unit jong katei ka Konstitwensi, mynta ka sngi ki la pynlong ia ka jingialang kaba kyrkieh ha Bhoirymbong ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor katei ka jingshimrai kyrkieh da ki heh Nongialam ka UDP.U Bah Firstforce Deki Ramsiej, haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, u la ong ba kane ka jingpynduh Tiket ia u bad ka jingai tiket ia u Bah Mangkara Pathaw na katei ka Konstitwensi, ka dei ka kam kaba la leh da ki nongialam ka UDP hapoh ka jylla.Shuh shuh, u la iathuh ruh ba ha kine ki snem ba la leit, u la trei shitom na ka bynta ba pynkhlain ia ka seng, ha katei ka Konstitwensi, hynrei ynda la dei ka por ban ioh kheit ia u soh (Tiket), la shu wan knieh jyndat pat da kiwei pat bad kiba dei ruh kiba dang rung sha ka seng, dang tang ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba ladep.“Halor ka jingduh Tiket na katei ka Konstitwensi, u Bah Firstforce Deki Ramsiej, u la kynnoh ba kane baroh ka dei namar ka jingwan tuklar da u Bah Donkupar Sumer, namar u khein poh ianga da kaba niew ba ngam lah ban jop namar ba nga dei uba duk na Umroi Constituency” ong u Bah F.D Ramsiej.Haba ther pat halor ka jingai Tiket ka UDP ia u Bah Mangkara, u Bah F.D Ramsiej, u la ong ba u Bah Mangkara u dei uba dang pyniasoh thymmai sha ka UDP, ha kaba u dang wan pyniasoh ialade dang ha ka 14 tarik Naiwieng mynta u snem, namarkata kane ka jingai tiket syndet sha u Bah Mangkara ka lah ban nangpyntroin pynban ia ka Party ha kane ka Konstitwensi, bynrap u Bah F.D Ramsiej.
title: Ther U Bah F.D Ramsiej halor ka  jingioh tiket U Bah Mangkara na Umroi

content: Shillong, 24 Naiwieng:Ka jingjia ka dei kaba sngew lyngngoh bad kata ka long ba ki 27ngut ki nong shong shnong jong ka 9-Khahbada, kiba hap ha ka 21-Sohlab Polling Station jong ka 26- shella Constituency, kim don kyrteng thep vote shuh, wat la ki don ia ki dur vote jongki.U bah J Goren Swett, uwei na ki nongthep vote jong katei ka shnong kaba rit, kaba hap ha Shella, ula iathuh ha une u nongthoh, ba ka shnong 9-Khahbada, kam don shuh ha ka jaka thep vote ha Sohlab bad kumta kitei ki nongshong shnong, kin nym ioh shuh ban thep vote ha ka elekshon MLA 2018, wat la ki don ia ki dur EPIC, hynrei, kim lah ban pynshisha, namar ba ki kyrteng jongki, kim don shuh ha ki jaka thep vote. La iathuh da u bah Swett, ba katei ka jingtip jongu, ka dei hadien ba ki don ki samla kiba leit pynrung kyrteng thymmai, kiba na katei ka Shnong, hynrei, kim shym la ioh lad satia, namar ba katei ka shnong, ka la jah noh na ka thup jong ki nongthep vote.U Bah Swett, ula kren diaw mynsiem, da kaba ong “Yn leit ud iano” bad u khmih lynti ba U MLA jong katei ka thain, un shim khia ia katei ka kam, ba ki nong Khahbada, kin nym duh, ia la ka jong ka hok ban jied nongmihkhmat ha ka sien ka ban sa wan“U Bah J G Swett na Shella uba long ruh u founder state member ka Aam Aadmi Party Meghalaya u la iasoh noh bad ka party BJP. Ia kaba la pdiang burom daki heh ka BJP jong ka state Meghalaya ha Ichamati ha ryngkat ka jingdon lang jong u Bah Jrop Sing Nongkhlaw uba long ruh u kyrtong ka seng BJP naka 26 Shella Assembly Constituency. Ka jingleit pyniasoh bad kyrshan jong u Bah J G Swett ia ka seng BJP ka long ka jingkmen kaba khraw iaka seng BJP Shella Mandal naka bynta ka election MLA 2018”.
title: SNGEW LYNGNGOH: Jah kyrteng ka  shnong Khahbada & 27ngut ki nongthep vote

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:U Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar pdeng imat ka don ka jingmut sniew ban kput ia ki briew kiba seng kam seng jam ha ka kam jngohkai pyrthei namar ba ka buh da ka khajna (GST) kaba kyrpang ia ki nongseng hotel, restaurant.‘Ngan thoh sha ka sorkar pdeng ba ka dei ban pynsuk ia ka rukom lum khajna na ki kam ba iade bad ka kam jngohkai”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ka long kaba sngew sammut ba kumno ka sorkar pdeng ka la buh da ka dor khajna kaba khampher bad kham jwat ia kiba seng ha ka kam jngohkai bad kane kam long kaba sngew dei.“Ka sorkar pdeng imat ka kwah kput iano iano ban buh khajna kaba khamheh ia ki kam ba iadei bad ka kam jngohkai pyrthei. Dei ban don ka khajna kaba iahap sur ym ka khajna ban shu pynbor”, la ong u Dr Mukul.
title: Imat don jingmut sniew ban oh  khajna ia ka tnad jngohkai: Mukul

content: Nongpoh, 21 Naiwieng:Ka ju long hi ka rukom ba bunsien tang namar ka jingdon jong uwei bad arngut ki riew wad dong hapoh shnong, ka wanrah pat ia ka jingpynkulmar ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong hi baroh kawei bad kawei na ki nuksa halor kane ka dei ha kawei ka jingjia hapoh ka shnong Kynjoiumran, Ri Bhoi District, kaba la mih ki huri hura namar ka jingkynnoh da uwei u riew rangbah ba ki nongkitkam ka VEC ha katei ka shnong kim shem la pyntrei hok ia ka skim MGNERGS.Halor kitei ki kynrum kynram ha katei ka shnong, mynta ka sngi u BDO ka Umsning C&RD Block, u Bah PS Tynsong, ha ryngkat bad ki nongtrei jong katei ka Block, ki la hiar sha katei ka shnong ban wad ia ka jingshisha ban tohkit bniah na ki paidbah, la katei ka jingkynnoh u Bah Plielad Kshiar, uba la leit ban ujor sha u Bah John Mawphniang, General Secretary ka RBPM, na ka bynta ban wad jingtip, halor ki jingpyntrei ia ka skim MGNERGS ha katei ka shnong.Kumba la paw ha ka jing wad jingtip, ka jingkynnoh ba la kynnoh ba la pyndonkam bakla ha kaba pyntrei ia katei ka skhim MGNREGS ka dei ka jingpyntrei ia ka projek kaba ia dei bad ka Irrigation canal bad ka Land Development bad ka Compost pit ba la mang lyngba ka skhim MGNREGS.Hynrei ha kane ka Public Hearing, ka la kylla long pynban kaba ithamula, namar katei ka jingkynnoh pyndonkam bakla ia katei ka skhim ha katei ka shnong, ka dei kaba la shu kynnoh khlem nongrim bad la sakhi ruh da ki paidbah hi kiba la pynshisha ba kam don satia kano kano ka jingpyndonkam bakla.Ki nongbat Job Card ha katei ka shnong, ki la pynshisha hakhmat u BDO ba kam don kano kano ka jingpyndonkam bakla ia ka skhim bad kano kano ka kam ba la leh ha ka shnong na ka skhim MGNREGS ka dei kaba la shim rai hi da u paidbah bad kam don ruh kano kano ka jingbam sap ne ka jingpyndonkam bakla, hynrei la pyntreikam ia ka skhim katkum ki kyndon treikam jong katei ka skhim.Hadien ba la bishar bniah da u BDO bad pan ka jingpynshai na ki paidbah ba la lap ba kam don kano kano ka jingpyndonkam bakla ia ka skhim bad dei hadien ruh ba u paidbah u la pynshai sha u BDO katkum ka rai jong ka VEC ha kaba la pynkut noh ia katei ka jingialang, ha kaba wat u Nongujor ia ka RTI ruh u la hun hadien ba u la lap ba ki paidbah ki sakhi ba la pyntreikam hok ia ka skhim.
title: Tohkit u BDO, ba pyndonkam  bakla ia ka skim MGNERGS

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:Ka Tamasa Sniew surok kan sdang lashai ka sngi ka 22 tarik u naiwieng bad katei ka tamasa kan sdang da kaba leit shon dur kylleng kylleng ki surok ha ka jylla ryngkat ka pla kad bad ki jingthoh ia ka kyrteng ka surok la ka dei ka surok National highway ne ka surok shnong.Katei ka tamasa kan sdang ha kajuh ka por 11 baje mynstep ha kylleng ka kylla ha baroh ka ri Lum Khasi-Jaintia bad Garo. Ka kynhun kaba pyniaid ia kane ka tamasa ka la phiah ia ki kynhun jong ka ki ban peit ha nongkyndong, ha sor, bad la phiah kynhun ruh na bynta ki ban peit ha kylleng ka ri Lum Garo.Ia ka kynhun kaba dei ha sor Shillong yn ialam da u bah Danny Rynjah hynrei na katei ka kynhun jong u la phiah kynhun shuh shuh da ki phew ngut ki nongtrei mon sngewbha ban rung ha kylleng ka sor shillong. Ia ka kynhun kaba dei peit ha Mawkynrew C&RD Block yn ialam da ka kong Agnes Kharshiing ( CSWO) bad ki don la ki jong ki jong ki kynhun ha manla ki C&RD block ki ban leit kylleng ki shnong.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka ingsdang na Sor Shillong u bah Danny Rynjah u la ong ba kin sdang naduh 3 mer shuwa ter ter haduh ban da poi ha Mylliem bad yn shon dur ia ki surok National high way kiab don thliew, kiba sniew bad kumjuh ruh ia ki surok shnong. Nangta kan poi sha Mawkhar, Mawlai, sha NEIGRHIMS bad kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka sor Shillong kaba ki hap ban pyndep kumba 2 ne 3 sngi.Katei ka kynhun ka pynlong ia katei ka tamasa ban lum jingtip baroh ia ka jingsniew ki surok ha kylleng ki C&RD block bad kylleng ka sor Shillong bad hadien ba la lum jingtip baroh ryngkat ki dur ki dar yn ujor da ka PIL sha ka Meghalaya High Court. Hadien ka surok katei ka kynhun ka don jingthmu ruh ban pynlong tamasa sa ia ka umbam umdih, ka jingbym biang ki skul, ka jingbym biang ki jaka sumar bad kiwei pat ki jingduna ki paidbah.
title: Mynta yn sdang ka  Tamasa Sniew surok

content: Shillong, 20 Naiwieng:Ka KSU Pynursla ha ryngkat ka jingsynran lang ki nongialam ka KSU Sengkmie mynta ka sngi, ki la leit ia kynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills bad ki la buh ia ka jingujor hakhmat u DC namar ka jingwan tuh maw ki khar Bangladesh kaba manla ka sngi na Wah Khasmar kaba hap ha Nongsohphan-Raid Lyting bad ha Elaka Nongshken.Katkum ka jingiathuh u President jong ka KSU Pynursla u samla Ennocent Khongstia u la ong ba katei ka jingtuh maw ki khar Bangladesh ka dei kaba manla ka sngi bad ki ju wan da ki lieng ne da ki kali. U la iathuh ba ki khar Bangladesh, ki ju wan tuh maw na bri jong ki riew shimet bad ki tuh bad pynjulor ruh ia ki diengkwai bad kiwei pat ki jingthung jingtep.U samla Khongstia u la iathuh ba ki Khar Bangladesh ki la sdang ia katei ka jingwan tuh maw naduh u snem 2007 hynrei hadien katto katne por ba ka KSU ka la shim khia ia katei ka bynta ki la sangeh noh bad dei ha u snem 2015 haduh mynta ba katei ka jingtuh maw ka la sdang biang. U la ong ba la ujor nyngkong eh ha u snem 2007 ia katei ka jingwan tuh maw ki khar Bangla da ka kong Victoria Rymmai hynrei mynta ruh katei ka trai bri ka la wan ujor biang sha ka KSU bad u la ong ba don ruh kiwei pat ki trai bri kiba la sha ktah hynrei tang katei ka longkmie kaba la wan ujor.Katkum ka jingiathuh utei u nongialam KSU u la ong ba bun ki bynta kiba shah ktah eh ha katei ka jingwan tuh maw ki khar Bangla kiba ju wan ha ka por mynsngi ruh ka dei ka jaka kaba hap sha Nongsohphan bad katto katne ha ki bynta ba hap ha Nongshken ( ki jaka ba don mar shilliang bad katei ka wah Kashmar). Katei ka jaka ka don ruh ha syndah jong u Pillar 1263-9S. La kylli kumba katno trok ki khar Bangla ki ju kit maw na kitei ki jaka , utei u nongialam KSU u la ong ba kumba 20 trok ha ka shisngi. Utei u nongialam KSU u la ong ba hadien katei ka jingiakynduh u DC u la ong ia ki ba un sa khot jingialang ia ki shipai BSF bad ia u SP ka East Khasi Hills ban ia kren ia katei ka bynta bad hadien ka jingialang un sa pyntip sha ki nongialam jong katei ka seng.
title: 20 trok shisngi, wan khlong maw  ki khar Bangla na Wah Khasmar

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:Ka jingwan tuid ki bar jylla kiba ju wan manla ka sngi sha NEIGRHIMS da ki bos Night Super ka la pyn-kyndit bad pynlyngngoh ia ki paidbah bad kiba bun na kitei ki bar jylla la ong ba ki dei ki Muslim. Ha ka step 7 tarik mynta u bnai ka KHNAM ka la leit kyndit kyndit sha katei ka jaka sumar ban peit ia katei ka jingtuid ki bar jylla bad ka la lap haduh 6 Bos (Night Super) kiba la wan poi dang step phyrngap hakhmat khyrdop ka NEIGRHIMS bad na kitei ki 6 Bos ki la don ruh bun phew ngut ki bym don kot don sla bad ki bym tip tang ia ka EPIC ruh bad ia kitei ka KHNAM ka la aiti sha ki pulit.Hynrei ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ka jingwan tuid ki bar jylla sha katei ka jaka sumar kam shym la sangeh satia bad ka la nang iai bteng iai bteng kumta mynta ka step phyrngap ha ka por 3 baje ki nongialam ka KHNAM ki la leit biang sha katei ka jaka sumar bad ki la lap biang sa 3 bos (night Super) ki bar jylla hakhmat khyrdop ka NEIGRHIMS. Katkum ka jingiathuh u President ka KHNAM state Youth Wing u la ong ba ha ka shi bos ki don kumba 50 ngut tam bad 3 bos ki la don kumba 150 ngut tam bad khyllung khynnah bad rangbah bad kynthei.U President jong ka KHNAM State Youth Wing u bah Thomas Passah, u la iathuh ba u la ia kren bad ki briew kiba trei hapoh NEIGRHIMS bad ki la iathuh ba manla ka step ki ju poi kumtei da ki 3 ne 4 bos ki bar jylla. U la ong ba haba ki nongialam ka KHNAM ki kylli ia ka jaka shong jaka sah jong ki -baroh ki la iathuh ba dei na Silchar, “Ki wan bad khun bad lok ym ithuh ithaw shuh, haba peit na ki jaiñ ki nep ki song ba ki wanrah la i kum kiba mut ban wan sah shane” ong u bah Thomas.U la iathuh ba ha kane ka sien ba mynta ki la kham bun kiba don kot don sla bad khyndiat ngut ki bym don kot don sla, “Imat na Infiltration Check gate ruh ki la check, nga la kylli na kitei ki briew ki iathuh ba ki wan check” u la ong.“Nga la kylli ia ki, ki pang kumno don kiba ong pang snieh doh, pang kaei kaei ngam sngewthuh sngewthaw shuh, da nga peit ia ki briew bym i kob pang eiei, don kiba ong ba pang ka lok, ki wan ialam pat bad ki khun ki kti rynjaiñ, nga la ong ia ki balei ha Silchar ym don jaka sumar seh, ki ong pynban ba ka tad hangne, nga lyngngoh shisha kane te ka bym lah long shuh ban kham tad hangne ban ha Silchar, hangne tang ka bai kali ka bai bam jong ki ruh katno shuh, ha Silchar ruh ki Hospital sorkar kiba bun, ki Medical College ki don, nga suba ba kine ki briew ki wan da kawei pat ka jingmut” ong u bah Thomas Passah.Shuh shuh u bah Thomas u la ong ba ha NEIGRHIMS ka don ka L&T Company kaba trei ia ka projek kaba T.100 klur tyngka ban pynheh ia ka NEIGRHIMS bad ha ka por ba ka KHNAM ka leit khynra ha katei ka jingpyntrei ia katei ka kam, ka la lap ba ki nongtrei baroh ki dei na Silchar bad kiba bun dei ki Muslim bad haba kylli ia ka Labour License kim don jingtip eiei shaphang ka Labour License ne ka District Council. Utei u nongialam ka KHNAM u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia ba ka District Council ruh ka shong kli kti ha kaba ia dei bad katei ka kam.Utei u nongialam ka KHNAM u la iathuh ba manla ka step kitei ki bar jylla ki ju ap lypa hakhmat khyrdop ka NEIGRHIMS bad tang mar ia plie ka khyrdop ki la leit ieng laiñ ban shim slip dawai bad haduh ban da dei ka por plie ai dawai u laiñ u la jrong bha, “Kane kan pynduh nong ruh ia ki trai jylla kiba leit shim dawai na katei ka jaka sumar”.
title: Sa 3 Bos ki bar jylla ioh bat  ka KHNAM ha NEIGRHIMS

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:U Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills u bah P.S Dkhar u la buh por hapoh shibnai kaba sdang naduh mynta hi ka sngi ba baroh ki jala pule, ki jaka bam, ki ing basa ki riewshimet bad kumjuh ki ophis sorkar kiba don hapoh u pud u sam ka Sohra ki dei ban pyndam noh ia ka jingthoh Cherrapunjee bad ki dei ban buh da ka kyrteng Sohra. Ia kane la iathuh da u President ka KSU Sohra Circle u samla Shemphrang Synrem haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor hadien ba ka KSU ka la wan ia kynduh ia u DC.U samla Synrem u la ong ba kham mynshuwa ka ophis jong u SDO (Civil) Sohra, ka la pynmih hukum ba dei ban pyndam noh ia baroh ki jingthoh kiba thoh Cherrapunjee ha Sohra bad ia katei la ai por kumba hynriew bnai; hynrei wat hadien ba la kut katei ka por don ki ophis sorkar, ki jaka pule, ki jaka bam, ki ing basa ki bym bud ryntih bad hadien katei ka KSU ka la ai por biang ia ki haduh ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai hynrei kim shym la patiaw kumta ha ka sngi balang jong ka taiew ba la dep ki nongialam ka KSU ki la leit ban pyndam hi noh ia kitei ki jingthoh.Hynrei ha katei hi ka sngi 6 ngut ki nongialam ka KSU ki la shah kem namar ka jingujor FIR jong u Post Master ka Post Office Sohra bad kham hadien la bynrap sa ka FIR na u Secretary ka RamaKrishna Mission. Dei namar katei ka jingbym iaid beit iaid ryntih ka jingpyndam ia ka Cherrapunjee ka KSU ka la leit ban ia kynduh bad u DC mynta ka sngi. U samla Synrem u la ong ba hadien katei ka jingkular u DC na ka liang ka KSU ruh kan leit ban ia kynduh sa ia u SDO ( Civil) Sohra ban ia kren ba un pyniaid da ka jingthoh.Utei u nongialam KSU u la ong ba ki riew shim kabu ki la sdang ban pyntieng ia ki nongialam ka KSU da kaba ujor FIR bad pynkem ia ki hynrei u la ong ba katei ka seng kan ym shongthait satia bad kan iai trei na ka bynta ka burom jong ka thaiñ Sohra. U la ong ba ha Ramakrishna Mission ka long shisha kumto kumba u la kren ha u Rupang ba shi pick up ka rong ruh ym pat dap ban pyndam ia ka jingthoh Cherrapunjee. Ka KSU ka la dawa na ki bor ba halor ban pynshitom ia baroh kito ki jaka pule, ki ophis, ki jaka ki riew shimet kiba la leh bym salia bad kiba leh pyrshah ia katei ka kam.
title: Shibnai ai por u DC ban pyndam  noh ia ki jingthoh Cherrapunjee

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:Mynhynnin ka nohphai sngi ka 20 tarik u naiwieng ki pulit ki la kem ia 2 ngut ki briew bad la kynnoh ba ki dei kiba thmu ban leit ia kynduh ia ki nongialam ka HNLC sha Bangladesh. Kitei ki 2 ngut kiba la shah kem ki long u Khroo Lamsalanki Pariat, 39 snem karta uba na Iawmusiang, Jowai bad uwei pat u Samir jolly, 44 snem karta na Noida , UP. La kem ia kitei ki 2 ngut na Dawki katba ki dang thmu ban leit sha Sylhet, Bangladesh ban ia kynduh ia ki heh HNLC mynta ka sngi ka 21 tarik u naiwieng. Ka khubor na u SP ka West Jaintia Hills u bah Vivek Syiem ka la ong ba kitei 2 ngut nyngkong kim shym la kren shai hynrei hadien ba la tohkit ki la iathuh ba ki la ia kren bad ki nongialam ka HNLC lyngba u Publicity Secretary jong katei ka seng u bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw bad kiwei pat ki nongialam. Katei ka jingthmu leit ia kynduh jong ki ka long lyngba ka Art of Life hynrei u SP u la ong pat ba kim ioh bor eiei na ka sorkar ban leit ia kren katkum ka UAP Act bad katei ka jingleit jong ki ka dei kaba suba sniew. La rejistar kes ha Dawki PS Case No.15(11)2017 U/S 120B IPC R/w Section 10/13 UAP Act bad la leit rah ia ki sha Jowai District Court na ka bynta ban pan bor ban tohkit bniah.
title: Shah kem 2 ngut na Dawki, ba  thmu leit ia kynduh ia ki heh HNLC

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:Ka sorkar jylla kam hun ia ka rai ba la pynmih da ka Meghalaya High court kaba pyndam ia ka jyrsieh thungkam ha kaba iadei bad kam nonghikai ha ki skul sorkar ha ka jylla. Ka Meghalaya High Court ka la pynmih ia kane ka hukum ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai hadien ba ka la pynlong ia ka jingbishar bunsien ia kane kam.Mynta ka sngi, ka kynhun myntri ka la shim ia ka rai ban ujor sha ka Supreme Court hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingai jingmut na ka tnad ain bad na ka tnad pule puthi ka jylla.Haba pyntip ia kane, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong, “hadien ba ka sorkar ka la eksamin ia ka jingai jingmut na ka tnad kam ain bad kumjuh na ka tnad pule puthi ka jylla, ka la rai ban bthah ia ka tnad pule puthi ba kan ujor sha ka Supreme Court pyrshah ia ka rai jong ka High Court”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.U la ong ba ia kane ka kam yn sa aiti ha ka kynhun jong ki riew said ain bad kin sa pynkhreh ia ka dorkhas ban ujor sha ka Supreme Court ka ri. “Ka kam kan sdang naduh lashai ka sngi bad ka kynhun ki riew said ain kin sa pynkhreh ia ka dorkhas ban ujor sha ka Supreme Court”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ka sorkar hadien ba la bishar bniah ia ka jingktah ka rai jong ka High Court ia ki nonghikai skul ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher, ka la shim ia kane ka rai.Lah ban kdew ba ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai, ka Meghalaya High Court ka la pyndam ia ka jingthungkam ia baroh ki nonghikai skul LP ba la thung ha u snem 2009-10 da kaba khein beain hadien ba ka la lap ia ka jingleh tuh bad leh bym hok ha ka jingpyniaid ia ka katkum ka kaiphod ka CBI.Ka High Court ka la rai ban aiti ha ka CBI ban tohkit ia baroh ki jaka ialeh eksamin thungkam nonghikai LP ha ki skul sorkar kaba la dep leh ha u snem 2008. Napdeng ki 365 ngut ki nonghikai kiba la thung, ka CBI ha ka jingtohkit ba nyngkong jong ka, ka la lap ba 268 ngut kidei kiba la thung da ka lynti bym dei.Nalor ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, iba mynta I long ka tnad Labour, ka Ampareen Lyngdoh, ka CBI ka la lap ruh ia kiba bun ki Nongmihkhmat paidbah, kynthup ia kiba mynta bad kiba rim, kiba la phah ia ki kyrteng jong ki briew la jong ban pynrungkam ha kane ka kam nonghikai da ka lynti ka bym dei. Kine ki long u Deputy Chief inister ba mynta uba la ai kyrteng 37 ngut.U MLA ka Mawkynrew, u Bah Remington Pyngrope uba la phah bun eh 47 ngut, u MLA ka Nartiang Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar 37 ngut, u MLA ka Raksamkre, u Limison D. Sangma 34 ngut, u MLA Pynursla, Bah Prestone Tynsong 20, u Myntri ka tnad Urban bad MLa Mylliem, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh 15, u MLA Pynthorumkhrah Bah A.L. Hek 7, u MLA South Shillong Bah Sanbor Shullai 3, u MLA barim, ka War Jaintia, Bah R.L. Tariang 29, u MLA barim kaNongpung bad Vice President ka BJP mynta, u Bah J.A. Lyngdoh 6, u Speaker barim, Bah Charles Pyngrope 3, MLA barim ka Nongshken, Bah Donkupar Massar 2, u MDC ka JHADC, Bah Moonlight Pariat 11, u MLA barim ka Nongkrem, u Bah Lambor Malngiang 4, Bah F.War, adviser jong u Bah, D.D. Lapang 3 ngut.Ka High Court ka la ai por hynriew bnai ia ka CBI ban pyndep ka jingtohkit bad ban pynshitom ia kiba donkti.Kham mynshwa, u Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kyntait ban pynhiar shuki ia ka myntri ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba la shah kynnoh kum kawei na kiba donkti ha ka jyrsieh thungkam nonghikai.
title: Sha Supreme Court, yn ujor  pyrshah ia ka rai ka High Court

content: Shillong, 21 Naiwieng:Ka sorkar jylla ka la rai ban pynkhie im biang ia ka kam khalai nusip hadien shiphew snem eiei ba ka la shu sah kumto namar ka jingiakhun ha ka kashari bad ka kompeni MS Associate. Ka sorkar jylla ka la iasoi bad ka MS Associate ha u snem 2005 ban pyniaid ia ka khalai nusip hynrei ka la poi sha ka kynrum kynram haduh ban poi sha iing kashari kaba dang sah haduh mynta.Ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri mynta ka sngi ka la pdiang ia ka jingai jingmut na ka tnad Excise, Registration, Taxation and Stamp (ERTS) ba pyniaid biang ia ka khalai nusip shi bynta na ka bynta ban pynmih khajna ia ka jylla.“Ka kynhun myntri kala pdiang ia ka jingtywa ka ERTS ba kan iaid shakhmat ban pynlong biang ia ka khalai nusip”, la ong u myntri rangbah.U myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka jingpyniaid ia ka khalai nusip dei ban dro dur ha kata ka rukom ba ka mar ka dei ban iaid iew bha ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka ri namar ba la shem ba ka jingpyniaid mynshwa, kam long kaba biang ha kaba la shu leh tuh da u nongshim wai namar ka jingiasoi kaba bakla.Ka khalai nusip yn sa pynlong shisien shi taiew bad yn pyndonkam ruh da ka kot kaba kham lait na kano kano ka jingartatien. “Ka ERTS kan sa khot ia ka tender na ka bynta kane bad ka tender ka dei ban long ha ka national level”, u la ong.U la ong ba ka tnad kan pynkhreh ia ki jingdonkam baroh ban pynthikna ba ka jingleh buit tuh na ki nongshim wai kumba la jia ha ka por mynshwa kaba la wanrah ka jingduh nong pynban ia ka sorkar jylla.U Dr Mukul u la ong ba uno uno ne kano kano ka kompeni kaba la ioh ban pyniaid ha kawei ka jylla, ym dei shuh ban jied ban pyniaid ia ka khalai nusip namar ba kumba la jia mynshwa ka sorkar ka la aiti ban pyniaid da u briew ba la pyniaid ia kane ka juh ha kawei ka jylla bad u la pyntroin kylla da ki kam buit tuh.Lah ban kdew ba ka sorkar jylla Meghalaya ka la duh nong da ki phew klur da kaba hap siew sha ka MS Associate tang namar ba ka la iasoi ia ka soskular kaba lyngkrang haduh ba ka kompeni MS Associate ka la ioh lad ban dawa pisa na ka sorkar lyngba ka jingiakhun ha ka iing kashari.
title: Pynkhie im biang  ia ka khalai nusip

content: Shillong, 22 Naiwieng:Ka Sengsamla dong Pdengshnong Mawryng-kneng East Khasi Hills District, ha poh ka jing-ialam u President Samla Pynroi Mukhim Bad U Khrawkupar Lyngdoh General Secy bad la ia don ryngkat lang bad ki samla ka Dong bad da ka jingiarap lang jong ki bor jong ka Mawryngkneng Police Station,myn ha ka 19-20-21tarik Naiwieng 2017 ki la leit ban khynra bad ioh kem kyiad ha ka jaka ba suba die kyiad ha kiba bun ki bynta jong ka dong pdengshnong.U Rangbah Dong Pdengshnong Mawryng-kneng bah Robin Nong-rum. Na ka liang jong u, u la ai ka jingiaroh ia ki samla kiba la trei shitom na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ka dong bad ka shnong hi baroh kawei bad u la maham tyngeh, ba da lei lei ruh un ym ai lad ia ki kam sniew ba kin dang kha roi hapoh dong bad u la kyntu ruh ia ki nong shong shnong ba kin husiar bad lada don kano kano kaba i suba kin sngewbha ban ai jingtip mar mar.
title: Khynra dukan kyiad ha Mawryngkneng

content: Shillong, 22 Naiwieng:Ka seng treimon sngewbha ka round table Shillong ka la jied ia ka skul Mohan Massar ha Mawprem na ka bynta ban shna ia ka iing skul, bad kiwei ki jingdonkam jong ka skul. Ka jinglut ban shna ia kane ka iing skul kan long T. 2 klur ban pyndep hapoh lai snem.U Arnav Chachan, u chairman haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor u la ong ba ka seng ka la dep leh teng ia ka skul Balika Vidhalaya School, Keating Road, Shillong ha kaba ka la shna ia ka painkhana, bad moramot ia ka iing kaba la pei la jot jong kane ka skul.Ban pynmih pisa ia kane ka kam, u la ong ba ka seng kan sa pynlong ia ka Brain Humour ban wan pyni da u nongleh danda ba pawnam u Zakir Khan ha ka 25 tarik Naiwieng ha u Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong.U la ong ba ia ka jingjied ia ki skul la leh hadien ba la bishar bniah ia ka jinglong jingman jongki, khamtam kito kiba la shah ieh khunswet.
title: 2 klur yn shna iing skul ka Round Table

content: Nongstoiñ, 22 Naiwieng:Hadien ba ka iing bishar ba ha khlieh duh jong ka Ri, ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ban shah biang sa saw bnai, na ka bynta ban shalan ia u dewiong; ki paidbah ka thain Nongstoiñ, kiba kynthup lang naduh ki malik dewiong, ki trai par dewiong, ki nongbylla bad ki paidbah, ki la sdang ban ia phuh mut phuh mat.Katkum ka kyrwoh khubor ba la wan lyngba ki katto katne ki nongbylla dewiong jong ka thain Nongstoin, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen kaba khraw tang hadien ba kila ioh ban pule lyngba ia ki kot khubor shaphang ka jingpyllait ia u dewiong watla ka long tang saw bnai.“Kat kum ka khubor ba la mih hynne ka sngi ka long kaei kaei kaba sngew tynnad bad ba kmen na ka bynta ki nong bylla dewiong namar ka jinglah jong katei ka SCCCMD ban trei shitom naka bynta ban ia leh ban pyllait noh ia u dewiong, bad ngi ai khublei ruh ia katei ka seng” ong u bah R. Nongsiej u wei na ki nong bylla dewiong.Hyrei kitei ki nong bylla dewiong, ki la pynpaw ruh da kaba ong “Ngi sngewsih ioh lehse don ki briew kiba kam ia lade ba dei ma ki, kiba pyllait ia u dewiong hynrei na ka liang jong ngi, ngi pynrem jur iakito ki briew ki ba kam ba dei ma ki hynrei ngi tharai naka liang jong ki paitbah ki la ioh i mano ba pyllait” ong u biang u tei u rangbah.
title: Sngewkmen ki nongbylla, ia ki  saw bnai ban pyllait dewiong

content: Shillong, 22 Naiwieng:Namar ka shuti ban kynmaw burom ia U Rev Thomas Jones, kumta ka Khasi Authors Society (KAS), ka ai khublei, ia u myntri rangbah ka Jylla.Ha ka kyrwoh mynta ka sngi, katei ka seng, ka pynsngew ba kam lah khlem da pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya hapoh ka jingïalam u Dr. Mukul Sangma, Myntri Rangbah kaba la sngewdei ban pynbna ïa ka 22 tarik Jylliew kum ka Sngi Shuti Sorkar ban burom ïa ka jingtrei kaba radbah jong u Rev.Thomas Jones uba la saiñdur bad pynlong ïa ki dak thoh ha ka ktien Khasi.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ka Khasi Authors’ Society ka la pynlong ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 175 snem ka thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi naduh ba u Rev.Thomas Jones u la saiñdur ïa ki dak thoh bad ka jingsdang jong u ïa ka thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi ha ka snem 1842. Ka jingrakhe ka la long shi snem kynthih. La plie ïa ka pyrda ka jingrakhe ha ka 10 tarik Nailur, 2016 bad pynhab ïa ka pyrda ha ka 16 Nailur, 2017. Hapdeng kane ka jingrakhe, ka Seng ka la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingïaid Pyneh Rngiew ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka 5 tarik Jymmang, 2017 ha Shillong. Ar bnai hadien ka jingpynhab pyrda ïa katei ka jingrakhe, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynbna ïa ka 22 tarik Jylliew kum ka Sngi Shuti Sorkar.Ka Seng ka ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka Sorkar Jylla kaba la pynpaw ka jingieit ïa ka thoh ka pule ha la ka jong ka ktien Nongmei Nongpa da kaba burom ïa u Nongseng bad U Kpa ki Dak Thoh Khasi, ki dak kiba im bad pyndonkam da ka jaitbynriew Khasi baïar haduh mynta mynne.Ka Seng ka ai khublei ia baroh ki bor Balang, ki Nongthoh bad ki Nonghikai kiba la ia shimkhia ban iai kyntu ia ka Sorkar ba kan pynbna ia ka 22 tarik Jylliew man la ka snem kum ka shuti sorkar.Ka Seng ka don ruh ka jingkyrmen kaba skhem ba kane ka Sorkar Jylla hapoh ka jingïalam u Dr.Mukul Sangma kan shim khia ban pynurlong noh shen ban pynïoh jaka ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.
title: Ai khublei ka KAS ia ka  Sorkar,  na ka shuti 22 Jylliew

content: Nongstoiñ, 22 Naiwieng:Ka tyllong khubor kaba la ioh lum dier por ka iathuh ba mynta ka janmiet kala don ka jingiashoh ia dat ha ka Shnong Langpih, haduh ba u wei u rangbah u la mynsaw jur.Katkum ka tyllong khubor bala ioh lum mynta ka miet da u nongthoh khubor la ong ba u tei u rangbah uba la mynsaw jur la tip kyrteng kum u Domenic Wahlang u ba dei ruh artad u sordar shnong u ba thymmai jong ka shnong Langpih kaba hap ruh ha ka jingpeit jong ka Hima Nongmynsaw Syiem Ship.Shuh shuh ka tyllong khubor ka iathuh ruh ba katei ka jingjia kala jia ha ka por ba dang pynlong ia ka Dorbar jong katei ka shnong bad ha katei kapor ki katto katne ki briew kiba na katei hi ka thain, ki la wan ban shoh ban dat ia u tei u Sordar.Wat la ym pat lah ban pyntikna na kaei ka daw kaba la pynlong haduh ba kan mih ka jingiashoh iadat hynrei kat kum ka khubor la suba ba katei kajingmih jong ka jingiashoh iadat kadei halor ki kam skul bad ki kam thung nonghikai .Hadien katei kajing shah shoh na ka liang jong kiba haiing ha sem jong u tei u sordar, ki la leit ban buh ruh ia ka jingujor sha ki pulit pyrshah ia ki katto katne ki briew kiba don kti ha katei ka kam shoh kam dat ia u tei u sordar haduh ba u la mynsaw jur.
title: Mynsaw jur u Sordar Langpih ba iashoh ha Dorbar

content: Shillong, 22 Naiwieng:Ka UDP ka la kam ba ka lyer ka la beh bha ba ki seng riewlum, kata ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kin sa jop bun tam ki MLA ha kane ka elekshon, hynrei kam kwah ban shu pyneh nia kumba la kam kiwei ki seng sain pyrthei.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor, hadien ba la wai ka jingialang ka Central Election Committee (CEC) mynta ka sngi, u General Secretary ka UDP u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la ong “Wat la ka lyer ka beh hir hir ba ki seng riewlum kin ialam ia ka sorkar hynrei ngim kwah ban shu pynheh nia kumba long kiwei ki party kiba kam ban jop katta katta ngut ki MLA”.“Ka sur jong u paidbah ka la paw ba ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kin jop bun tam ki MLA napdeng baroh ki party ban iakhun ha kane ka elekshon ban ialam ia ka sorkar hynrei ngim kwah ban shu kam ba ngin jop katta katta ngut kumba kam kiwei ki party”, la ong u Dr Jemino.U la ong ba ka UDP kam kwah ban shu pynheh nia hynrei ka kwah ba ka thong ka dei kaban larkam.“Na ki dak ki shin kiba paw, ka jingiateh lok ka UDP-HSPDP kiba dei ki seng riewlum kin ialam ia ka sorkar ha kane ka jylla hadien ka elekshon bad kane ka dei ka jingpynsngew bad ka jingangnud jong u paidbah ka jylla”, la ong u Dr Jemino.U la ong ba ia ka Common Mininum Programme hapdeng ka UDP bad ka HSPDP yn sa pynbna shen ha kaba ka UDP kan sa don shwa ka jingialang bah ne ka general council ha ka 15 tarik u Nohprah ban iakren ia ki mat ba kongsan.
title: Ka lyer ka beh sha ki seng  riewlum: Jemino

content: Shillong 22 Naiwieng:Ka UDP ka la pynbna sa lai ngut ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka elekshon MLA ban wan shen ha ka jylla. Haba kren hadien ba la wai ka Central Election Committee (CEC) mynta ka sngi, u General secretary ka UDP u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la ong ba hadien ba la iatai sani bha, ka jingialang ka la pynskhem ia u Bah Nehru Suting na Pynursla, u Bah Nujorki Sungoh na Mookaiaw bad u Bah Mangkara Pathaw na Umroi konstitwensi.“Ka party ka la pdiang bad pynskhem ia ka kyrteng u bah Nehru Suting na Pynursla, uba la don lang ha ka jingialang, bad ia ka kyrteng u Bah Nujorki Sungoh uba dei u khun u MLA barim u Bah Mihsalan Suchiang bad ia u bah Mangkara Pathaw”, la ong u Dr Jemino.Ha kajuh ka por, u Dr Jemino ula ong ba ka jingialang ka la iakren ruh ia ka Mawkynrew konstitwensi hadien ba ka la mih ka khubor ba u MLA u Bah Remington Pyngrope u la don jingthmu ban iakhun na kawei pat ka party bad hadien ba la iathir, la rai ban aiti sha ka Discliplinery Committee ba kan peit ia kane ka kam.“Kumba ka paw la iohi ba u Bah Remington u la ong ban nym ialeh shuh na ka party UDP hynrei haduh mynta ym pat tip namar ba la shu iohi ha ki lad pathai khubor bad halor kane, ka party ka la iakren bad la aiti ha ka Discliplinery Committee ba kan leh ia kaba donkam”, la ong u Dr Jemino.Katkum ka jingong u Dr Jemino, wat la ki dak ki shin ki la kdew ba da kumwei, hynrei na ka liang ka party kan shim ia kaei kaban mih ne ka jingpynshai na ka liang jong u Bah Reminton hi namar ba kiba paw baroh ki long lyngba ki lad pathai khubor.“Ngim pat shim ba u Bah Remington un nym iakhun na ka UDP bad ngin hap ban ioh ia ka jingpynshai na u namar ba ngi la shu iohi na ki lad pathai khubor bad ngi ieh ha ka jingstad jong ka Disclipinery Committee ban don u Bah Bindo M Lanong, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Kong Pretty Pyngrope bad kiwei”, u la ong.Ha kine ki sngi, la mih khubor ba u Bah Remington u lah ban nym iakhuh shuh na ka UDP watla ula pynbna da ka party bad u lah ban iakhun noh na NPP.Katba ia ka Sohiong, u Dr Jemino u la ong ba ka party ka dang iakren la ka party kan shu kyrshan ia u kyrtong HSPDP ne em. “Ngin iakren ia kane shen ban iapynbeit”, u la ong.
title: Pynursla, Mookaiaw & Umroi,  sei kyrtong 2018 ka UDP

content: Shillong, 22 Naiwieng:Ka Arts of Living, ka la pynmih kyrwoh mynta ka sngi, ha kaba ka la kam ba ki arngut ki dkhot jongka, U Samir Jolly bad U Khroo Lamsalanki Pariat, ki don ha mishon wad jingsuk ban iakren bad ki samla, ki ba la shah ialam bakla bad ban iakren ba kin wan phai noh sha ka lynti bah jong ka jingsuk.La iathuh shuh shuh, ba kitei ki don ha ka jingleit, katba kum ka jing angnud jong U Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, ha kaba u kwah ba kin wan phai noh sha la iing bad katei ka jingshim khia jong ka Art of Living, ka la pynlong ia 68ngut ki ehrang, ba kin wan phai iing ha Manipur.La ong shuh shuh ba ka Art of Living, ka la ai jinghikai bad ai jaka shong jaka sah ia ki spah ngut kiwei pat ki dkhot jong ka United Liberation Front of Assam (ULFA) bad ki seng lehnoh na Manipur, kiba la pyndem wait ialade.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ba ha ka 20 tarik u naiwieng; ki pulit ki la kem ia 2 ngut ki briew bad la kynnoh ba ki dei kiba thmu ban leit ia kynduh ia ki nongialam ka HNLC sha Bangladesh. Kitei ki 2 ngut kiba la shah kem ki long u Khroo Lamsalanki Pariat, 39 snem karta uba na Iawmusiang, Jowai bad uwei pat u Samir jolly, 44 snem karta na Noida , UP. La kem ia kitei ki 2 ngut na Dawki katba ki dang thmu ban leit sha Sylhet, Bangladesh ban ia kynduh ia ki heh HNLC mynta ka sngi ka 21 tarik u naiwieng.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, ka HNLC, ha ka jingpynmih khubor, kaba mynta ka sngi, ka kam ba ka jingkem ia arngut ki dkhot ka Art Of Living ka long kaba beain. “Kine kim dei ki briew ka HNLC hynrei ki dei ki briew ka sorkar kmie na Delhi kiba la iohbor ban wan iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka HNLC na bynta ban pyntyllun shakhmat iaka jingiakren iasuk”. Ka HNLC, ka ong shuh shuh, ba ka sorkar Congress na Meghalaya hapoh ka jingialam u Mukul Sangma ka la tyrwa bad kyntait hi pat hadien ban iakren bad ka Seng ha u snem 2014.Ka kyrwoh jong ka HNLC, ka ong shuh shuh “Lada ia ki dkhot ka Art of Living lah kem tang namar ba kim iohbor naka sorkar jylla ban iakynduh iaki Nongialam ka HNLC te balei baroh shi katta ki Pulit kim nud ban kem ia ka Kong Roshan Warjri kaba iakren phone bad u General Secretary ka Seng ha kato ka por khlem ka jingtip ka Sorkar Jylla, wat hadien ba ngi la dep thad madan iaki mobile numbers jong ka haki lad pathai khubor”.Ka HNLC, ka ong shuh shuh ba kaba sngewthamula ka long ba ka Sorkar MUA II, ka dang phah briew ha u bnai Jymmang ban pan jingiarap na ka HNLC na bynta ka Elekshon 2018 bad nangta ki weng ia ka Kong Roshan na ka shuki myntri kam poh iing, katba ia ka Ampareen,Deborah kiba lah don daksaw kam lah ban leheiei haduh mynta. Ka Seng ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh halor ka jingshimkhia ka Sorkar BJP khamtam eh ka ‘Art of Living’ na ka bynta ka jingkloi jong ki ban rah ia ka HNLC sha ka miej ka jingiakren, pynkut ka kyrwoh na U bah Sai?kupar Nongtraw, Publicity Secretary,HNLC.
title: “Ka kong Roshan, ka iakren phone  bad ka HNLC kam shah kem”

content: Shillong, 22 Naiwieng:Wat pynbor ia u aadhar, ioh kan ialam sha ka jing ia pyni bor, maham ki saw tylli ki sengbhalang na Garo Hills.Ki sengbhalang na Garo Hills, ba kynthup ia ka GSU, FKJGP, AYWO bad ka ADE, ki pynpaw ia ka jing pyrshah jur jongki, ha kaba pyntreikam ia u aadhar number, ha kaba ki shim, ba ka dei ka jingknieh noh ia ka hok shimet jong ki nongshong shnong, kaba la buh kyndon, ha ka riti synshar ri bad kitei ki seng, ki byrngem ruh ba kin ialeh pyrshah, da kaba mih paidbah, lada ka sorkar India, ka iai pynbor ia ka jingthmu jongka, ha kaba iadei bad u aadhar.Kitei ki sengbhalang, ki kren pyrshah jur, hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip, ba ka jingpynrung kyrteng aadhar, ka la iaid ia 15 percent ki nongshong shnong ha ka Jylla, ha kine ki sngi.Ki sengbhalang, ki kam ba ka UIDAI, kam sngew lehrain ban pyni paidbah, ia kiba don aadhar, ha ka Jylla, ha kaba kiba don ki long tang 15 percent lane 5,09,964ngut, na ka jingdon briew, kaba 32,30,132 ha ka Jylla baroh kawei. Ki sengbhalang, ki ong ruh ba ka jingbishar khadduh, na ka bynta ka sobjek aadhar, kan dang wan ha U Naiwieng 2017, ha Supreme Court bad ki ong ruh ba katei ka kam, namar ba ka dang don ha ka iing bishar, kumta ka kam, ka dang sahteng bad kam pat lah ban lushia ha kano kano ka dur. Kitei ki sengbhalang, ki kren shai, ba lada ka don ka jingpynbor ban shondur aadhar, kumta ma ki ruh, kim banse ban iaid da ka bor ban khanglad ia kaba kum katei ka jingthmu.
title: Wat pynbor ia u aadhar, ioh  poi sha ka jingialeh pyrshah

content: Shillong, 23 Naiwieng:Ka ain wad jingtip paidbah, ka dei tang ka ain ban ioh jingtip, hynrei kam lah ban pynshitom ia kiba donkti bamsap, hynrei ka Lokayukta kan long ki bniat ban ktha ia kiba leh tam.Halor kane, u nong-ialam ka Maitshaphrang Movement u Bah Michael N Syiem lem bad ka Kong Agnes Kharshiing na ka CSWO nalor kiwei ki kynhun, mynta ka sngi lyngba ka Campaign for Independent Lokayukta (CIL), ki la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynmih noh ia ka jingpynbna ba baroh ki nongtrei sorkar jylla ki dei ban pynbna lut ia ka jingkamai bad ka spah jongki man u snem kumba leh ki nongtrei ka sorkar pdeng.“Haba ka RTI ka la wan ha ka bor, kam don kano kano ka jingpynshi-tom ia kiba donkti ha ki kam bamsap. Ka RTI ka long tang ban ioh jingtip khlem kano kano ka jingpynshitom. Na kata ka daw, ngi la iakhun ban ioh ia ka Lokayukta kaba laitluid kumba la pdiang da ka Iing dorbar thawain naduh u snem 2012”, la ong u Bah Michael haba kren mynta ka sngi sha ki lad pathai khubor.U Bah Michael ula ong ba katkum ka kyndon ka Lokayukta kano kano ka jingtip lada don ka jingujor ka dei ban tohkit hapoh hynriew bnai bad ban pynshitom artad ia kiba donkti. “Ngi dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynmih noh ia ka jingpynbna ia ka Lokayukta khnang ba baroh ki nongtrei sorkar kin hap ban pynbna ia ki jingkamai bad ka spah jongki kumba leh ka sorkar pdeng da ka Lok Pal”, la ong u Bah Michael.U Bah Michael u la ong ba watla ka sorkar kam pat thung ia u chairperson bad ki dkhot kumba leh ka sorkar pdeng, hynrei ka dei ban shu pynmih shwa tang da ka jingpynbna khnang ba baroh ki nongtrei sorkar naduh u Myntri Rangbah haduh ki nongtrei barit eh, kin hap ban pynbna ia ka jingkamai bad ka jingdon spah jongki kynthup ki khun ki kti, ka lok ne u lok. Lada kim ai jingtip kaba bakla lane kim ai ia ka jingtip, kin sa shah kurup khait ia ka jingdon jongki bad kin sa shah pynshitom”, la ong u Bah Micheal.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, u Bah Michael N Syiem, ka Kong Agnes Kharshiing ki la ong ba watla ka sorkar jylla ka la mynjur ia ka ain Lokayukta hynrei kam pat thung satia ia u chairperson bad ki dkhot jongka kumba la long ka Lok Pal ka sorkar pdeng.U bah Michael u la ong ba namar ba ka sorkar kam pat thung ia u chairperson bad ki dkhot, ka la dei ban shu pynmih shwa ia ka jingpynbna ia ka Lokayukta ha kaba baroh ki nongtrei sorkar ki dei ban pynbna ia ka jingkamai bad ka spah jongki man u snem.U la ong ba ki nongtrei sorkar katkum ka Lokayukta ki dei ban pynbna ia ka jingioh kamai jongki man u snem bad ka spah jong ki khun, ka lok ruh kumjuh.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Michael ka Lokyukta lada lap ba ka spah jong u ne ka nongtrei sorkar kam iahap katkum ka jingkamai jongki, kin shah kurup bad shah kem noh bad kane kan pyntieng ia ki ban bamsap.U la ong ba ka jingtip ba la lap da ka RTI ia kano kano ka jingle bakla, yn sa pynshitom da ka Lokayukta.Kumjuh ka Kong Agnes ka la ong ba ka jingpynslem ia ka Lokayukta ka dei namar ba ki leh khlieh shrieh ki ophisar IAS, MCS namar ba ki pyrshang ban thaw lad ban lait na kane ka ain.Ha kajuh ka por, u bah Michael u la ong ba bun ki seng sain pyrthei kiba ju opyrta ba kwah ban wanrah ia ka synshar kaba khuid, ban ialeh pyrshah ia ka bamsap, bad kin sa peit la kin pyntreikam ne em ia ka Lokayukta.“Ngin peit ia ki seng sain pyrthei kiba ju pyrta pyrshah bamsap, ba ki kwah ban wanrah ia ka jingsynshar kaba khuid, la ki nud ne em ban pyntreikam ia ka Lokayukta”, u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por, u la kyntait ba ka RTI ka long tang ban tad madan ha ka por elekshon da kaba ong, ba bun kiba mih ha ka RTI ia ki jingpyndonkam bakla ia ki MLA skhim ki la wanrah soh ha kaba bun ki MLA ha ki elekshon ba la dep, ki shah rem.“Ka jingtip na ka RTI ka la seisoh bha bad bun ki MLA kiba la pyndonkam bakla ia ka MLA skhim ki la shah rem ha ka elekshon”, la ong u Bah Michaela.Katba ka Kong Agnes ka la ong ba ka jingslem ban pyntreikam ia ka Lokayukta ka dei namar ba ki heh sorkar kum ki IAS, MCS ki la leh khlieh shrieh ban buhrieh ia ka jingkamai bym hok jongki bad ka la dawa ba ka sorkar kam dei ban pynslem shuh ban thung noh ia ki chairperson bad ki dkhot jongka.
title: Ki nongtrei sorkar ki hap pynbna  ia ka kamai, ka spah ki khun, ki lok

content: Shillong, 23 Naiwieng:U General Secretary ka Seng Khasi Kmie u Bah Arwan S Tariang u la ai kaiphod ba ki don 200 ngut ki shijur kiba dei na ka niam tynrai kiba la shah kyntiew kurim mynta u snem. U Bah Arwan u la pynsngew ia kane ha ka lympung seng kut snem ba 118 kaba long mynta ka sngi ha madan Jaiaw Weiking.Nalor kine, 428 tylli la lah ban seng ia ki tnat seng Khasi ha kylleng ki jaka ha ka ri Khasi bad 16 ngut la tang jait thymmai.“Hapdeng ka jingtynjuh ba bun, ka Seng ka la lah ban iai tyllun haduh kine ki sngi ban pynneh pynsah ia ka jingngeit bad ka jinglong tynrai”, la ong u Bah Arwan.Ha kajuh ka por, u Bah Arwan u la ong ba ki Khasi ba dang bat ha ka jinglong tynrai, ki iakynduh shibun ki jingtynjuh na ki bor nabar kiba thmu ban pynjot bad ban thom da ka bor ia ka jinglong tynrai ka jaitbynriew.“Kala don ka jingtynjuh ia ka hok jong ngi ia ka kyrdan rit paid ne ka minority status”, u la ong.U la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ka Meghalaya High Court ka la dep pan jubab na ka sorkar, hynrei haduh mynta kam pat ai jubab satia.Kumjuh u la pynpaw ia ka jingshah thombor jong ki riew ngeit Khasi kumba la jia ha Mylliem Madan Ing syiem bad ka seng kam shym shongthait bad kane ka dang sahkut ha kashari High Court.“Ka la don ruh ka jingshah thombor kiba dei ki Seng Khasi ha Raid Mawpun bad ka dang sah ha Kti u Syiem”, la ong u bah Arwan.Ha kawei ka liang, haba iakren bad u Rangbah Synroplang Kharshiing, u la iathuh ba ka Seng Khasi hapdeng ka jingtynjuh kaba jur ha kine ki jingiaid lynti ba shi spah snem tam, ka la lah ban tyllun na ka por sha ka por. U la ong ba ka nongrim jong ka seng ka long ban ieid ia la kajong bad ban burom ia kiwei.U la ong ba ka saw ka sian ka la tur ban thombor ha ki synshar nongwei kaba la ktah ia ka synshar ka khaddar bad kumjuh ha ka jingngeit ruh kumjuh.U la ong ba ka jingmih ka Seng Khasi ka dei na ki 16 ngut ki rangbah kiba la iohi jngai ia ki jingma. U la ong ba kum ka jaitbynriew ka long ban pyni sha ka pyrthei ia ka jinglong kyrpang jong ka jaitbynriew.Mynta ka sngi ki paidbah Khasi bad Jaintia mynta ki la jingrakhe ia ka Seng Kut Snem kaba 118 ha ka nongbah da kaba pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah na Madan iewrynghep ha ka por mynstep shaduh madan shad Weiking, ha Jaiaw.Ia ka Seng Kut Snem la rakhe da ki paidbah ba dang bat dang ksoh ia ka niam tynrai u Khasi naduh ba la seng ha u snem 1899 da ki 16 ngut ki rangbah ka Seng.Kumba ju long, ha ka por mynstep la pynlong ia ka jingknia jingkhriam, bad kumjuh ha madan iewrynghep shwa ban ia iaid kjat paidbah shaduh Madan Weiking ha kaba ka la don ka jingkren na ki riew rangbah ka seng bad ka jingknia jingduwai pyneh rngew katkum ka niam ka rukom da u Rangbah Skor Jala.Ha madan Weiking, la ioh ia ka jingkren lyngkot na u Bah DS Lyngdoh u rangbah na ka Seng Khasi Lyngkyrdem bad ruh na u Rangbah SK Lato na ka Sein Raij kiba la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin pynneh bad pynskhem ia ka jinglong tynrai da kaba ieid ia la kajong bad burom ia kajong kiwei.Shwa ia kane, la ioh ruh ia ka kaiphod na u general secretary ka Seng Khasi Kmie u Rangbah Arwan S Tariang uba la iathuh ba katba nang tyllun ki sngi, ka Seng Khasi ka la nang lah ban sei lung da kaba ka thaw haduh haduh 428 tylli, kynthup 200 ka jingkyntiew kurim bad 16 ngut la tang jait thymmai.Ha kane ka sngi, la don ruh ka jingpyllait ia ka kot kaba kyrteng ka ‘Kait’ da u rangbah O Pyngrope u president ka Seng Khasi Kmie.La don ruh ka jingpyni ia ki riti dustur da ka shad ka rwai na ki tnat seng bapher bapher jong ka Seng Khasi.
title: Shah thombor ki riewngeit Khasi  ha Mylliem & ha Mawpun

content: Shillong, 23 Naiwieng:Ka HNYF Southern RiWar Circle ka la ai por shi taiew ia ka sorkar ba kan maramot noh ia ka surok Dawki-Wahkdait lym kumta katei ka seng ka la byrngem ba ka iaid da kiwei pat ki lynti. Ka kyrwoh na u President katei ka seng u bah Tarson Lymba ka la ong ba ka sorkar kam khaiñsnep satia ia ki paidbah ka thaiñ Ri-War Mihngi. U bah Lymba u la ong ba ka jinglehbeiñ ka sorkar ia katei ka surok ka long kumba kdiah ia u budlum ka thaiñ Ri-War Mihngi.Kiba bun ki jaka u la ong ba ki la thliew bad pungktieh la kum ka pung dohkha.Na Dawki sha Wahkdait u la ong ba ka shim por tang 15 minit ban iaid lynti hynrei mynta namar ka jingsniew palat ka surok ka shim por haduh kumba shi kynta eiei. U la ong ruh ba ka jingsniew surok ka la pynlehraiñ ia ka thaiñ khamtam haba ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei ki wan ban peit ia ka Shnongpdeng bad Umsyiem. U la dawa na ka tnad PWD ba ka dei ban maramot noh ia katei ka surok.
title: Shi taiew ai por, ban maramot surok Dawki,Wahkdait

content: Nongstoiñ, 23 Naiwieng:Ha ka jingbuddien jong u nongthoh khubor, halor ka jingpluh kynsan kynsan jong ka iew Shahlang la ioh jingtip ba ka jinglut jingsep baroh khoit ka la poi shaduh ka T.78 lak 98 hajar bad ki Iing kiba la pluh baroh ki don haduh 12 tylli kiba dei ar tad ki dukan.Haba iakren bad ki heh pulit jong ka District, ki la iathuh ba katei ka jingkem ding bad ka jingpluh jong katei ka iew ka dei na ka jingthut jong ka bording kaba la mih na ka iing jong u bah Shanbor Nongbri katta na pdeng kawei na ki 6 tylli ki dukan kiba don ha tei ka juh ka iing ia kaba u nong shim wai ia katei ka dukan um shym la don mynta la bun bun sngi.Shuh shuh na ka liang jong ki heh pulit ki la iathuh ruh ba ki tei ki 12 tylli ki iing kiba la ing khong ha katei ka jingpluh kidei jong ki 12 ngut ki briew kiba kynthup ia ka iing jong u bah Purno Marak kaba don ka wei ka dukan, Lowel Nongbri kaba don 3 tylli ki dukan, kong Debina Mawsor Kiba don 10 tylli ki dukan, Bithurson Marak kaba don ka wei ka dukan, kong Theirisa Nongbri ka wei ka dukan, Nocheni Sangma kawei, Risen Mawsor ka wei, Arpan R.Marak kawei, Shanbor Nongbri kaba don 6 tylli ki dukan, Paren Marak kawei ka dukan, Gohe Momin kawei bad u Hores Sangma ka wei ka dukan.Haba iadei bad ka jingshah lun maw jong ki kali pynlip ding na ka liang jong ki pulit, ki la pynrem jur ia ki riew shim kabu bad kila ong ruh kumba ka long mynta la i donkam ba ka sorkar Jylla lyngba ka tnad ba dei peit, ba ka la dei ban buh noh ia ka tnad pynlip ding ha Shahlang khnang ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah lada ki donkam ha kano kano ka por kaba kyrkieh khamtam ha kum kitei ki jingjia pluh Iing.Na ka liang jong ki pulit, ki la kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah ka thain Shahlang ba kin ai ka jingiatreilang bad ki pulit khnang ban wanrah ia ka shong suk shong sain ha ka thain hi baroh kawei.
title: Julor T.78 lak 98 hajar, na  ka jingpluh ka Iew Shahlang

content: Shillong, 23 Naiwieng:Ka HYC ka pyrshah jur ia ka jingpynkylla ka MBOSE ia ki kot pule ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher ha ki skul lyngba ka jingpynbna jong ka kaba ha ka 14 tarik u naiwieng, da kaba khot ia ki nong pynmih kot, ban soi ia ki kontrak.Katei ka seng ka la ong ba ka kwah ban tip kumno hapoh shibnai ka MBOSE ka la lah ban pule ia ki jingthoh, ba lah phah da kiba bun ki Nongpynmih kot na ka bynta ki kyrdan pule bapher bapher.Shuh shuh ka kyrwoh ka la ong ba katkum ka jingtip jong katei ka seng ka syllabus jong ka National Curriculum Frameworks (NCF) ruh ka lah ban wan ha u bnai Nohprah mynta u snem. Hato ka MBOSE kan pynkylla biang ia ka syllabus jong ka ban pyniahap bad ka syllabus jong ka NCF. Mano ban kitkhlieh ia kane lada don ka jingkylla lyngba ka jingpynbna jong ka NCF. Ne ki leh khnang mamar ba ki tip ba kan don kaba kum kane? ong katei ka kyrwoh khubor.Ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew kyndit ba dang mynta u snem 2017 ka MBOSE ka dang shu dep pyn kylla, ia ki kot pule ha ki class 8, 9 bad 10 ha ki katto katne ki sobjek. “Kumno kynsan kynsan mynta lah shu pynkylla noh ia kita ruh. Kane ka ktah shibun ia ki nongpynmih kot khamtam ia ki nongdie kot ba rit ba ria ha ki dukan shnong ne nongkyndong. Ka stok kaba ki don lehse kin hap ban shu bret noh. Ka jingduhnong bakhraw kan long ia ki. Mano ban buria ia kane ka jingduhnong ka jong ki” ong biang katei ka kyrwoh.
title: Pyrshah ba pynkylla kot ka MBOSE

content: Shillong, 23 Naiwieng:Ka dor jong ka pylleng pham, kaba ju bam paidbah, ka la kiewdor kyndit ha kine ki sngi bad la iathuh ba na kaba ju die mynshwa, kaba long T.5 kawei, mynta ka la poi sha ka T.7 kawei bad kaba lah ban nang kiew dor shuh shuh ha ki sngi ban wan. Ka dor jong ka pylleng shi song, kaba don 30 tylli, ka la poi mynta sha ka T.210 kaba duna eh, ha kaba ka la kiewdor kumba T.60, na kaba ju long mynshwa tang T.150 ne T.160 duh.Ki nongkhaii pylleng, haba iakren bad U Rupang, ki iathuh ba ha kine ki sngi, ym ioh thied pylleng shuh na Guwahati bad ki mahajon na katei ka nongbah Assam, ki la sangeh ban die pylleng lane ki die duna bha sha ki nongthied kiba na Shillong bad ka dei na katei ka daw, kaba la pynlong ia ki mahajon, ban die ha ka dor T.7 kawei ka pylleng bad kaba lah ban tam ruh ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan.Ym tang ki pylleng pham, kiba la kiewdor, hynrei la iathuh ba ka dor jong kiwei pat ki pylleng, ka la kiewdor bha ha kine ki sngi bad kitei ki kynthup ia ki pylleng saw, kiba la poi sha ka T.10 kawei bad nangta kiwei ki jait pylleng, kum ki pylleng han, ki pylleng syiar ruh ki la kiew dor kynsan ha kine ki sngi.Kiwei ki lad khubor, ki iathuh ba ka dor jong ka pylleng, ka la nang kiew dor ha kylleng ka India ha kine ki sngi bad ka sorkar Assam, ka la buh dor, ba ka dor jong ka pylleng, kam dei ban palat ia ka T.6.50 kawei ha ki iew ki hat jong katei ka Jylla.U Atul Bora, myntri ka tnat ri jingri, ula pyntip ia kane hadien ba ula ia kynduh bad ki nongdie pylleng mynta ka sngi bad ba ula bthah ia ki, ba ki dei ban peit ba ka dork am dei ban tam. Ka dor jong ka Assam, na ka jaka thied, kan long T.5.10pisa kawei bad kumta, la pynbeit ba kam dei ban palat ia ka T.6.15pisa kawei ha katei ka Jylla.
title: SA KA KYRDUH PYLLENG:  T.7 kawei ka pylleng pham ha Shillong

content: Jowai, 23 Naiwieng:Ki paid nongshong shnong kiba don ha ka shnong Artiang Sanphaw kaba hap hapoh ka Saitsama Polling Station ki don ar kyrteng sha Assam bad kumjuh ha Meghalaya.Katei ka shnong ka hap hapoh Nartiang Constituency bad kumjuh hapoh ka Hamren District Council Constituency, Karbi-Anglong District. Katei ka shnong ka don haduh kumba 200 ngut eiei ki nongthep vote.Halor katei ka jingdon kyrteng ar jaka ki nongthep vote ha katei ka shnong kaba don khappud bad ka Assam, na ka liang ka HNPF ka la iathuh ba kan sa ujor ia kane sha u Chief Election Officer jong ka jylla.
title: Ha Artiang Sanphaw, don ar kyrteng  thep vote, sha Assam & Meghalaya

content: Jowai, 24 Naiwieng:U Chief Election Officer ka Meghalaya Election Commission, u bah FR Kharkongor u la wan hiar hynnin ka sngi sha ka shnong Mutong na ka bynta ban iathuh ia ki paidbah ba ka kor thep vote kam long satia kaba lah ban leh thok leh shukor.Ha kane ka sngi la pynlong ia ka jingpyrshang ban thep vote ha kaba da ki spah ngut ki nongshong shnong hapoh ka jingialam u Rangbah Shnong, u ma Helping Phawa ki la wan ban ia shim bynta. Ia kane ka program la pyllong hapoh iing Dorbar ka shnong.Kane kadei ka program kaba nyngkong eh ha East Jaintia Hills bad ka bor District hapoh ka jingialam u Deputy Commissioner, u ma MS Lhuid u la jied ia katei ka shnong ban pynlong ia kane ka program.Ia ka jingialang la pyniaid da u ma Helping Phawa, Rangbah Shnong bad la ioh ruh ka jingkren na u SP ka EJH nalor u DC bad kiwei kiwei ki sahep na ka tnad Election Office bad kumjuh na utei u heh ka Election Commission ka jylla.Hadien kane ka program, u bah FR Kharkongong uba la sdang eh nyngkong eh ia k Discover Jaintia ha Jaintia Hills ha ka por ba u long kum u DC, u la leit jngoh ruh ia ka Moopun Water Falls ha kaba u la iaroh ia ka jingitynnad jong ka.
title: Hiar u CEO sha Mutong, ban pyni  ba ka machine thep vote kam thok

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:6 ngut ki nongialam jong ka KSU Sohra Circle ki la shah kem mynta ka sngi na ka daw ba ki leit ban pyndam ia ka jingthoh kaba la thoh Cherrapunjee da kaba synreit rong ïong ha kylleng ki jaka ha Sohra bad ka KSU ka kwah ba ha ka jaka ban thoh Cherrapunjee dei beit ban thoh da ka kyntien ‘Sohra’.
