La kem ia ki nongialam ka KSU na iew Sohra hadien ba ki la dep ban wan pyndam ha kiba bun ki jaka kiba kham bun ki dei kiba don ha Lower Cherra.Ki 6 ngut ki nongialam kiba la shah kem ki long u President ka Sohra Circle u samla Shemphrang Synrem, u General Secretary u Vicky Mawnai, u Mesadapbor Skhankil, u Patrick Lyngdoh Nonglait, u Lambhakupar Syiemlieh bad u Meban Nongrum. La kem ia ki ha ka por 2:15 ne 2:30 ha ka nohphai sngi hynrei la pyllait noh ha ka por janmiet hadien ba ki la ioh jamin. Ki nongialam KSU ki la shah kem hadien ka jingujor jong u Post Master ka Post Office da kaba kynnoh ba ki nongialam KSU ki la rung hapoh ka jaka jong katei ka ophis bad ki la synreit rong iong ia ka Signboard.Katkum ka jingiathuh u President ka KSU Sohra Circle u la ong ba naduh u bnai jymmang mynta u snem u SDO (Civil) Sohra u la pynmih jingpynbna ba baroh ki jaka trei, ki ophis ne ki jaka ki riew shimet kiba dang buh ia ka jingthoh Cherrapunjee ki dei ban pyndam noh hynrei ki dei ban buh da ka ktien Khasi da kaba thoh Sohra. Hadien katei ka jingpynbna u la ong ba ka KSU ka la leit ban ia kren da kaba jai jai bad da ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad kiba bun kitei ki jaka ba kin weng noh ia ka jingthoh Cherrapunjee hynrei kim shym leh satia kumta, kumta ka KSU ka la ai por ia ki haduh ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai hynrei hadien ba la kut katei ka sngi ruh kim patiaw kumta ka la leit ban pyndam hi noh da kaba shu siat da ka rong iong ia ki dak ba don jingthoh Cherrapunjee.U la iathuh ba ki ophis sorkar ki bym sngap satia ia ka jingkyrpad ban pyndam noh ia ka kyntien Cherrapunjee ki long ka Post Office, ka CHC bad ka ophis ka tnad khlaw (Forest) bad ki jaka ki riew shimet pat ki dei ki jaka bam , ki ing basa (Home stay) bad kiwei kum ka Coniferous (jaka bam), ka Halari , ka Averon (ki jaka bam), ka M.K 7 Star (homestay, ka Viviyor (home Stay) bad kiwei pat. U la iathuh ba ki nongialam ka KSU ki la leit tang katto katne ban pyndam ia kitei ki jingthoh mynta ka sngi bad la sdang naduh ka por 11:30 baje mynstep.
title: Shah kem 6 ngut ki nongialam  ka KSU Sohra, ba synreit rong iong ia ka Cherrapunjee

content: Shillong, 17 Naiwieng :Na ka daw ka jingiateh paralok jong ka HSPDP bad ka UDP, 20 ngut ki rangbah nongialam jong ka HSPDP ha Umsning konstitwensi ki la phet seng noh bad kitei ki la leit ia soh sha ka NPP. Kitei ki nongialam ki la kynnoh ba ki nongialam ka Party HSPDP kim kheiñ snep ia ki bad la ia teh paralok bad ka UDP khlem da pyntip ne twad jingmut shuwa na ki, ong u rangbah SK Nongsiej uba dei u Finance Secretary ka HSPDP Umsning.Kitei ki nongialam ki la rai ban leit ai jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong ka NPP, katto katne ngut na kitei ki nongialam kiba la leit ia soh sha ka NPP ki long u bah SK Nongsiej, Finance Secreatry, Bah Donkupar Wriang, Organising Secretary, bah Donbor Marbaniang, bah Kitdor Lyngdoh Mawnai, kiba dei ki Executive Member bad bun kiwei pat ki riew rangbah. Ka kyrwoh u bah Nongsiej ka la ong ba ki la rai kut ban trei shitom dukhi dukhait ia ka seng NPP. La pdiang sngewbha ia kine ki nongkitkam ka HSPDP da u Bah Clement Mawlong, u ba dei ruh u District President ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang bad u Secretary NPP Umsning bah Shiningstar Warjri.
title: Phet ki nongialam HSPDP  Umsning, sha sha ka NPP

content: Shillong, 16 Naiwieng:Kawei ka karkhana shna kali, ka la kem ding bad 13tylli ki kali ki la julor ha katei ka jingjia ha Mawlai Nongkwar, kaba don mar pyrshah bad ka Banalari World Cars. Ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka shnong ki la antad ba katei ka jingjia ka lah ban jia ha ka por shiteng miet naba ki la iohi ia katei ka jingjia mynta ka step phyrngap.La antad ba katei ka jingjia ka dei na ka daw ka jingthut ha ka bording ilektrik ha kitei ki karkhana. La iathuh ba kitei ki karkhana ki dei kiba don haduh 4 ngut ki trai, kiba ia don marjan bad la ong ba ha ka por ba jia katei ka jingjia u Chowkidar u la pyrshang ban tem ia ka ding, hynrei hadien ba u iohi bym lah ia khun shuh u la phet noh ialade ban lait na ka jingmynsaw. La iathuh ba kumba 13 tylli ki kali naduh ki kali rit haduh ki trok ki la julor bad don napdeng jong ki kiba dang long ban shna bad don ruh ki bym lah shuh naba ki la ing khong lut. Ha katei ka jingjia ym shym la don ba mynsaw.Ka khubor na U SP News Agency, ka iathuh ba katei ka jingpluh jong ka karkhana, ka dei ha ka por kumba lai baje lane lai shiteng dang step ngir bad katei ka dei ka karkhana shna kali jong u Bah Branding Marbaniang kaba don ha Mawlai Nongkwar, ha kaba ki kali kiba la pluh, ki don 13 tylli ki don bad baroh ki la ingkhong lut.Haba kren ha u SP News Agency u Bah Marbaniang, u la ong ba kane ka jingjia kala jia ha ka por kumba lai baje lane lai shiteng mynstep bad ka jingkem ka ding ka la long sted ha kaba 13 tylli ki kali ki la ingkhong ha kane ka jingpluh. Na ka liang jong u trai kane ka karkhana u la ong ba ia ka daw ym lah shuh ban tip namar ka dei ha ka por bay m don briew shuh.Na ka liang jong ki pulit jong ka Mawlai Police station ki la shim ia ka jingtohkit ban wad ia ka daw jong kane ka jingpluh kane ka karkhana shna kali ha kaba 13 tylli ki kali ki la julor ha kane ka jingpluh.
title: Kem ding ka karkhana shna  kali, ing khong 13tylli ki kali

content: Pynursla, 12 Naiwieng:Ka Raid Shabong, ka la ioh Sordar thymmai, hynnin ka sngi, ha ka jing ialeh kaba lai ngut, ban iaknieh ia katei ka kam Sordar jong ka Raid.U bah Biggestson Lyngdoh, ula jop ia ka elekshon Sordar jong ka Raid Shabong, kaba la pynlong hynnin ka sngi, da kaba u ioh 1,682 vote, da kaba tam 495 vote ia uba wan ba ar, U Bah Kaleptor Khongdup. U Bah Biggestson Lyngdoh, u ioh 1,682 vote, U Bah Kaleptor Khongdup, u ioh 1,187 vote bad U Bah JS Jeffrey Khonglam, uioh 136 vote. Baroh kiba thep vote, ki long 3,005 vote bad kiba la shah kyntait ki don 62 vote.U Bah Biggeston, un shimti ia katei ka kam, na U Bah Herin Khongngai, uba dei U Sordar, uba dang bat ia katei ka kam haduh ha kine ki sngi.U Bah HP Pyngrope, uba dei U Chairman ka Election Committee jong ka Saw Raid, u iathuh ha U Rupang, ba ka elekshon, ka long kaba iaid beit iaid ryntih.Ki nongthep vote jong ka Raid Shabong, ki don 4,024 vote baroh. Ki jaka thep vote, ki long ha Laitmynrieng, Pynursla, Urksew Wahpathaw, Mawpran, Pynter, Siatbakon.
title: U Sordar thymmai  ka Raid Shabong

content: Shillong,12 Naiwieng:U MDC ka Nongkrem konstitwensi u bah H.S Shylla uba la leit ban ia soh mynta sha ka seng NPP u la ong ba ki seng riewlum kin ym lah satia ban poi sha ka thong ban thaw sorkar bad ki dei tang ki Party rit party ria kiba don tang sha ri Lum Khasi bad kim lah ban phrung tang ha Jaintia ruh “Ka UDP bad HSPDP ka kut tang ha Puriang, tang ha Jaintia Hills ruh kim lah rung ki shu don tang ka nam khlem lah treikam, ki kut noh tang ha Mawshynrut khlem lah ksam ia ka Garo Hills bad ki kut ruh tang ha Khanapara, kaei phin ap kyrmen na kine ki Party, ka PDF lei ka dei ka Party u Malik, kren katba kren rai katba rai ha ka Central Working Committee jong ki hynrei ka rai kaba khadduh ka dei ka jong u Malik” u la ong.U bah Shylla u la ong ba ki Party riewlum kim pat kot bor ban thaw sorkar, “Ban thaw sorkar donkam haduh 10 phut, kiba pli ki dei tang ki Khyndai Khup kin kot shano shaduh uta u pud. U Dr.Don u ai jingkheiñ ba kin ioh 32 ngut ki MLA u bakla imat u mut ban ong 3 la 2 hynrei u kum iohi bakla pynban, katei ka jingkheiñ jong ki 3 la 2 ruh kaba la heh hynrei kin ioh kham rit pynban ia kane ruh” u la ong. Haba kren ia ka PDF pat u la ong ba dang shen u bah Pynshngaiñ u la ong ba ki Party ban wan hakhmat ha kane ka elekshon MLA 2018 dei ka NPP bad PDF, “Ngi ruh ngi sngewthuh ia kata dei na kata ka daw balei ngin shu sdien bos, rung syndon hapoh NPP” u la ong.Haba kren pat ia ka seng HSPDP u la ong “U Sing rangbah ha Nongkrem u la rem lypa , kiwei leinai ia kren shuh, u bah Ardent u la pynlong jingialang ha Mawpynthih poi tang 50 ngut, kita mar shiteng dei ki jong ngi kiba leit sngap lorni. Na Nongkren ngi la jop lypa u sing rangbah u la leit, katba leit ud ki paidbah ka jubab jong u ka long beit bym don ha ka bor. Ki paidbah bapli ki la sngewsynei ba I bah Ardent im don ha ka bor la kum ba kin iam -ialade ha pla shi tyngka kim don, i bah pat ka tulop T.2 lak shibnai”.Ia ka Congress pat u la ong ba ka jingplie Civil -Sub-division, ka jingplie Block kaba lah i shyrkhei , “Lah long kumba thied Banian na iew thied kawei ioh 2 kumba long ka Mawlai, pan ka Mawlai ioh ar bad ka Mawpat, ka pisa pat ym don. Lah long kum kito kiba mih ing tang poi ka por shet ja pat pan khaw na ing i mei”, u bah Shylla u la ong ba katei ka jingleh ka sorkar ba ialam da ka Congress ka long pynban kum ka kamkai.U James K Sangma ruh ha ka jingkren jong u -u la ong ba ha ri Lum Garo ka jingiakhun ha kane ka elekshon MLA 2018 ka dei beit tang hapdeng ka Congress bad NPP, “Ha ri Lum Garo ym don UDP, ym don HSPDP, ym don PDF , ka GNC ka don hynrei kam lah thaw pyrthei, ngin ia khun beit ma ngi bad ka Congress, nga pynthikna ba ngin tam kput ha manla ki konstitwensi” ong u James.
title: UDP, HSPDP tang ha Puriang, PDF ka Party u Malik: Shylla

content: Shillong, 12 Naiwieng:U bah Prestone Tynsong MLA ka seng Congress na Pynursla konstitwensi u la ther kylla ia ka sorkar ba ialam da ka Congress bad u la kynnoh ba kane ka sorkar MUA-II mynta ka la kylla long pynban kum ka kompeni shimet, “Ka sorkar mynta kam dei shuh ka sorkar u paidbah, i kumba ka la kylla pynban kum ka kompeni shimet, la pyniaid ia ki kam tang da u wei u briew, donkam skhim ym donkam kynduh Minister hap leit beit tang sha u wei u briew -u nongialam bad u ta u Mama Mukul Sangma” ong u bah Prestone haba kren ha ka jingialang paidbah ka seng NPP kaba la long ha Sohryngkham ha ka sngi saitjaiñ. U bah Prestone u la ong ba kat shaba phai mynta u iohsngew ia ka sur ba ki paidbah ki kwah jingkylla bad u ju kylli marwei marwei kaei kata ka jingkylla bad u lap ba ka sorkar naduh u 2013 haduh 2017 ka khlem leh eiei. U ong ba ki paidbah ki ia kynduh jingeh shisha ha kane ka sorkar kaba mynta.U bah Prestone u ong ba ka rukom treikam kane ka sorkar mynta ka long khyllah khyllah bad mar khongpong bad haba ia kren ruh ym don ba sngap, “Nga la kren ha ka jingialang ki myntri sorkar hynrei ym don ba sngap lehnohei lah long kumba kren pynban sha ri khlaw” u la ong. U la kdew katto katne tylli ki mat ia ka rukom treikam kane ka sorkar kum ka Organic Mission ha kaba u la ong “Ia ka Organic Mission nga la ong bym long ban pyntreikam noh mynta mynta leh suki suki ai kan iaid lang bad ka rukom rep kaba rim hynrei ki ong em, nga ong ka biang -ka long kumba pynkdor jubor ia u siej uba la heh haduh ba un da kdiah syndon”.Shuh shuh u la ong ba kane ka sorkar ka bunkam ban leit sam ia ki tynrai dieng Agar, “Haba ia kren ha Cabinet u Dr.Mukul u ong ba une u dieng un pynmih ia ka umphniang kaba rem dor tam ha ka pyrthei bad ka shim por 25 snem ia une u dieng ban heh, 25 snem hap ap kata ruh ym don jingtikna la kan mhi umphniang ne ym mih, kum u myntri ka tnad khlaw nga leit dalade hi sha Dehradun ban wad jingtip shaphang une u dieng, ki iathuh ba ha Kerela ki la thung 15 ne 20 snem mynshuwa hynrei ka pheil, ngam tip hangne ha Meghalaya ioh don jadu pynban-kum kita ki jait prokram ka sorkar” ong u bah Prestone.U la kdew sa ia ka jingsam ksing ngap ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad Industries lyngba ka Basin Development Authority “Ki la bunkam ban sam synduk ri ngap da ki phew hajar tylli, da nga kylli balei kumne ki ong u ngap un wan shong hi-khie hangta te naei yn ia wad kiaw, la shu bret kai ia ka pisa da ki klur tyngka sha nala, kita ki jait prokram kane ka sorkar”. U bah Prestone u la ong ba dei na kata ka daw ba ym pei ia kren satia ha kane ka sorkar ba mynta ba un mih noh na ka seng Congress bad shen un rung sha ka NPP ban wanrah da ka sorkar kaba thymmai.Kumba ka long mynta u la ong ba ki skul sorkar ha ka por slap ki khynnah ki hap kup shatri hapoh ing skul, ki jaka sumar ym don doktor, ki lynti syngkien kum ka surok kulai, ka rep ka riang ym don polisi hynrei kane ka sorkar kaba mynta kam iohi ia kine. Ha kaba ia dei bad ka tnad jngohkai pyrthei u la ong ba u la ia kren hapoh Cabinet ban thaw polisi ban pynsangeh noh ia ki kali Assam ba wan shane, “Hynrei kata ruh ki ong bym long, yn ia ong kumno keiñ” u la pynkut.
title: “Ka sorkar ka la kylla long kum ka kompeni shimet”

content: Shillong, 12 Naiwieng:Ka seng M.P.U.F-EJHD, East jaintia hills districts, ka sngew lyngngoh halor ka jingujor jong ki katto katne ki nong shong shnong ka Pynurkba kaba hap hapoh East jaintia hills district, ha kaba iadei shaphang ki kran tin, ka painkhana bad u surok pohdong.Na ka liang ka seng, ka la hiar sha katei ka shnong Pynurkba ban tohkit, hynrei la ioh ban ia kynduh ia ki katto katne ki nong shong shnong ka Pynurkba bad ma ki ruh kim tip shaphang kita ki kran tin ne ka skhim painkhana ka ba ki khot ka Swatch Bharat mission, namar ba haduh mynta wat tang kawei ruh ki paidbah kim pat ioh kum katei ka jait skhim painkhana bad ka seng ha katei ka sngi ka pyrshang ban iakynduh ia u Rangbah shnong ka Pynurkba uba tip kyrteng kum u Ras Rymbai, hynrei kiba ha iing jong u ki ong ba umdon ha iing. Ha ka sngi ka ba bud pat ka seng ka la phone ia u tei u Rangbah shnong na ka liang jong u pat u la kular iaka seng ban iakynduh hapoh kine ki artaiew, hynrei haduh mynta umpat iakynduh ia ka seng.Ka seng ka lyngngoh ruh ban iohi ia u wei u surok pohdong katei ka shnong antad u ba jrong kumba shiteng kilometre ei ei na ka surok PWD, haduh ban da poi ha iing u tei u Rangbah shnong, ha kaba la iohi, ba katei ka surok kam dei na ka bynta u paidbah, hynrei ka dei tang naka bynta u Rangbah shnong namar ba ka kut thik ha iing u tei u Rangbah shnong. Kaba sngew phylla shuh shuh ba ia u tei u surok la pynshna na ka skhim shispah sngi (MGNREGA) bad hadien pat la shna ia ki nala bad siang mawria, na ka skhim kaba wan na ka Border area.Halor ki kran tin sop iing kiba wan na ka SWRP skhim (MLA skhim), ka seng ka ioh jingtip na ka ain wad jingtip paidbah, ba naduh u 2013-2017 ki don haduh 23ngut ki nong ioh lai bad kitei ki la ioh lai ban ka tin bad ki nongioh ki long U Ma Hamlet Pdang,Thehmon Rymbai,Bliw Lamo,Pynurkba primary government skul, Phyrnai pdiang, Pies pdang,Philan syih,Edling pdiang,Kyrmen syih,Lis rymbai, Seiborlang pdang,Daioshwa pdang,Nishwa dkhar,Storin dkhar,Thrangmon Rymbai,Yar syih,Beldis pdang,Shirup Shylla,Koming pdang,Morial Lamo,No Lamurong,Melci dkhar,Sunshine Rymbai.
title: Ym tip ki paidbah Pynurkba ia  ki skhim pynroi, ong ka MPUF

content: Nongstoiñ, 12 Naiwieng:U samla uba 22 snem, ula shu duh ei, ia la ka jong ka jingim, ha ka jingleit bam khana hynnin ka sngi, ha kaba ula ngam jyllop ha wah Blei.Katei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih, ka dei ia u wei u samla u ba la tip kyrteng kum u Iengskhem Tynhiang 22 snem, na ka shnong Myndo, ha kaba ula khlad noh hadien ba u la ngam jyllop noh ha kawei na ki jaka kaba la tip kum ka Sapporli jong ka wah Blei kaba don ha ka thain Mawshynrut West Khasi Hills District.Ka tyllong khubor ba la ioh lum, ka iathuh, ba katei ka jingjia kala jia ha ka sngi Saitjain, ha ka por 2.00 bane nohsngi, katba u tei u samla ryngkat kiwei pat ki para samla ki dang leit kai bam khana, ha katei ka jaka.La iathuh da ki lad khubor, ba hadien ba ki la poi ha katei ka wah ban khwai, utei u samla ha ka por shiteng sngi eiei ryngkat ki paralok jong u, ki la sdang ban sum bad ban jngi ha katei ka wah; hynrei hadien ba u la sdang ban ngam ha ki jaka ba jylliew, kyndit kynsan utei u samla u la sdang ban ksaid, namar um shym la nang bha ban jngi bad ban pan jingiarap ruh bad uwei na ki paralok kiba ia wan lang u la leit ban ai jingiarap, hynrei um shym la lah namar ka jingjylliew bad utei u paralok u la ngam lang ha katei kajuh ka jaka; hynrei la lah pat ban iarap ia u da kiwei pat ki paralok kiba wan ban ia jngi lang,katba ia u Iengskhem ym shym la lah shuh ban iarap.Hadien ba u tei u samla u la ngam jyllop ha katei ka wah na ka liang jong kitei ki para samla, kiba ia don lang ki la pyntip noh mar mar sha ki rangbah jong ki shnong ba mar jan bad la pyntip ruh sha ki pulit jong ka Mawshynrut Police Station bad la iathuh ba ha ka jingiatreilang jong ki paidbah nong shong shnong jong ka shnong Langumshing, Langumshing A, Porsohlang, Myndo ryngkat bad ki pulit ia katei ka met iap jong u tei u samla la lah ban lap bad sei noh mynta ka janmiet jong ka sngi u Blei ha ka por 2.00baje nohsngi.
title: Na ka leit bam khana, ngam jyllop  u samla 22 snem ha Wahblei

content: Nongstoiñ, 12 Naiwieng:Hynniew ngut ki snar ehrang jong ka GNLA, ki la rahbor ia u rangbah na Riangdin, ha ka miet jong ka Sngi Thohdieng.La iathuh ba 7 ngut ki suba lehnoh jong ka kynhun kieng atiar, na Rilum Garo, ki la rahbor ia u wei u rangbah u bala tip kyrteng kum u Neelam R Sangma u ba na ka shnong Riangdim West Khasi Hills District.Katkum ka tyllong khubor bala ioh lum na ki pulit ka West Khasi Hills, la ong ba katei ka jingjia kala jia ha ka miet jong ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 10:00baje mynmiet ei ei ha kaba ki suba GNLA kiba la wan ha ryngkat ki tiar siat kila rahbor noh ia u tei u rangbah u ba dei ruh u sordar shnong (Nokma) ka shnong Riangdim kaba hap hapoh ka Shallang Police Station.Shuh shuh ka tyllong khubor ka iathuh ruh ba hadien ba kitei ki suba GNLA kila rahbor ia u tei u rangbah kila ai ruh ia u phun nombor sha kiba ha iing jong u da kaba kila bthah ruh ban phun ha u nombor ba kila ai.U Superintendent of Police ka West Khasi Hills District, u bah G.D. Kharwanlang haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ong ba na ka liang jong ki pulit haduh mynta ki dang iai pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor katei ka jingjia bad haduh mynta ym shym pat la tip satia na kaei ka daw ba u tei u rangbah u la shah rahbor bad shano u don.Shuh shuh u bah Kharwanlang u la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong ki pulit ka Shallang haduh mynta ki dang pynlong ia ka jingthwet kaba jur ha kitei ki thain khnang ban ioh pyllait im ia u tei u rangbah bad ruh ban lap dien ia kitei ki ehrang.
title: Rahbor ki GNLA, ia u Nokma  ka shnong Riangdim

content: Shillong, 12 Naiwieng:Ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Sohryngkham kaba u la pyniasoh ialade sha ka seng NPP ubah Pyniaid Sing Syiem MDC ka Sohryngkham u la thalaiñ ia u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit MLA ka Nongkrem uba dei ruh u President rangbah ka seng HSPDP da kaba kynnoh ba ka jingshah beh jong u kam dei ka rai jong ka Party hynrei ka dei ka rai shimet jong u bah Ardent. “Ngam kynnoh ia ka Party HSPDP hynrei nga kynnoh ia u bah Ardent ba dei ka rai shimet jong u hi hynrei nga ioh thiah suk ba watla nga la shah beh seng ha u bah Ardent hynrei ki paidbah kim beh ia nga, lada dei ba beh u paidbah ngan ym ioh thiah shuh” ong u bah Pyniaid.U la pynkynmaw ia ka jingshah beh seng jong u da kaba kynnoh ba u ialap pyrshah ban pynrem ia u kyrtong ka HSPDP ha Nongkrem bad Laban ha ka elekshon MDC shiteng samoi, “Lada dei na nga u kyrtong ka HSPDP na Nongkrem um dei ban rem kput, hynrei u la shah rem haduh 3000 vote hato kaei kane ka dei ka dak ba ki paidbah ki la ngiah ia u MLA, ki dei ki kam jong u MLA ba pynrem ia u kyrtong katei ka seng, ha Laban nga la trei shitom ia u kyrtong ka HSPDP la sakhi ruh da u Paduh trai jong u bah Ardent u bah Sounder Cajee hynrei kim hun” ong biang u bah Pyniaid.Hadien ka jingshah beh seng u la ong ba la long kumba shah beh na ing lok bad u la shong ing kur 10 bnai bad bun kiba wan tyrwa, ” U bah Lapang u la phah briew nga ong wat sngew eiei, ka UDP la wan u bah Bindo bad bah Jemino nga ong dang hap ia peit, ka BJP, ka NCP ki la wan ngam pat treh, hynrei dei ha ka seng NPP kaba don ki nongialam kiba don ia ka juh ka thong kumba nga don ba nga pyniasoh ialade”. U la ong ba kum u MDC u la trei katba lah la ka bor hapoh ka konstitwensi bad ia ka bhah kaba u ioh T.3 klur tyngka ruh u la ong ba u la sam da kaba shai hakhmat ki shnong ki thaw bad u la ai jingkheiñ tiak pa tiak bad u la pan jingkyrshan na ki paidbah ban pynjop ia u kum u MLA jong ki ba un lah ban ai ka jingshakri kaba bha tam.Ha katei ka jingialang la don ki heh NPP ba kynthup ia u President rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, u MLA James Sangma bad bah Prestone Tynsong, la wan ban ai mynsiem mynstep shuwa ban sdang jingialang da u bah Remington Pyngrope MLA ka UDP na Mawkynrew, la don u DR.W.R Kharlukhi President ha ka jylla, ba hJied Kurbah President East Khasi Hills. La don ruh ki kyrtong kum u bah C.B Syiem na Nongpoh, bah Lawan War na Mairang, Wailad Shylla na Jowai, H.S Shylla na Nongkrem, la donlang ruh kiwei pat ki nongialam barim jong ka seng Congress kum u bah Boldness Nongrum bad kiwei pat.
title: Thalaiñ u bah Pyniaid ia u bah Ardent

content: Shillong, 12 Naiwieng:Lashai sngi, yn leit tur ki nong kamai trok lem bad ki lama iong sha ki jaka ba don ki karkhana dewbilat ha Lum Shnong.Katei ka dei ka rai jong ka Joint Action Committee jong ki nong kamai trok ka Ri Khasi Jaintia, ha kaba kan leit tur bad rah lama iong lashai ka sngi sha Lumshnong, ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngew pyrshah jur jongki, halor ka jing leh bym salia ki trai karkhana dewbilat ia ki trok jong ki trai Jylla.Ha ka jing iakren bad U bah Handle Mukhim, uba dei U Chairman ka JAC, u iathuh ba kan don shwa ka jingiakynduh lang jong ki dkhot, ha ka por 10baje lashai mynstep ha 7mer bad hadien kata, kin hiar sha Lumshnong, ha kaba la khmih lynti, ba kin ia kynduh ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka Star Cement kompeni bad hadien kata, kin iakren bad sngapthuh ia kaei ka jubab jongki, ha shwa ba kin rai da kumwei pat. La iathuh ba ka jingleit tur sha ki karkhana lashai ka sngi, kan long kaba jai jai bad kin don kumba 50,60ngut ki dkhot jong ka JAC, ki ban ia shim bynta lang.
title: Mynta yn leit tur ki nong kamai  trok sha ki kompeni dewbilat

content: Shillong, 12 Naiwieng:Na ka jingialang jong ka seng NPP kaba la long ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ha Sohryngkham-Mawryngkneng konstitwensi la paw shai ka kyrteng ki 7 ngut ki MLA ki ban ia soh noh shen ialade sha ka seng NPP. Ka kyrteng ki 7 ngut ki MLA ka la paw na ka jingpynpynkupburom da ka jaiñ ryndia jong ka seng NPP hynrei napdeng kitei ki 7 ngut tang u bah Prestone Tynsong MLA ka Pynursla uba la donlang ha ka jingialang bad uba la kren paidbah, u bah Remington Pyngrope u la wan mih mynstep ban pdiang sngewbha ia u Conrad, hynrei u khlem shong satia ha katei ka jingialang kaba la iathuh ha ki nongthohkhubor ba u donkam kyrkieh kaba um lah kiar um lah ban ia don lang.Kitei ki 7 ngut ki MLA kiba la paw kyrteng ki long u bah Prestone Tynsong (Congress) uba la shimti hi ia ka jaiñ ryndia, u bah Ngaitlang Dhar (Congress), bah Sniawbhalang Dhar (Congress) la shimti ia ka jaiñ ryndia da u hynmen jong ki u bah Paia Dhar, bah Rowell Lyngdoh (Congress) la shimti da u bah Diverland Lyngdoh pyrsa jong u, nangta u bah Stephan Mukhim, bah Hopeful Bamo bad u bah Remington Pyngrope (UDP).U bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba haduh mynta um pat ia soh sha ka seng NPP hynrei shen un ia soh noh bad un risaiñ noh na ka jinglong MLA. “Ngan risaiñ noh hi shen bad ngam ap shuh haduh da poi ka dorbar ruh, ka la donkam palat ia nga ba ngan leit kylleng ki jaka” u la ong. Kumba long mynta u bah Prestone u dang dei u MLA Congress, hynrei u la wan ban ialap ia u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u kyrtong jong ka NPP. Haba kylli halor kane u la ong “Ka jingwan jong nga ban ialap ia u bah Pyniaid kawei ka dei ba nga don ki jingiadei shimet bad u bad sa kawei ruh ba u paidbah ka Mawryngkneng konstitwensi u kwah ba ngan donlang ha kane ka sngi” u la ong.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ki nongthohkhubor u bah Prestone u la ong ba ym dei tang mynta ka sngi ba u leit sha ka jingialang ka NPP hynrei u la leit sha kiwei ki jaka ruh, “Phi lah iohi nga ju kren sha ki nongthohkhubor, nga leit sha kylleng ki jaka ruh ha ka jingialang NPP, kam don shuh ka jingialehkai ia rieh baroh ka la paw shai kaba sah sa tang ba ngan risaiñ, ka High Command na Delhi ruh ka tip ia kata lada dei ban shah pynshitom ki la dei ban pynshitom naduh mynno” u la ong.Ha katei ka jingiakren u la ong ba ka daw tynrai kaba u la mhi noh na ka seng Congress ka dei namar ka ingbym biang ki nongialam ha ka jylla, “Ka daw ba kongsan ka dei namar ka jingbym biang ki nongialam ha ka jylla -haba ong nongialam ka mut u Dr.Mukul Sangma, dei na kata ka daw bun ki paralok MLA ruh ki ban mih noh, mynta ka sngi ruh ha ka jingialang ngam pat kren than nga dang shu kren ba ki paidbah ki la kwah ia ka jingkylla” ong u bah Prestone.U bah Prestone u kyrtong Myntri Rangbah lada jop bun ka NPP na Khasi-JaintiaKi nongialam ka seng NPP ki la pynbna ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ba lada jia ba ka NPP kan jop bun na ri Lum Khasi-Jaintia u bah Prestone Tynsong un long u myntri rangbah jong ka jylla bad lada jia pat ba katei ka seng kan jop bun na ri Lum Garo u myntri rangbah un wan na ri Lum Garo bad u lah ban dei u James K Sangma lane ka Agatha Sangma ki khun jong u Purno A Sangma, uba la khlad noh.U Dr.W.R Kharlukhi u la ong ba ka seng NPP kam long kum ka seng Congress, u la ong ba ka Congress ka jop tang 14 ngut na ri Lum Garo bad 16 ngut na ri Lum Khasi-Jaintia hynrei ka shuki myntri rangbah ka leit sha u Garo, “Ngim long kumta ngi la buh lypa ia ka thong ba lada ngin ioh bun nangne u bah Prestone un dei u myntri rangbah jong ngi” ong u Dr.W.R Kharlukhi haba kren paidbah ha ka jingialang ha Sohryngkham.Katkum ka jingong ki nongialam ka NPP ki la ong ba ki la buh ia katei ka thong khnang ba kan ka jingtrei shitom na baroh ar liang na Khasi-Jaintia ruh bad na Garo ruh bad kumba ka long mynta u la ong ba ki nongialam Party ki la ia tur bad trei shitom tyngeh ha la ki jong ki jong ki jaka bad lada baroh ar ki trei shitom bha khlem pep ka NPP kan ioh ban thaw sorkar marwei hi.
title: Ngan risaiñ noh shen, ngam ap  shuh ia ka Dorbar: Prestone

content: Shillong, 12 Naiwieng:U MP ka NPP na Tura konstitwensi uba dei ruh u President rangbah jong ka seng NPP u Conrad K Sangma, u la takraiñ tyngeh ia ka sorkar jylla kaba ialam da u Dr.Mukul Sangma ha kaba u la kynnoh ba kane ka sorkar ka don pisa ban leh ia kiba bun ki kam sngewbha, hynrei kam don pisa pat ia ki kam ba kham kongsan bad u la ong ba ka daw ka dei ka jingnang jon gu myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma ban pyniaid ia ki kam.“La weng ia ki phew hajat ngut ki Muster Roll kiba la trei da ki 20 snem bym don pisa ban siew tulop, ym don pisa ban shna surok shna lynti, ym don pisa ban siew tulop ia ki nonghikai, kaei kane. U Dr.Mukul u don pisa pat ban shna ia ka ïng lajong kaba T.15 klur tyngka, u don pisa ban ai sngewbha T.4 klur T.5 klur sha ka phlim, u don pisa ban pynlong tamasa ia tem ia put sngewbha, kum u nongialam dei ban tip kino ki kam ba donkam hakhmat bad kino ba dei ban leh hadien” ong u Conrad.U Conrad u la ong ba ka jingbym biang ka rukom pyniaid kam ka sorkar ka la wanrah ia ka jingduhnong ia ka jylla ha kaba katkum ka CAG Report la lap ba ka jylla ka la duh nong T.850 klur ha u snem 2015-2016 na ka tnad Mining, Transport bad Excise bad ka la duh nong ruh T.700 klur ha u snem 2013-2014 na kitei ki juh ki tnad. U la ong ba baroh kitei ki jia dei na ka daw ka jingbym ler ka sorkar. “Ka jingshongshit ka seng NPP mynta ha ri Lum Khasi-Jaintia ka la long kumba wan ka Tsunami ha ri lum Garo ha kaba ki paidbah mynta baroh ki phai khmat sha ka seng NPP bad kane ka Tsunami ka la khih lut ha ka jylla baroh kawei, ngi ngeit ba ngin synshar marwei ha u 2018” ong biang u Conrad.Haba kren shaphang ki kam bamsap bad ka jingkwah burom u Conrad u la ong “U kpa jong nga u Purno A Sangma u la hikai ia ngi baroh 3 ngut, ma nga u James bad ka Agatha ba ngim ju dei ban rung sha ka saiñpyrthei na ka bynta ka pisa, ne na ka bynta ka burom hynrei u la ong rung sha ka politik da ka thong ban leh kaba bha na kaba bha tam ia ki paidbah bad ngi long kumta, ka sorkar ha u 2018 kan dei ka sorkar jong u paidbah, kan peit ia ki jingdonkam u paidbah” pynkut u Conrad haba kren ha ka jingialang paidbah ka seng NPP kaba la long ha Sohryngkham.
title: “Ka ïng ba T.15 klur don pisa,  ban ai tulop nonghikai ym don pisa”

content: Shillong, 13 Naiwieng:Hadien ba ka High Court Meghalaya ka la khein beain ia ka jingthung ia ki Parliamentary Secretaries, u Bah Madal Sumer uba la ujor ia kane ka mukotduma, da ka PIL, u la iakynduh ia u Lat ka jylla mynta ka sngi, u Ganga Prasad ban dawa mait jinglong MLA ia baroh kiba bat kum ki Parliamentary Secretaries ha kane ka sorkar MUA-II kaba la ialam da ka Congress.Ha kane ka dorkhas kaba don phra miej, u Bah Madal u la dawa na u Lat ka jylla ba u dei ban pynduh noh ia ka jinglong MLA ki 17 ngut kiba bat kum ki Parliamentary Secretaries namar ba ka ain Meghalaya Parliamentary Secretaries (Appointment, Salaries Allowances and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2005 ka long kaba beain.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor hadien ba la iakynduh bad u Lat, u Bah Augustine Shanpru uba iadon lang ha ka kynhun bad u Bah Madal Sumer, u la ong ba u Lat ka jylla u la pynsngew ba un bud katkum ka artikil 192 ka riti synshar ka ri.Katkum kane ka artikil 192, ka la pynkup bor ha u Lat ba un shim ia ka rai ban mait jinglong MLA hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingai jingmut na ka Election Commission.“U Lat u la ong ha ngi ba un bud ia ka artikil 192, bad un khot ia u Lamphang ka Iing dorbar thawain, bad kumjuh ia ka Election Commission”, la ong u Bah Augustine. U la ong ba kin shaniah ha ka rai jong u Lat ba un leh ia kaba donkam khnang ba ki MLA kiba bat kum ki Parliamentary secretaries ki dei ban shah mait jinglong MLA.“Ka sorkar ka don kyrhai ka pisa ban thung ban pynlut da ki parliamentary secretaries hynrei lyngngoh ba kam don pisa ban thaw kam thaw jam ia ki samla, ban shna ia ki surok, ki lynti synkieng, ki skul, ki kolej”, la ong u Bah Augustine.U la ong ba ka sorkar ka la thaw ia ki district ha ka jylla, ki sub-division, ki block, ki police station hynrei kine baroh haduh mynta ki dang long tang ki shynrong khlem don eiei.“Ka long kaba lyngngoh ba ka sorkar ka la iakhun dohiap ban iada ia ki Parliamentary secretaries hynrei haba iakynduh jingeh ki paidbah na ka jingkhang dewiong, ka shu leh mynleh”, u la ong.U la ong ba kumba ka paw, ka jingthaw ain ka sorkar kam dei namar ba kaba da shongnia hynrei la shu thaw tang namar ba don ka jingsngew bad iabuh shun iano iano, ym ia ka jaitbynriew.Katkum ka ain lada kine ki MLA ki shah mait jinglong MLA, kin sa duh noh ban ioh iakhun elekshon.Ki 17 ngut ki MLA kiba risain hadien ba la mih ka hukum na ka High Court ki long u Bah Comgingone Ymbon, uba dang shu shah pynkiew myntri shen, u Samuel M Sangma, Limison D Sangma, Winnerson D Sangma, Kennedy C Khyriem, Cherak W Momin, Brigady Marak, Sengnam Marak, Rophul S Marak, Robinus Syngkon, Micheal T Sangma, Justine Dkhar, Ashahel D Shira, Stephanson Mukhim, Dr Delestine Lyngdoh uba dang shu shah pynkiew mynti shen, Noverfield R Marak, bad u Marthon Sangma.Baroh kine ki MLA ba shah thung kum ki Parliamentary secretaries ki dei ba la thung katkum ka ain 2005 kaba la khein beain da ka High Court.Ka ain ka kren shai ba ka jingbat kam Parliamentary secretaries ka dei ka kam iohnong kaba la mana da ka ain bad ki dei ban shah tangon ha ka ain katkum ka artikil 191 (1) (a).Ha ka jingshisha ka sorkar jylla tang ban pynneh ia ka sorkar, ha u 2016, ka la pynkylla ia ka Meghalaya Parliamentary Secretaries (Appointment, Salaries Allowances and Miscellanesous Provisions) Act 2005 ha u snem 2016 hadien ba la dep ujor PIL ia kane ka kam ha ka High Court bad ka Kashari High Court ka la khein beain ia kane ka ain kaba la pynkylla da ka sorkar.“Tang ka jingrisain kam lah ban pynneh ia ka jinglong MLA namar ba ka hukum ka High Court kam buh ia kane ka kyndon bad bad namarkata, ki dei ban shah sloit ia ka jinglong MLA”, la ong u bah Madal ha ka sorkhas ha u Lat ka jylla.
title: Phra peij ka dorkhas U Bah Madal ha  u Lat, ban mait MLA ia 17 ngut ki PS

content: Shillong, 13 Naiwieng:Ki khubor ki la saphriang ba u bah Remington Pyngrope MLA ka UDP na Mawkynrew konstitwensi un phet noh na ka seng UDP bad un leit ban pyniasoh sha ka NPP bad ia kane la kren shai ruh da u bah Prestone Tynsong MLA ka Congress na Pynursla konstitwensi ba shen ma u kumjuh u bah Reming kin ia soh noh bad ka NPP. Ka Mawkynrew konstitwensi ka dei ka konstitwensi paralok hapdeng ka UDP bad HSPDP ha kaba ka UDP ka la pynbna ia u bah Remington Pyngrope kum u kyrtong katba ka HSPDP pat ia u bah Martle Mukhim.Ka jingkylli kaba mih mynta ka long ba lada u bah Remington Pyngrope un leit sha ka seng NPP, hato ka UDP kan sei da uwei pat u kyrtong ne kan ailad noh sha ka seng HSPDP ka paralok jong ka ha ka elekshon 2018. La ia kren ia kane bad u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit ha kaba u bah Ardent u la ong ba kumba ka long mynta kam pat don kano kano ka jingshai la u bah Reming u la phet ne-em hynrei u la ong ba lada dei kata ka por ba ka lah shai ka HSPDP kan hap ban shong ia pynbeit bad ka UDP, “Ngi hap ban sngewthuh bha ba haba ngi ia paralok, ngi hap ban trei na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ka Alliance, ngin dang hap ban ia kren pynbeit, ngin peit da kano ka bynta kaba ngi hap ban leh ban ioh nong ka Alliance” ong u bah Ardent haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor.Halor ka jingkynnoh jong ka KHNAM ba ka jingsei kyrtong ka HSPDP bad UDP na North Shillong konstitwensi ka dei tang ban pynrem ia ka KHNAM, u bah Ardent u la ong ba haba pynieng kyrtong ka mut ba la pyniakhun ia u ba un jop, “Haba ngi pyniakhun , ngi pyniakhun ba un jop, haba ngi ia leh lang kata ka mut ngi la pyrkhat na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ka Alliance, kaei kaba ngi leh ka long na bynta ka jingmyntoi ka Alliance-ym ia ka HSPDP ne UDP, ai ba u paidbah ka Shillong North un ai ia ka rai, ngi la sei u kyrtong uba biang rynieng uba la biang pura ka jingnang jingstad-ka shong ha ki paidbah” ong u bah Ardent.Halor ka jingkynthoh ka KHNAM ba ka UDP ka dei ka paralok jong ka BJP ha ka NEDA bad ki don jingthmu ban ia thaw sorkar lang bad ka BJP, u bah Ardent u la ong “Ngi la kren shai ba ka jingthaw ia ka Alliance ka dei ban wanrah ia ki seng riewlum ha ka bor synshar ba ngin lait na ka jingsynshar ka Congress ne BJP, kam don jingmut ban shu kynnoh khlem da lah ban sei ia ki jingshisha, ka long kaba shu jler” u la ong.Halor ki jingkynthoh jong u bah H.S Shylla MDC ka Nongkrem ba u bah Ardent u la rem lypa, u bah Ardent u la ong “Ngam tip ka dei ka jingiathuh lypa ne dei kaei hynrei nga kwah ban ong ba ym dei ma ngi ban rai lypa ia ka rem ka jop -ka rai ka dei jong u paidbah, tang ia ka por elekshon ruh ka Election Commission kam pat buh tarik, kumno lah ban ia thuh lypa ia ka rem ka jop, wat hadhu ban da dept hep vote ruh ka eh ia ngi ban ia thuh lypa” ong u bah Ardent da kaba bynrap ba kum u nongmihkhmat paidbah bad kum u nongialam um kwah shuh ban kawang ktieh bad ia thad ha ki kotkhubor da ki ktien ki bym don nongrim “Ngim kwah shuh ban kren ia ki ktien kiba pyni ia ka jinglong khyllung khynnah hynrei ngi kwah ban pynleit jingmut kumno ba ngin kren ia ka nongrim ba ki paidbah kin shai” u la pynkut.
title: Ba phet seng u bah Reming, yn pynbeit  ka UDP-HSPDP ia ka Mawkynrew

content: Shillong, 13 Naiwieng:Ka HYC Ri-Bhoi ryngkat ka Raid Nongtung Circle ki la kynnoh ba ka sorkar Assam mynta ka la sdang ban ban klun jaka ha u pud u sam ka Meghalaya bad dang ha u bnai ba la dep ha ka 22 tarik u risaw ka sorkar Assam ka la wan jurip na ka bynta ban shna ia ka Police Out post ha Umru kaba hap hapoh ka Raid Nongtung.Haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor u bah Hercules Suting General Secretary HYC Ri-Bhoi u la ong ba ka HYC ka la leit ban ai jingthoh sha u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma kumjuh sha u CEM ka KHADC ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor katei ka jingthmu ka sorkar Assam. U la kynnoh ba ka daw ka jingnud ka sorkar Assam ka dei ka jingsngap mynthi jong ka sorkar jylla ka bym shym la leh eiei ban pyni ia ka jinglong trai jong ka ha katei ka thaiñ. Haba pynpaw ia ka jinglong trai ka Meghalaya u bah Hercules u la ong ba katei ka jaka ka dei ruh kaba ka sorkar jylla ka ju pynlong tamasa Amur Falcon.Ka HYC ka la pynrem jur ruh ia u Gau Bura ki Nepali ha katei ka shnong ha kaba u bah Hercules u la ong ba dei utei u Gau Bura ki Nepali uba ju ai khubor sha ka sorkar Assam ia ka jinglong jingman ha katei ka shnong bad dei ma u ruh uba la ai NOC bad ai jingbit na ka bynta ba ka sorkar Assam kan wan shna Police Out post.
title: Pynkhreh ka Assam ban  thaw ktem pulit ha Umru

content: Shillong, 13 Naiwieng:Ha ka 12 tarik u nohprah ka seng HSPDP kan pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah ha madan Malki naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit President rangbah ka HSPDP u la ong ba la khot ia ki paidbah na kylleng ka ri Khasi Jaintia ban ia poi sha katei ka jingialang ba ka seng HSPDP kan pynshai paidbah ia ki nongrim treikam jong ka bad kumjuh ruh ban pynshai paidbah ia ka jingiateh lok hapdeng ka HSPDP bad ka UDP ha ka elekshon MLA 2018.U bah Ardent u la ong ba la khot ruh ia katei ka jingialang namarba ha ka jingialang bah jong ka seng HSPDP (General Council) kaba la long ha u bnai ba la dep ka ym shym la khot lut ia baroh bad la bthah ba kawei ka konstitwensi kan phah briew tang 40 ngut namar ka jingkhim palat ka jaka bad bun ki dkhot jong katei ka seng ki kwah ban ioh sngew ia ka jingpynshai na ki nongialam namar ka elekshon 2018 kumta la jied ia katei ka sngi ban pynlong da ka jingialang paidbah.U bah Ardent u la ong ruh ba ha ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai ka seng HSPDP kan pynlong ia ka Workshop na ka bynta ki kyrtong jong ka ki ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 kiba don kumba 16 ne 17 ngut. Ka jingthmu jong katei ka Workshop u la ong ba ka dei ban ailad ia ki kyrtong ba kin sngewthuh shai ia ka nongrim jong katei ka seng namarba u la ong ba don ki kyrtong kiba la jop elekshon ruh kim shai ia ka nongrim jong ka Party. Ha katei ka jingiakren bad ki nongthohkhubor la donlang ki nongialam ka HSPDP ba kynthup ia u bah K.P Pangniang-MLA, u bah Grossper Ryntathiang bad kiwei pat.
title: 12 tarik u Nohprah ka jingialang  paidbah ka HSPDP ha Madan Malki

content: Shillong, 13 Naiwieng:Ka MPCC ka la tah da ka notis (pynbna) hakhmat ka ophis jongka ha Congress Bhawan kaba kynthah ia kito ki MLA bad ki nongialam kiba thmu ban phet na ka party ki dei kiba khwan myntoi hadien ba kila ioh jingmyntoi na ka party.Ki kyntien ba la thoh da ka ktien phareng ki long, “Kito kiba phet na ka party hadien ba la ioh jingmyntoi na ka party, ka dei namar ka jingmyntoi shimet jongki ym na ka bynta ka roi ka par ka jylla Meghalaya.”Ki MLA ka Congress kiban sa phet noh kumba ka paw mynta ki kynthup ia u Bah Rowell Lyngdoh (MLA Mawkyrwat), Prestone Tynsong (MLA Pynursla), Sniawbhalang Dhar (MLA Nartiang), Ngaitlang Dhar (MLA Umroi) bad u Bah PN Syiem (MLA Mawkyrwat) uba shah sospen lai snem.
title: Tah notis ka MPCC, “Kiba phet dei ki riew khwan myntoi”

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:Haba buddien ia ka jingioh jingiarap ki lanot kiba shah lynshop ha ki bor mariang ha u snem 2016 bad 2017 ka KSU Ranikor Circle ka la wad jingtip lyngba ka RTI ia ka jingioh jingiarap ki lanot kiba hap ha ka Ranikor C&RD Block. Katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh na ka ophis Deputy Commissioner South West Khasi Hills katei ka seng ka la lap ka DC ophis ka la phah jingtyrwa bad pan pisa na ka tnad Revenue and Disaster Management haduh T.92,61,600 tyngka na ka bynta ki 2721 tylli ki longïng kiba shah lynshop ha ka bor mariang ha ka u snem 2016 bad 2017 Ka la lap ruh ba don 1044 tylli ki longïng kiba dei ban ioh jingiarap bad ka ophis DC ka la pan pisa T.34,53,600 tyngka na ka bynta kitei bad haduh mynta ia kitei ki 3765 tylli ki longïng ka sorkar kam pat mang pisa haduh mynta ruh.Ka kyrwoh na u President KSU Ranikor Circle u samla Marconi Thongni ka la ong ba ki don sa 702 tylli ki longïng kiba ka ophis DC ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Branch Manager jong ka State Bank of India Mawkyrwat Branch naduh u nailur mynta u snem hynrei ki paidbah kim pat ioh ia ka pisa. Ka KSU ka la ong ba ka la leit ban ia kren bad ka Bank bad la kular ban pyllait noh shen ia ka pisa jong kitei ki 702 tylli ki longïng bad ia ka pisa yn sa phah sha ki bank account jong ki.Ka KSU ka la dawa na ka tnad Revenue and Disaster Management ba kan pyllait noh ia ka T.34,53,600 tyngka sha ki 1044 tylli ki longïng kiba ka ophis DC ka la phah sha katei ka tnad ban ai pisa. Ka kyrwoh na ka KSU ka la ong ba kan iai buddien ia katei ka bynta haduh ba ki lanot kiba shah lynshop phria , eriong kin ioh ia ka hok jong ki.
title: Na ki 4467 ïng tang 702  ïng, kiba ioh jingiarap

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:Ka 08 tarik u Naiwieng, 2017 kan long ka jingsah kynmaw ia ka Raid Nongblai, Khyrim Syiemship ha kaba u Paiem (Dr) Balajied Sing Syiem, ula wan da lade hi ban wan ai ka Sanad pynkupbor ia u Sordar ba thymmai ka Raid, u bah Batstarson Khongsni ryngkat ki nongkitkam ka Raid ha Wahlyngkhat, Raid Nongblai. Ha kane ka sngi, ki khun ki hajar na ka Raid Nongblai ki la ap naduh surok ryngkat ka ksing ka dhah ban pdiang burom ia u Syiem bad ki Basan Raid Mawlieh kynthup ia u Myntri W. Nongrum bad Lyngdoh Khynnah u bah RF Lyngdoh. La wan ban sakhi lang ruh da ki Rangbah Shnong na ki Lai Kyntoit ka Raid Nongblai, u sordar ka Raid Wahkhen bah S. Khongjirem, Rangbah Shnong Mawlieh bah S.Marbaniang bad u bah Stanly na ka Raid Nongkhlieng.U Secretary ka Raid Nongblai bah V.S. Buhphang kum u shongknor, u la pynsngew ba ka long ka burom ia ka Raid Nongblai ba ha ka sien ba nyngkong eh, u Syiem ryngkat ki Basan ka Raid Mawlieh, ki da wan hi da lade ban jngoh bad aiti Sanad ia u Sordar ka Raid. Ka Raid Nongblai kam ju kwah ban pyni ia kano kano ka kam ing sha ka pyrthei, hynrei ka iai shah bad ap ia ka lynti ban pynbeit hi hapoh ka Hima ryngkat u syiem u kmie. Dei ruh halor kane ba U Paiem, hadien bala ioh ban iashong pyrkhat lang, da kajuh ka sur ryngkat ki Basan Raid Mawlieh lem bad ki Nongkitkam jong ka Raid Nongblai baroh kawei, ula mynjur ban pyllait por khnang ban pyndep ia ka kam.U Basan ka Raid Mawlieh, Myntri W. Nongrum u la ban ba ka jingiadei hapdeng ka Raid Nongblai bad Raid Mawlieh ka ia jan bha naduh hyndai bad ki long ha syndah eh ha baroh ki liang. U la ong ba kane ka jingleh ka Raid Nongblai ha kane ka sngi ka pyni ba ka Raid Nongblai ka la nangkiew ha baroh ki liang ba bha. U ong ruh ba ka jing wan hi jong ki na ka Hima, ka pyni ia ki dak ka jingkyrmen ban nang mih – nang sei shuh shuh ia shibun kiei kiei kiba khraw ha ka it ka hima nangne sha khmat da ka jing iatreilang.Hadien kane ka sngi, la aiti ia ka Sanad sha u Sordar Batstarson Khongsni da u Paiem ryngkat ka duwai phirat bad kyrkhu kyrdoh ba un lah ban shakri bad pyndep hok ia ka kamram ba la bynshet ryngkat ka hok ka sot ha longbriew man briew ban pyndep ia ka kam katkum ka riti dustur bad ka niam ka rukom.U sordar ula ai ka jingkren sngew nguh ia baroh khamtam ia ka Dorbar Raid kaba jied ia u kum u sordar da ka jing ia beit ia ryntihlang kawei ka sur ban trei hok nabynta ka bit ka biang hapoh Raid. Kum ka jingsngew nguh, ka Raid ka la pynkup burom kyrpang ruh ia u Syiem ryngkat ki Myntri, Lyngdoh ha kane ka sngi.U Paiem Balajied Sing Syiem u la ai khublei ia ki Riew Rangbah ka Raid baroh khamtam ia U Bah Tonywell Khongshun iba ai jingshai, jing pyntngen bad pynhun mynsiem lyngba ka khana jongu, halor ka jingiadei ka Raid Nongblai bad ki Syiem. U la iathuh ba ka long ka sien nyngkong shisha ba un leit da lade hi ha shen ban pynkupbor ia ki sordar kumba ula wan mynta sha Raid Nongblai.U la pynpaw ka jing sngew kmen eh halor ka rukom jied sordar ka Raid Nongblai kaba khlem don kano kano ka jing ia pharia liang hynrei ban jied da ka monlang shi raid katkum ka riti dustur. Kane ka jingiatylli ban bud ryntih katkum ka jing pyniaid ba stad ki Long shuwa ka long ka burom ia ka Raid bad ia ka Hima. U la kyntu ruh ban nym ailad ia ki bor na bar ba kin pharia ia kane ka jingpyniaid ba stad hynrei ban iatylli bad long ka nuksa ba bha ia kiwei. Ka jing jied da ka sacret ballot shano kan ialam ia ka riti dustur ka hok longbarim. Mih ka jing iapait ar -lai liang para nong shong shnong ha kiba la bakla ban pyniaid hok halor ka riti.Ula ai ruh ki kyntien sneng ktien kraw ban bat hok la bor la ka deiti bad pyndep hok la kamram. Ryngkat ka jingnang jingstad dei ka kamram jong ngi ban niew kor bad ri sumar la ka riti dustur bad ka tem ka put. Khlem ka riti dustur kumno ngin dawa la ka hok ka jinglong tynrai kyrpang. U la kyntu ban ialeh katba lah ban pyniaid katkum ka hok, ban kren da kaba shai, bad bret shabar ia ka thok ka shukor. Ka nang ka stad baroh khlem ka tip briew tip blei kam wanrah jingsuk. Haba suk u Khun U Hajar ka long ka Pansngiat ia u Syiem. Ka Spah pyrthei kam dei kaba kongsan tam.U Paiem ula pynkut da kaba Duwai bad ia said ia thew nabynta ka Raid Nongblai ryngkat ka jing kyrkhu kyrdoh ba u kynrad hi un weng ia ki jingeh baroh. Khamtam ba ka Raid kan bit kan biang kan phuh kan phieng, kan roi kan man bha manla kawei pa kawei ka longing, kin koit kin khiah krat bha bad kin lait na kano kano ka sabuit -sakai na kylleng.
title: Hiar U Syiem Khyrim, ban ai  sanad ia U Sordar Raid Nongblai

content: Jowai, 13 Naiwieng:U Myntri ka tnad PWD ka sorkar Manipur ha ryngkat u Nalin Kohli uba dei u nongaiktien ka sorkar u Narendra Modi bad uba dei ruh u Advocate ka Supreme Court ha ryngkat ki heh ka BJP ha ka jylla ki la wan hiar mynta ka sngi sha Jowai kum shi bynta ka jingpynkreh ia ka election 2018.Ha kane ka sngi, ym duna ia ka 4000 ngut eiei ki nongtrei bad nongkyrshan jong ka BJP na ki 7 tylli ki Mandal lane Constituency ki la wan sha ka jingialang kaba la pynlong ha madan Jrisalein.U Kohli haba kren ha ka jingialang u la ong ba kane ka jingia kynduh ki nongtrei jong ka party lane kita ki Polling Booth Samelan ka long kaba nyngkong eh ha ka jylla bad shen kin sa pynlong ia kum kane ka juh ka program ha Khasi Hills bad Garo Hills.Utei u heh ka BJP u la ong ba ka sorkar Congress ha Meghalaya kam shym la pyntreikam hok ia ka pisa kaba ka la ioh na Delhi. Ka sorkar ka la synshar 10 snem kynthih hynrei ka jylla ka dang don shibun ki jingduna naduh ki surok, ki skul college bad wad ki jaka ai jingsumar.“Ka Congress kadei kaba bamsap tam ym tang ha kane ka jylla hynrei ha ka ri hi baroh kawei. U Dr. Mukul Sangma u Chief Minister ka jylla u la don hapdeng ka jingsheptieng bad syier mynsiem namar ba u la iohi ba ka BJP ka la nangkiew nangkiew ha kane ka jylla”, la ong u Kohli.Haba kren halor ka jingkhang tih dewiong, u la kop ban pynlait ia kane na ka jingkhang jong ka NGT hapoh 7 bad 8 bnai lada ki paidbah ki ai ka jingiatreilang bad lada ka party ka wan ha ka bor ha kane ka jylla.U Myntri ka sorkar Manipur, u Bishwajit Singh u la ong ba ka sorkar Congress ka la synshar 15 snem ha Manipur bad kam shym la lah ban wanrah ia ka roi ka par, hynrei mynta hadien ba ka BJP ka la jop 21 ngut bad ka la ioh ban ialam ia ka jingsynshar ki paidbah katei ka jylla ki la sdang ban iohi ia ki jingkylla ha ka liang ka roi ka par.U la ong ba ka party BJP ka long kaba pher bha namar ka dei ka party kaba shakri ia ki paidbah katba ka Congress kan dei kaba synshar donbor.U la ong ba ka lynti rel ka dei kawei kaba donkam tam bad ka sorkar ka India ka la rai ban pyniasoh ia ki lynti rel ha ka jylla Manipur bad ka la mang ruh 22 klur na ka bynta ban pynbha ia ki surok ha katei ka jylla.U la ong ba ka ha ki snem ba ladep, ka Manipur ka long kum ka Meghalaya, kam ju don uwei ruh u MLA ka BJP bad mynta ka la kiew kyndit shaduh 21 ngut. Bad u la khmih lynti ba ha Meghalaya ruh da ka jingtrei shitom ki dkhot ki Mandal bapher bapher ka BJP kan sa ioh ban synshar ha Meghalaya.
title: Hiar u myntri ka Manipur bad  U Kohli sha Jowai ban ialap election

content: Shillong, 13 Naiwieng:La pynlong mynta ka sngi, ia ka jingrah plakad bad pynher lama iong, da ki trai trok ha khmat ka Star Cement kompeni, ha Lumshnong.Kumba 200ngut ki dkhot jong ka Joint Action Committee On Indege-nous People Economic Right (JACIPER), ki la ia leit mynta ka sngi sha Lumshnong, ban pynpaw pyrshah halor ka jing bym ioh kit mar, ki trok trai Jylla, na ki karkhana dewbilat bad ha kaba ki dawa ruh, ba dei ban pynkiew ia ka bai kit mar, ia ki trok, katba kum ka dor, ba la buh da ka sorkar Jylla, kaba la pyntreikam naduh ka 22tarik Nailur 2005, kaba long T.1.25 shi kwintal ka mar, na ka bynta shi kilometre.Ha katei ka jingleit pynpaw pyrshah, ki dkhot jong ka JECIPER ki la ia kynduh bad ki nongialam jong ka All Jaintia Cement Factory Association, ha ka jaka trei kam jong ka Star Cement, ha kaba ki la pan por shiphew sngi, ban rai halor ki jingdawa jong katei ka seng. Ha kajuh ka por, ki trai trok, ki mynjur, ia ka jingbuh por jong ki karkhana dewbilat, tangba ki dawa ruh ba dei ban sangeh shwa ka jingkit dewbilat, ha kine ki shiphew sngi, lane kat bym pat sha ka jing ia beit.U bah Handle Mukhim, Chairman ka JACIPER, u iathuh ba ka jing ia rah lama iong lem bad ki plakad, ka la sdang naduh ka por 2baje nohsngi bad la khot ban iakren, ha ka por 3.15 nohsngi bad ka jing iakren, ka kut noh ha ka por 4baje nohsngi.Ha katei ka Joint Action Committee on Indigenous People Economic Rights, kiba don lang ki kynthup ia ka JHTOA, MCVU, KSU JHDU, JSU CB, HYC-JHD, JNCCB, ka AJSUCB bad ka HYC East Jaintia Hills.
title: Tur ki trai trok sha karkhana  dewbilat ha Lumshnong

content: Shillong, 13 Naiwieng:Ha kine ki sngi u Rupang u la leit jngoh ia katto katne ki longïng kiba la ioh ia ka skhim ïng baduk ka Pradhan Mantri Awaas Yojana -Gramin kaba T.1,30,000 tyngka kiba don hapoh ka jingpeit ka Mylliem C&RD Block bad la lap ba ka jingshna ia ka ïng jong ki ka shu sah khongreng khlem lah pyndep watla ka por ban pyndep katkum ki kyndon ha ka Work Order ka la dei. La ia kren bad ki nongioh jingmyntoi ki la iathuh ba ki ioh tang ia ka 1st Installment kaba T.52 hajar tyngka hadien katei kim ioh pisa shuh bad haba ki leit mih sha Block la jubab ia ki bym don pisa shuh.U Rupang u la ia kren lyngba ka telephone bad u Block Development Officer ( BDO) jong ka Mylliem C&RD Block u bah P.Passah ban wad jingtip halor katei ka jingsah khongreng ki ïng baduh. U bah Passah u la ong ba kane ka la jia ym tang ha Mylliem C&RD Block hynrei ka la jia ruh ha baroh kawei ka District bad ka daw ka long bym poi pisa na ka sorkar pdeng. Lah ban kdew ba hapoh Mylliem Block dang shen u BDO u la sam ia ka Work order ing baduk kaba haduh 123 tylli ki longing kiba ioh jingmyntoi.Lah ruh ban kdew ba ha katei ka jingleit jngoh u Rupang ha kawei ka shnong ha Mawklot ki nongioh jingmyntoi ki la pynpaw ia ka jingeh ba ki ia kynduh ba ki hap ban sah khapngiah ha i ing trep namarba ki la pynpra ia ka ing barim ban shna ing thymmai lyngba ka skhim ba duk.
title: “Ym poi pisa na ka sorkar pdeng”  ong u BDO bym ioh pisa ki ïng baduk

content: Shillong, 13 Naiwieng:Ki pulit ki la kem haduh 55 tylli ki trok kit dewiong na Lumshnong kiba pynkheiñ ia ka hukum ka NGT. Ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai la kem 12 tylli, ha ka 10 tarik pat la kem 43 tylli. Ha katei ka jingjia baroh ki nongniah ki la phet krad bad la ioh bat tang ki kali.Ha ka 9 tarik pat ki pulit ki la ioh kem sa 2 tylli ki trok kit dewiong na Lumshnong kiba don ia u nombar AS-01CC-6413 ba la niah da u Md. Jiaur Ali bad ka trok ba don ia u nombar AS-11BC-6895. Ha kawei pat ka jingjia ha ka 10 tarik ha ka por 7:30 baje mynmiet ki pulit ki la ioh kem ia kawei ka trok kit dewiong kaba don ia u nombar ML-05G 8658 na Toll Plaza-Ri-Bhoi District.
title: Shah kem 57 tylli ki trok dewiong

content: Shillong, 15 Naiwieng:Sa katto katne bnai ba ka jylla kan leit sha ka jingjied ia ki MLA thymmai, u Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) ka jylla u Bah Frederick R Kharkongor u la kwah ban pynshai paidbah ba ka vote jongno jongno, ka dei kaba kordor tam bad ym dei ban die noh ia ka ha ka pisa.“Wat die ia ka vote jong phi ha ka elekshon, ka dei kaba kordor tam”, la ong u Bah Frederick haba iakren mynta ka sngi.Ban pynsngewthuh kham bha ia kane bad ban khring ia ki briew kiba la kot 18 snem ban pynrung kyrteng, u CEO u la ong ba ka tnad elekshon ka la pynlong shaid shaid mynta ka jingialap paidbah ha kylleng ki jaka khamtam sha nongkyndong.“Ngi la pynlong ia ki jingialehkai surok, ki drama, ki jingialap kylleng ki jaka ba kham kongsan sha nongkyndong ruh ban pynshai ia ki paidbah shaphang ka hok ba ki dei ban jied nongmihkhmat”, la ong u CEO.U la iathuh ba ka jingpynrung kyrteng khamtam ia kiba dang kot 18 snem ka dang iaid shaid shaid mynta shwa u Nohprah mynta u snem.“Ngi la buh thong ba ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote ha ka jylla kam duna ia ka 18 lak shwa ban wan ka elekshon”, la ong u bah Frederick.Haduh mynta ki don 17 lak ngut tam ki nongthep vote ha ka jylla bad ka elekshon ka la khmih lynti ba haduh ban kut kane ka snem, kin kot sha ka 18 lak ngut tam.Ym tang ka jingpynrung kyrteng ia kiba dang samla, hynrei u CEO u la ong ba ka tnad elekshon ka la pynlong ruh ia ka jingpynshai paidbah shaphang kumno ba kin nang ban pyndonkam ia ki mashin thep vote (EVM) bad ki VVPAT.Ha kawei ka liang, u la ong ba ka jingpynrung kyrteng nongthep vote ia ki briew kam dei kaba shu pdiang pathar hynrei ka iaid katkum ki kyndon bad ki sakhi satar bad ki bym biang ki kot ki sla ban pynshisha kum ki nong-India kim lah ban rung ha ka thup kyrteng ki nongthep vote.U CEO u la iathuh ruh ba ki briew ka elekshon ki la lap teng ia kiba thmu ban pyrshang pynrung kyrteng khlem da la lah ban pynshisha ia ka jinglong jongki bad ki la shah weng noh bad kane ka jia ha thain Garo Hills.“Ki don katto katne ki khep ba ngi la lap ia ki briew ba thmu ban pynrung kyrteng khlem lah ban pynshisha ha thain Garo Hills bad ngi la weng noh ia ki”, la ong u CEO.U la iathuh ruh ba ki briew na ka election commission na Delhi kin sa wan jngoh ia ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka taiew ban kut mynta u bnai ban pynkhreh ia ka jingpynlong ia ka elekshon ha ka jylla lashem snem.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Frederick, ka jingialang ka election commission ka la iakren ruh ha kaba iadei ka jingpyndonkam ia ki mashin EVM, VVPAT bad kiwei ki mat ba kongsan.U la ong ba ka Election Commission of India ka la buh lai tylli ki bynta kynthup ka Sugam kaban peit ia ka jingai permishon, ka Suvidha ban ai permishon ia ki seng sain pyrthei ban pynlong jingialang bad kiwei ki jingdonkam ha ka elekshon bad ka Samadhan ban peit bad sngap ia ki jingeh jong ki paidbah khamtam kiba iadei bad ka ain pyniaid elekshon ne ka model code.U la ong ba kan don ka jingai jinghikai ruh ia ki ophisar jong ki jylla ban pynlong ia ka elekshon kumno ban pyniaid ia ka elekshon.
title: Ka jingpynrung kyrteng nongthep  vote kam dei ba shu leh pathar

content: Shillong, 6 Naiwieng:Ka ishu Sohra ka la pyniatyngkhuh bad ka pynmih ka jingiapher jingmut hapdeng ki nongialam ka BJP ha kane ka jylla. Katkum ki tyllong khubor ba la iohlum la ong ba u bah Shibun Lyngdoh President rangbah ka BJP, u don ha ka liang jong ka Mandal kaba mynta kaba don sha ka liang u bah Bantei Rumnong katba kawei pat ka kynhun jong ki nongialam ka don sh akawei pat ka liang kaba ialam da u Dr.P.W Khongjee.La ong ba dei na katei ka daw ba ka jingiapher jingmut ka la mih hapdeng ka BJP ha kane ka jylla ha kaba u bah Shibun, u la ong ba ka jingwan jong u Nalin Kohli dei ka jingwan kaba khlem ka jingtip jong ka Party katba kiwei pat ki nongiala m ki ong ba la Party ka don jingtip bha bad ka la bthah ia baroh ki nongkitkam jong ka ban ia donlang ha katei ka sngi.Haba ia kren bad u nongaiktien ka seng BJP u bah J.A Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingwan u Nalin Kohli bad u Alphons ka dei kaba shu wan kynsan ban peit ka jinglong jingman ka seng BJP ha Sohra hynrei ka Party ka tip bha ia kata. Halor ka jingkynnoh ki BJP na Sohra u ba U Dr.Khongjee um dei u dkhot jong ka BJP u bah Lyngdoh u la ong, “Ngi tip bha ba u Dr.Khongjee u dei u dkhot ba pura jong ka BJP, ha ka BJP phi lah ban rung dkhot da ka phone Call lane SMS ne Miss Call” u la ong.Kiwei pat ki tyllong khubor ki la iathuh ba nalor katei ka mat ka la don sa kiwei pat ki mat kiba ia kynad hapoh ka seng BJP ha kane ka jylla bad katei ka jingiakynad ka la poi sha u pud kaba lah ruh ban mih ka jingbujli nongialam thymmai ha kaba yn bujli noh da uwei pat u nongialam ha ka ha jaka u bah Shibun Lyngdoh. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ia ka kam President lah ban shimti noh da u bah J.A Lyngdoh ha kaba ia ki nongbud jong u bah Shibun kum u bah David Kharsati, yn thung noh kum ki nongialam ba kham hakhmat.
title: Na ka ishu Sohra yn ia pait ka BJP, lah ban bujli President

content: Shillong, 06 Naiwieng:U MLA ka South Shillong u bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ther ia kane ka sorkar ba ialam da ka Congress da kaba kynnoh ba ki kam tamasa kim nym lah ban kyntiew ia ka jylla bad ki samla.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, u bah Paul u la ong, “ka tamasa cherry blossom, ka tamasa iaput iatem kam nym lah da lei lei ban kyntiew ia ki samla bad ka jylla”.Ula bynrap, “ka jylla bad ki samla ka kiew lyngba ki kam ban siandur ia ka lawei jongki”.U Bah Paul u la ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya kan kiew kan san lyngba ka jingkhlain jong ki briew bad ka spah ba ka don ban pyndonkam hok.“Ka dei ka kam beain ban ialehkai ia ka lawei jong ka jylla da ki kam bym ler kam eiei”, la ong u bah Paul.Lah ban kdew ba ka sorkar jylla dang shen, ka la pynlong ia ka tamasa kaba shi taiew kynthih kaba ai kyrteng ka 18 degree bad mynta ka la pynkhreh ban pynlong sa ia ka tamasa syntiew dieng ne cherry blossom.Katkum ka jingtip, ka tnad khlaw ka jylla ka la pynlut haduh kumba 80 lak na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka tamasa syntiew dieng hynrei bun na kine ki dieng kiba khlem syntiew khlem sla shuh namar ba ki la hap lut. Ki don ruh sa kiwei ki tnad ki ban pynlut ia kane ka tamsa.
title: Ki kam tamasa kim lah ban kyntiew  ia ka Meghalaya, ong u bah Paul

content: Shillong, 06 Naiwieng:Ki nongthoh khubor ka nongbah Shillong ki la ujor sha u Deputty Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills u Bah Peter S Dkhar halor ka jingphet jyndat ka kompeni Reliance Communications Ltd, khlem da pyntip shwa ne ailad ia ki paidbah ka jylla.Ha ka jingujor ki nongthoh khubor ki la ong ba kane ka kompeni, ka la pynthut ia ka network naduh ka 25 tarik Risaw haduh mynta bad ka ophis jongka, ruh la shu khang dam khlem da pyntip paidbah shwa ban leh ia kane.Baroh ki nongpyndonkam da kane ka kompeni naduh kiba leh pre-paid bad post-paid ki la sah ha ka lyngngoh ngain ia kane ka jingleh ka kompeni.Halor kane, la kyrpad ia u DC ba un tuklar ban hukum ba kane ka kompeni ka dei ban siew bailutksan ia ki nongpyndonkam namar ka jingleh bym suidniew jongka ia ki paidbah.
title: Ujor ki nongthoh khubor ha u  DC, ba phet jyndat ka Reliance

content: Shillong, 6 Naiwieng:Ki trai hotel bapher, ha ka nongbah Shillong, ki la rai ban pyniaid iew noh, da ka doh, ban shalan da ki trai jylla, ha ki jingdonkam jongki, ha kaba shet ba tiew bad ai bam ai sa, ia ki nongbam, kiba sah ha ki hotel jongki.Katei ka rai, ka mih ha ka jing ia kynduh, ba la pynbeit da ka Seng FKJGP Sengkmie lyngba ka Socio Economic Movement, kaba kyrsiew thiah ia ki paradoh para snam ha kaba iadei bad ka ioh ka kot lyngba ka Livestock Farming Committee ka la trei shitom bad iaid shakhmat ban pyntyllun ia kane ka thong, kaba la pynkha ha ka 11tarik Iaiong 2017 ban iarap ban btin lynti ia ki paradoh para snam ha kaba iadei bad ki kam ri jingri ha ka jylla baroh kawei.Katei ka dei ka jing ia kynduh, ba la pynlong da ka Seng FKJGP Central Body bad ki trai jong ki Hotel jong ka jylla bapher bapher ha ka 3tarik Naiwieng 2017 ha shillong Club kiba kynthup naduh ka Hotel Pine Wood, City Hut Dhaba, Bamboo Hut, Polo Towers, Yalana Hotel, Heritage Club, Heritage Royal, Shillong Club, Pegasus, Blue Inn Berries bad kiwei kiwei de, ki la rai da kawei ka sur ban snoh kti lang da kaba yn pyniaid iew noh ha ki jingdonkam bapher bapher jongki da ka doh(Poultry) ki ban shalan hi noh da ki trai jylla. Kane ka thong, ka dei thik ban kyntiew iaka ioh ka kot ka jylla bad ruh ka kabu plié lad plié lynti ia ki ba bun ki riew shimet ki paradoh parasnam kiba im ja naka kam ri jingri. Ha katei ka jingialang la iadon ryngkat ruh ki nongialam ka Sengkmie naduh u President Bah Wellbirth Rani, General Secretary Bah Dundee Cliff Khongsit, Chairman ka Livestock Farming Committee Bah Marbud Dkhar, Dr. Marco Mitri bad kiwei de ki dkhot ka Seng.
title: Mynjur ki trai hotel, ban pynbiang  da ka doh ba pynmih ki trai Jylla

content: Shillong, 2 Naiwieng:Hadien ba ki lad khubor, ki pynpaw ba U Ma Lahkmen Rymbai, uba dei U President jong ka West Jaintia Hills District Congress Committee, un lah ban nym iakhun shuh, na ka tiket Congress, ha ka elekshon 2018, ka la mih sa kawei pat ka kutlad ia katei ka seng, ha kaba U Ma RC Laloo, ula rai ban nym ialeh elekshon shuh ha ka sien ka ban wan.Ka West Jaintia Hills, ka don san tylli ki Constituency bad na kitei, la iathuh ba ka dei tang ka Jowai, Nartiang bad ka Sutnga, kiba la shai ki kandidet jongki, ha kaba ka Jowai, un iakhun U Ma Andrew Shullai, uba dei ruh U Chief Executive Member jong ka Jaintia District Council, ka Nartiang, un iakhun U bah Jopthiaw Lyngdoh bad ka Sutnga, un iakhun U Ma Shitlang Pale. Na bynta ka Shangpung Nangbah, ki don ki khubor, kiba iathuh ba U Ma Comingone Ymbon, un lah ban ialeh na ka tiket Congress, hynrei ki don pat kiba kam, ba un lah ban ialeh, na kawei pat ka seng sain pyrthei.Haduh mynta, ka Congress, kam pat don ia ki kandidet kiba thikna na ki ar tylli ki Constituency ka East Jaintia Hills, ka Mookaiaw bad ka Khliehriat Constituency, ha kaba na Mookaiaw, la mihkhmat da U Ma Robinus Syngkon bad ka Khliehriat, la mihkhmat da U Ma Justin Dkhar.Na ka liang jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (I), ka la buh ba ki Block Congress, ki dei ban phah ia ki kyrteng jong ki kandidet, ha shwa ka 31tarik Risaw 2017, hynrei, la sngewthuh ba ki don ki Constituency ha Jaintia Hills, ki bym pat pynpoi ia ki kyrteng jong ki kandidet sha ki District Committee, ba kynthup ia ka Amlarem, kaba dei ka Constituency jong U Ma Lahkmen Rymbui, uba dei U President jong ka West Jaintia District Congress Committee (I).
title: Ym pat don kandidet ka Congress  na Khliehriat, Mookaiaw

content: Shillong, 2 Naiwieng:U Pastor PBM Basaiawmoit, ula thoh mynta ka sngi sha U Mukul Sangma, myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya, ha kaba ula ai jingiaroh, halor ka nongrim jongu, ba ym dei ban pyntreikam naphang ia u aadhar number.U Pastor, ula thoh shuh shuh, ba u sngewkmen shi katdei, ba U Mukul hi ialade ruh, um pat shym la treh ban shondur aadhar bad u khmih lynti, ba ka jing iatrei lang jongki arngut bad u myntri rangbah ka Assam, kan iarap ban pyllait ia ka dong shatei lam mihngi, na ka jingthmu ka sorkar India, ban pyniaid shakhmat ia ka jingshondur aadhar.U Pastor, u kren diaw mynsiem shuh shuh, ba ki nongtrei sorkar Jylla, lem bad ki skul pule jong ka sorkar lane jong ki riew shimet, ki mane dem ialade, na ka bynta ban pyniaid shakhmat ia ka jing pynrung kyrteng aadhar, wat la ka Supreme Court, ka la kren shai, ba katei ka shong ha ka jingsngew bit shimet jong u briew, na ka bynta katei ka jing pynrung kyrteng aadhar.
title: Mane dem ki nongtrei sorkar ia u aadhar, ong U PBM

content: Shillong, 2 Naiwieng:“Ka long ka jingbakla ba khraw ban pyn ia syriem ialade bad ki briew jong ka Bible; kane ka pyni ba ngim niewkor ne burom ia ki jingthoh ha ka ktien U Blei(Bible)” ong U bah HS Shylla, MDC ka Nongkrem, haba kynthoh halor ki jingkynnoh jong ki MDC ka PDF pyrshah ia u, ba u dei U Judas, uba la shet kylla ia ka PDF.U Bah Shylla, u ong shuh shuh, ba ki MDC jong ka PDF, ki dei baroh ki nongphet seng, ha kaba ula pyni ba ki don 4 ngut na ka Congress, 4 na ka HSPDP, 1 na ka UDP, 2 na ka KHNAM, 1 Independent. Ha ka 30 tarik Nailur, 2017 ka PDF ka pdiang burom ia ki nongphet seng, da ka burom kaba khraw bad katei ka pyni, ba ka PDF ka mynjur bad ka pynshlur ia ka jingphet seng. “Kaba pher bad phylla ka long ba ka PDF ka pynrem jur ia ka jingphet-seng jong nga da ki kyntien kiba ym dei ban pyndonkam syndon kumba la kdew haneng”.U Bah Shylla, ula ong shuh shuh, ba kumba ka long haduh mynta ba PDF ka ia hap bha bad kine ki kyntien “Proper Defectors Front” lane “Perfect Defectors Front” katba ki 11 ngut ki MDC phet-seng ki dang don bad ka, kumta kam don hok kam don don nongrim ban pynrem ia ka jingphet-seng jongno jongno ruh wat tang da ki kyntien kiba jem ruh namar ka PDF ka dei ka nuksa jong ka jingphet-seng. “Kan bha ruh shibun ia ki katto katne ngut ki MDC jong ka PDF ba kin kham tyngkai ia ki kyntien ba ki kren namar ka pynpaw tang ia ka jingbieit jong ki. Kumba ka long bieit ia ka shymprong kmie ban mai ia ki khun ba ki kynran da dien. “Nga kwah ban pynkynmaw hangne ba ka jingmih jong nga na ka PDF ka dei da ka rai jong ka Executive Committee jong ki 100 ngut tam ki dkhot na kylleng ka Nongkrem Constituency kaba la long ha ka janmiet jong 24 tarik Risaw 2017 ha ophis treikam ha Laitkor, kata, ba kam dei ka rai shimet jong nga bad ba yn pynskhem ia kane ka rai da ka general meeting ka ban long ha ka 6 tarik Naiwieng, 2017 ha Lad Nongkrem por 7.00 janmiet” pynkut ka khubor.
title: “Ka long ka jingbakla ban pyn ia syriem  ialade bad ki briew jong ka Bible”

content: Shillong, 2 Naiwieng:Hadien ka jingiathuh u myntri rangbah ka jylla u bah Dr.Mukul Sangma sha ki nongthohkhubor ba um don Aadhaar mynta pat sa u Chief Executive Member ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem u la ong ba ma u ruh um pat don Aadhaar nombar. “Nga ruh ngam pat don Aadhaar, ngam pat da sngew donkam palat ban leh” u la ong haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor shaphang ka jingkulmar jingmut ki paidbah ka jylla ia u Aadhaar nombar ha kine ki sngi.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u bah Pynshngaiñ, u la ong ba ka District Council kan sa thoh sha ka sorkar pdeng halor katei ka bynta ba ha Meghalaya ki paidbah kim pat kwah, hynrei shuwa ia kane u la ong ba un sa lum shuwa ia ki paidbah lyngba ki Khlieh Nongsynshar, ki Kur, ki shnong ban pan ia ka jingmut na ki. U la kynthah ia ka sorkar jylla namar ka jingkhohreh pyntreikam Aadhaar ha kane ka jylla u la ong ba baroh dei na ka daw ka jingkheiñsting bad ka jingmyn kitkhlieh ka sorkar.“Ka sorkar ka khlem pan ia ka jingmut ki paidbah, ka khlem wanrah ia katei ka bynta sha ki paidbah hynrei la shu pyntreikam beit ia ka hukum khle mda pan jingmut, ka paw shai ba kane ka sorkar kam dei ka sorkar u paidbah, kam kheiñ briew ia ki paidbah, ka dei ka jingbym kitkhlieh ki nongialam. Lada ka sorkar ka sngewkhia na ka bynta u paidbah balei kam thoh sha ka sorkar pdeng bym long ban pyntreikam Aadhaar hangne” u la ong.U CEM u la ong ruh ba dei na ka jingkheiñ sting ka sorkar ba ki shnong ki thaw ki hap ban tynruh ia u paidbah ban leh Aadhaar namar la pyntieng ba lada ym leh kin duh ia ki jingmyntoi ba ki dei ban ioh, “U myntri rangbah ialade u ong ba um don Aadhaar, sngewlyngngoh ba u khlieh ka jylla um don Aadhaar u hukum pat ia ki tnad sorkar pat kiba hap ha ka jingpeit jong u ban pynbor ia ki paidbah ban leh Aadhaar” u la ong.Haba kren shuh shuh halor u Aadhaar u CEM u la ong ba kumba long kiwei pat ki ri la ha Europe ne Amerika la iada kyrpang ia ki jaitbynriew rit paid da kaba bud ia ka nongrim jong ka Free, Prior and Informed Consent (FPIC). U ong ba ha kane ka jylla ruh kaba dei ka jaka ki riewlum kaba la iada kyrpang da ka 6th Schedule ka sorkar kam lah ban pyntreikam ia u Aadhaar khlem da bud ia ka nongrim jong ka FPIC. “Hynrei hangne la pynsted bad khohreh ban pyntreikam kaba long pyrshah ia ka hok ki rit paid kiba shong basah ha ki Schedule Areas, ia ngi la iada kyrpang da ka 6th Schedule hynrei ka sorkar ka khlem ieng ha ka nongrim jong ka FPIC” u la ong.Katkum ka FPIC ai ia ka hok ia ki rit paid ba khlem ka jingmynjur jong ki lane khlem ka mon jong ki ka sorkar kam lah ban pyntreikam ia kano kano ka project lane kiwei pat ki bynta kiba long pyrshah ia ka riti dustur lane ka jinglong tynrai jong ki bad ka dei ruh ka hok ba la ailad ia ki ban shim ia ka rai ha ka mon lajong. Hynrei hangne u CEM u la ong ba la shu pyntreikam beit khlem da ia syllok bad ki paidbah kiba hap hapoh ka jingpeit ka 6th Schedule.
title: “Ngam don Aadhaar, u MR ruh um  don, ki tnad sorkar pat ki pynbor”

content: Nongpoh, 03 Naiwieng:Ka confederation of Ri Bhoi People (CoRP) Sengkmie, lyngba u Evannassar Shylla u ba dei u Asst-Secretary ka CORP Sengkmie, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka ha ka jingjia kaba la jia ha ka 25 Tarik u Risaw, ha kaba u Kba jong ki nongrep uba la kot da ki spah mon tam ula sha pynjulor noh ha ki Hati khlaw ha ka Shnong Wah Umbla kaba don hajan Umsiang ka Raid Maiong Ri Bhoi District.Ki Nongrep kiba la shah ktah ha katei ka jingwan pynjulor da ka kynhun ki Hati, ki kynthup ia u Bah Planing Pator, Enterfield Mangu, u Bah Speaker Mangu lem kiwei kiwei ki nongrep ba marjan ha katei ka Shnong.Ha ka kyrwoh, u Bah. E.Shylla u la pynpaw shuh shuh ia ka jingsngew khia naka bynta kitei ki nongrep kiba shah ktah ha katei ka apot, namar ka jingpynlut por bad trei shitom jongki na ka Rep na ka bynta ban pyndap ha iing ha sem bad ia ki khun ki kti bad kiwei de ki jingdonkam ha iing ki la shu sepei noh tang namar ka jingwan pynjulor da ki Hati khlaw.Kumta na ka liang ka CORP Sengkmie, ka kyrpad jur ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba kan shimkhia ban leh eiei da kino kino ki lad jingiarap na ka bynta kitei ki nongrep kiba la duh noh ia u Kba jong ki tang namar ha jingshah pynjulor ha ki Hati khaw bad ha kajuh ka por ki la kyrpad ruh ia ka Wildlife ba kin peitngor lem ia kiba kum kitei ki jait jingjia ha baroh sawdong ki jaka ki ba shaid jia khah khah namar kum kine ki jingjia kan ktah shibun iaki nongrep. Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh khubor ba la pynlait da u Bah. Evannassar Shylla.
title: Pynjulor ki Hati khlaw  ia u Kba, hajan Umsiang

content: Shillong, 2 Naiwieng:Ka Meghalaya High Court mynta ka sngi ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ba ka jingthungkam nonghikai LP skul ha ki skul sorkar ha ka jylla kaba la leh ha u snem 2009, ka dei kaba bakla bad ka bym shongnia haei haei ruh bad ka la pyndam ia baroh ka jingthung ia ki nonghikai baroh.Hynrei ka ailad ia kito kiba pass da kaba hok, ba kin bteng shwa ha ki kam hikai jongki shipor haduh ban pynbeit da kumwei pat.Ha ka jingpynmih hukum hynne ka sngi, U Chief Justice Dinesh Maheshwari bad u Justice Ved Prakash Vaish ka High Court ka la ong ba ka jingthung kam nonghikai katkum ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih ha ka 10.12.2008, ba pynmih da u Deputy Inspector of Schools ka dei kaba thmu ia ka bym dei ha ki jaka ialeh eksamin kynthup ha Shillong Sadar, Jowai, Amlarem, Tura bad Dadengre Centre.“Ka jingthung kam la pyndam baroh lait noh tang kito kiba la pass da kaba lynti, la ailad ba kin bteng shwa ia ka kam haduh ban pynbna da ka jingjied kaba thymmai bad ym dei ban khein iaka rta jongki hadien ba la khot biang ka jingpynbna ba thymmai”, la ong ka High Court.Ka High Court ka la pyndam baroh kito ki kandidet kiba la shah thung ha ki san tylli ki jaka ialeh eksamin la ki dei kiba la thung pura ne shah thung shipor da ki politishian ne kiba shu pyndap sia lieh ruh kumjuh.Ka la ong ba ia kito ki kandidet kiba la lap ba shu pyndam sia lieh katkum ka jinglap ka CBI bad ka High Level Scrutiny Committee (HLSC) ha Shillong Sadar, Jowai, Amlarem, Tura bad Dadenggre centre, ki lah ban leit phah jingthoh sha u Chief Secretary hapoh lai phew sngi lada ki kwah ban iassaid ba kim dei kiba shah tah sia lieh.U Chief Secretary un sa bishar ia ka jingthoh jongki ban kynthup lai ngut ki dkhot bad u dkhot u dei ban long u MCS u bym don dak iong bad uwei u dei ban long na ka Central lane ka State Educational Institution lane ka University.Ka komiti kan shim ia ka rai ia ka jingthoh jingkyrpad ki candidate hapoh hynriew phew sngi bad lada ka komiti ka pdiang ba u ne ka kandidet kim dei kiba shah tah sialieh, ka lah ban ailad ba kin iashim bynta ha ka jingialeh eksamin kaba thymmai bad kiwei kiba khlem shah tah sialieh. Hynrei ka dei ban shai ba lada ka komiti ka shem ba ki dei kiba shah tah sia lieh, kum kita ki kandidet kin sa duh ka lad ban iakhun ia kino kino ki kam sorkar baroh shi jingim bad dei ban shain kuna ia ki T. 50,000/- (sanphew hajar) bad ia ka pisa dei ban thep ha ka State Disaster Management Fund.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jaka ialeh eksamin lait noh ka Shillong Sadar, Jowai, Amlarem, Tura bad Dadengre la bthah ba ka CBI kan sa pynlong ka jingtohkit bad ka dei ban buh kyrpang ia kiba tah sia lieh bad kiba khuid bad dei ban aiti ia ka kaiphod hapoh hynriew bnai sha u Chief Secretary.Baroh ki kaiphod jingtohkit jong ki pulit dei ban ai lut sha ka CBI hapoh ar taiew.Mar aiti ka CBI ia ka kaiphod, kan dei ka kamram u Chief Secretary ban leh lyngba kane ka komiti ban eksamin ia ka kaiphod ka CBI bad kan phah sha ka sorkar hapoh lai bnai. Ka Kashari ka la ong ba lada lap ba ka don ka jingtuklar ki MLA ne ki ophisar ne kino kino, dei ban pyndam baroh ka jingthungkam ha kum kita ki jaka ne centre bad ka sorkar kan dei ban leh ia kaba donkam.Hynrei lada lap ba kam don kano kano ka jingtuklar ki MLA, ne kino kino ia ka kaiphod lah ban pdiang.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Meghalaya High Court ka la pynmih ia ka hukum mynta ka sngi da kaba pyndap noh ia baroh ki nonghikai skul ba la shah thung da kaba shu leh tuh ne pyndam sia lieh ha ki kam nonghikai ha LP Skul sorkar ha ka jylla. Hynrei ia shipor, ia kito ki nonghikai kiba la lap ba ki biang ki mark ne bym shym la tah sialieh katkum ka jinglap ka CBI, dei ban pynneh shwa haduh ban da pynmih da kumwei pat.Ha ka jingpynbna ia ka hukum mynta ka sngi, ka High Court ka la bthah ruh ba ia ka jingtohkit baroh dei ban shimti da ka CBI ym shuh da ki pulit ka jylla bad dei ban pyndep ia ka jingtohkit hapoh hynriew bnai.Ka High Court ka la hukum ruh ba ka mukotduma pyrshah ia u Director barim ka Elementary and Mass Education u JD Sangma kan bteng.Lah ban kdew ba kumba 200 ngut ki nonghikai ki la shah thung kam beain ha ki skul LP ha ka jylla da kaba pyndam ia ki mark jongki da ka sialieh bad ia kine ki nonghikai la leh ha ka por ba long myntri ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ha u snem 2009 lyngba ka jingphah jingthoh ki MLA bad ki myntri sorkar bapher bapher.Ka CBI ka la pynmih kyrteng ia ka myntri tnad pule puthi ha katei ka por, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad kiwei ba ki donkti ha kaban pyndam sia lieh ia ki mark jong ki kandidet ba pass ia ka eksamin ban pynpass pat ia kiba phiel.Kane ka HLSC ka la bishar ia ki kot ki sla na ki san tylli ki jaka ialeh eksamin kynthup ha Tura, Dadenggre, Shillong, Jowai bad Amlarem. Katkum ka kaiphod, ki don 268 kiba thung ha ki san tylli ki centre bad 101 ngut kiba biang ne pass hok.Ki kandidet kiba thung sialieh ha Tura ki long 23, Dadenggre 54, Shillong 60, Amlarem 38 bad ha Jowai 93 ngut. Ka HLSC ka la ong ba ki mark kiba ai ha ka interbiw ka long lymmuh lymmain khlem da bud ia ki kyndon ka sorkar katkum ka jingpynbna kaba pynmih ha ka 24 tarik Naiwieng, 2008.
title: Pyndam ka High Court ia baroh  ki nonghikai ba thung sia lieh

content: Shillong, 03 Naiwieng:Ka phlim Khasi kaba kyrteng ka Haban Tony ka la khring haduh 11 hajar ngut tam ki paidbah nongpeit ha kine ki shi taiew kynthih kaba dang iaid mynta ha Bijou Cinema Hall, Shillong.U Director kane ka phlim u Bah Daniel Nongrum haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u la iathuh ba katkum ka jingsngew jongu, ka daw ka jinglah jong kane ka phlim Khasi ban khring ia ki nongpeitkai ka dei namar ba la shna ia kane ka phlim ha ka rukom kaba juk bad ka jingjia kane ka juk mynta.U la ong ba ka jingmut jong kane ka phlim, ka dei hapdeng ar ngut ki shipara ba kha synrap, u Haban bad u Tony. “Nga sngew ba ka daw ka jingkhring jongka ia ki nongpeit ka lah ban dei namar ba la ring dur ia ka katkum kane ka juk mynta bad nalor ka jinglong ka video ruh ka kham biang ban ianujor bad kiwei pat ki phlim”, la ong u Bah Daniel.U la ong ba la ring ia kane ka phlim ha kylleng ki jaka jong ka ri Khasi bad Jaintia bad katto katne ha ki bynta jong ka jylla Manipur.Ha kane ka phlim, ki tyngshop kiba iashim bynta ki kynthup ia u Daniel Nongrum, Sweety Angelirie Kharumnuid, Favian Sawkmie, Wanrida Pyngrope, Basharboy Nongrum, Master Ambresstar Kharumnui, Mebanri Saphai bad Master Wanteillang Saphai.Ka jingmut jong kane ka long ba kine ki ar ngut shipara synrap u Haban bad u Tony ki don ka jingiakynduh kaba shem mynsiem uwei ia uwei pat. U Haban u ak kum u tyngshop ba kongsan uba leit tuh na ka iing uwei u briew u Bah Fullmoon Syingdoh.Hynrei ia ki kam jongu la paw pyrthei. Ka la don ka jingieid, ka jingiaburom hapdeng jongki bad ka don ruh ka jingiapynhiar kput, ka jingynbyrngia ia ki nongpeit ia kane ka phlim.
title: Khring ka phlim ki synrap, Haban  Tony; la 11 hajar kiba wan peit

content: Shillong, 3 Naiwieng:Haduh mynta ka seng Congress ha Pynursla konstitwensi kam pat ioh kyrtong satia u ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. Kumba ka long haduh mynta dei sa tang ka Pynursla konstitwensi ka bym pat shai satia mano ban ia khun na katei ka seng hynrei ha kiwei pat ki konstitwensi ki kyrtong ki la iaid shakhmat ban ialap elekshon. Haba pyrshang ban wad jingtip iano ka seng Congress kan pynieng na Pynursla ha u 2018 ki la mih ar tylli ki kyrteng u bah Shining Khongthohrem bad u bah Nehru Suting.Shibnai mynshuwa ka UDP Pynursla ka la pynbna ba ka la mynjur ia ka kyrteng jong u bah Nehru Suting kum u kyrtong jong ka na Pynursla konstitwensi hynrei tang hadien shisngi u bah Nehru u la ong ba kam dei satia ba u pan tiket hynrei dei tang ka jingiakren bad ka shithi ba u jubab ia ka jingtwad jingmut jong ki bad katei ka jingiakren ka long ruh kumjuh bad ka seng Congress, u la ong. Ha katei ka jingiakren kaba khyndiat sngi mynshuwa u bah Nehru u la ong ba dei ha ka 15 tarik u naiwieng baroh kan sa shai.Lah ban kdew ba ka Congress ka la buh por khadduh ha ka 31 tarik risaw ia ki kyrtong ba kin pynpoi ia ki phom jong ki hynrei la ioh jingtip ba ka Congress na Pynursla haduh mynta kam pat lah ban pynpoi ia ka kyrteng u kyrtong jong ka. La iathuh ba haduh mynta ka dang don ka jingiatan tyllai na ka seng Congress bad UDP ia u bah Suting.Ki don katto katne tylli ki konstitwensi ba ka Congress ka dang buh teng ban pynskhem ia ki kyrtong hynrei la iathuh ba ki kyrtong pat ki la don lypa kum ka Mawryngkneng konstitwensi la ong ba ka Congress ka dang sngap jar hynrei ki khubor pat ki la ong ba yn ai khun u khun jong u Charles Pyngrope uba dei u MLA ba mynta u bah David Nongrum. Ha Mawsynram watla ka don ka jingpynsah teng mynshuwa hynrei mynta ka la shai ba un iakhun u bah Himalaya Muktan Shangpliang.
title: Ym pat ioh kyrtong ka  Congress na Pynursla
