NEC kiba heh duh ka long tang T. 8 lak shi snem bad lada siew tang shi lak, kam long kaba suk ban ioh ia ki briew kiba tbit. Ki nongtrei ba tbit ka ADB ki ioh kumba T. 80 lak shi snem”, la ong u secretary ka NEC.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshna ia ka kad liengsuin ha Umroi, u Muivah u la ong ba ia kane la peit da ka tnad Civil Aviation. U la ong ba ka la don ka jingthmu ban pynlong ia ka Shillong kum ka kad liengsuin kaba pawnam bha kum ka Guwahati namar ba na ka rekod, ka jingdon jong ki nongwan sha kane ka jylla bad kiba pyndonkam da ka liengsuin ka la long kumba 8 lak ngut mynshem snem.
title: “Ki bym pynbiang UC hapoh shi snem  shiteng, yn sangeh ai pisa ka NEC”

content: Shillong, 12 Nailur:Haduh mynta la ioh jingtip ba ka jingshim phom tiket Congress ki kyrtong kiba kwah ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 ka la iaid shaid shaid. U bah Lambor skhem Kharpuri uba ju khot ieit kum u bah Khan u dei uwei na ki kyrtong uba la pan tiket na ka seng Congress na Mawkynrew konstitwensi. Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u bah Khan u la ong ba haduh mynta u la ioh jingtip ba dei tang ma u marwei uba la pan tiket na Mawkynrew, hynrei u la ong ba ym lah ban tip pat namar ba ka tarik kam pat kut ioh dang don sa kiwei ruh ki ban pan tiket.Lah ban kdew ba ha u 2013 ka la don ka jingiaknieh tiket Congress kaba jur ha Mawkynrew konstitwensi hapdeng u bah Drola Khongjoh bad u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh bad ha katei ka por ka Congress ka la ai tiket sha u bah Drola Khongjoh uba la shah rem ha katei ka elekshon, u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh (Paidang) u la mih noh na katei ka seng ban ia khun kum u kyrtong shimet. Ha ka elekshon MDC pat ka la don ka jingiaknieh tiket hapdeng u bah Kansing Lynshiang bad u ba hBanteidor Lyngdoh bad ka seng Congress ka la ai tiket sha u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh (Paidang) bad u la jop ha katei ka elekshon hynrei hadien ba la jop u la phet noh na ka seng Congress bad mynta u la rung sha ka seng PDF. Hadien ka jingmih noh jong u bah Paidang la sawa ha katei ka konstitwensi ba u bah Teibor Pathaw un ia khun na ka seng Congress hynrei kham hadien la ong ba u bah Pathaw u la kynriah noh na Mawkynrew sha Mawlai bad mynta la iathuh ba la lum la lang ia ka Congress kaba la pait la pra ha katei ka konstitwensi da u bah Khan.Lah ruh ban kdew ba ka Congress ha Mawkynrew ka la don hapdeng ka kynrum kynram bad bun ki dkhot jong ka kiba ka sakma namar kitei ki jingjia, phet seng u MDC, u bah Kansing u la leit noh sha Mawsynram konstitwensi, ka jingphet seng u bah Drola Khongjoh. Haba ia kren bad u bah Khan u la ong ba haduh mynta kumba ka paw ki dang don tang 4 ngut ki kyrtong na Mawkynrew kata u MLA ba mynta u bah Remington Pyngrope ka UDP, u MDC ba mynta u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh (Paidang) ka PDF, u bah Martle Mukhim ka HSPDP bad ma u (Lamborskhem Khar-puri).
title: Pan tiket Congress u bah Khan na Mawkynrew

content: Shillong, 13 Nailur:Ha u Jylliew 2017, ka KHNAM State Youth Wing ka la leit kynduh ia ka myntri ka Infomation & Technology ryngkat ka dorkhas ban shimkhia bad tuklar ia ki tnat telecom ha ka ioh kam ioh jam, ka jingkyntiew ia ka ktien trai ri bad ki lad jingiada ia ki kynthei. Ha ka jingia kynduh na ka liang ka ka myntri ka la ai ka jingkular ban shimkhia.Na ka liang jong ka seng, ka la leit wad jingtip ia ka telecom company thymmai, ka Jio bad ki nongialam jong ka seng, ki la iakren ia u manager ka kompeni, U bah Andy Lyngdoh bad ula iathuh ba ka rukom ai shuti sha ki longkmie ha ka por armet ka shong na ka por shaka por, kaba lah ban long 16 taiew lah ban tam lah ban duna bad katei hi ka pynpaw shai kdar ba ki ain, kiba long ki jingmyntoi ia u paidbah ka sorkar ka khlem pyntrei kam bha namar katkum ka Maternity benefit (Amendment) Bill 2016 ba la mynjur da ka Lok Sabha, ki longkmie ki dei hok ban ioh ia ka shuti haduh 26 taiew haka por ba armet.Ia ka jingkylli ba ka ophis jong ki, ka la don ne em ia ka komiti ban peit ia ka jingleh kynshlei ia ki kynthei lane ka Internal Complaints Committee, kaba dei ban don kat kum ka Sexual Harassment of women at workplace (prevention, prohibition and redressal) Act 2013; na ka liang jong une u nongpyniaid u la ong ba ka don, hynrei haba kylli ia ka kyrteng jong ki dkhot jong ka committee u la iathuh ba ki manager kiba dei ki shynrang ki dei ki dkhot jong kane ka committee bad kaba kham sngewphylla ka long baroh kine ki dkhot jong kane ka committee ki dei beit na ka jylla Assam. Kat kum kane ka ain ka bynta kaba 4(1) ter ter, ka company ka dei ban don ka committee, bad ka khlieh duh jong kane ka committee kan dei ka kynthei.Halor ka jingdawa jong ka seng ban pyndonkam noh da ka ktien khasi ha ka Interactive Voice Respond (IVR), une u nongpyniaid u la kular ba ha kine ki khyndiat bnai yn leh noh ia kane ka bynta. Ka seng ka sngewdei ba kane ka long kaba donkam ban kyntiew ia ka ktien lajong, bad lada ym lah ban pynthikna ba ka ktien khasi kan rung wat tang ha ka IVR, kumno yn iakren ban pynrung ia ka haka khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India.Ka seng ka la kylli ba balei ka kompeni, kam juh pynmih ha ki kot khubor ia ka lait kam lait jam, khamtam ha ki kotkhubor khasi, khnang ba ki samla trai ri kin ioh ban plie lad ia lade, kaba sngewlyngoh ka long ba une u nongpyniaid jong kane ka company u la ong ba ka policy jong ka kompeni, kam shah ban pynbna ia ki kam balait ha ki kot khubor, hynrei lada don ki kam balait la shu ia pyntip paralok beit.U Bah Thomas Passah, President jong ka KHNAM, u ong shuh shuh ba katei ka pyni, ba kam don kano kano ka jingshim khia jong ka sorkar halor kine ki mat kiba ka seng ka la leit ban buh ha u Jylliew 2017.
title: Haba lait kam ha Jio, shu ia  thung paralok, lap ka KHNAM

content: Shillong, 12 Naiur:Wat la ka por ka dang sah lai sngi ban kut ban thied bad ban thep kyrteng ia ki briew kiba kwah ban pan tiket na ka Congress, hynrei haduh mynta u MLA ka Umroi bad kiwei ki MLA kiba la shah pynduh ia ka Block Congress kim pat shym la wan thied tiket satia haduh mynta.Haba iakren bad u Secretary ka Ri-Bhoi District Congress u Bah Meralbon Syiem u la ong ba haduh mynta, u MLA ka Umroi u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar um pat shym la wan thied tiket na ka party hynrei ym pat lah ban tip ba un wan ne em namar ba ka por ka dang don.“Ngim pat ioh jingtip ba u Bah Ngaitlang un wan thied tiket bad ym pat lah ban ong namar ba mynta ka dang don ka por”, u la ong haba iakren mynta ka sngi.La ioh jingtip ba ka MPCC ka la don ka jingthmu ban aiti tiket noh ha u Bah George Lyngdoh na Umroi bad katkum ka khubor, ula dep pan tiket ruh na ka party.Katkum ka jingtip, ki MLA jong kito ki Block ba ki la shah pynduh ha ka MPCC, kim pat don satia kiba wan thied tiket ne shim phom na ka party kynthup ka Pynursla ba mihkhmat u Bah Prestone Tynsong, ka Nartiang jong u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, ka Mawkyrwat ba mihkhmat da u Bah Rowel Lyngdoh nalor ka Umroi u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar.U Bah Syiem u la iathuh ba ka jingiapan tiket na Jirang ka jur bha namar ba la don haduh lai ngut kiba pa tiket kynthup u Bah Bathok Nongmali, Bah Witnes Syngkli bad ka Kong Sarita Laitphlang. Kumjuh ruh na Mawhati ki don sa kiwei nalor u Bah Charles Margar bad ka party kan sa phah sha ka bor ba dei ban leh ia kaba dokam.“Tang na Nongpoh bad na Umsning, kam don kano kano ka jingiaknieh tiket, namar ba la don lypa u Bah DD Lapang bad u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh”, la ong u Bah Syiem.Katkum ka khubor na ka MPCC, ka dang ap ia ka sngi kut ban pdiang ia ka aplieshon haduh ka 15 tarik ban tip mano napdeng ki MLA ka party ki bym pat tiket shuh bad kan sa tip ban wad da kiwei pat.
title: 4ngut ki MLA Congress, kim  pat leit shim phom aplai tiket

content: Shillong, 3 Nailur:Ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee ( MPCC) ka la pynduh pyndam noh ia ka Pynursla Block Congress Committee kaba rim bad ka la sdang ban thaw thymmai da kawei pat ka Block ha kaba la thung ia u bah Han Khongtani kum u President ba thymmai jong katei ka Block. Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u bah Han Khongtani u la iathuh ba la thung ia u ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u bah D.D Lapang, President MPCC, u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, u bah Kennedy Khyriem bad u bah James Lyngdoh Working President ka MPCC.Ka Congress ka la pynduh pyndam ia ka Congress kaba donlang ki kynhun u bah Prestone Tynsong bad la shimti ia ka kam nongialam mynta da kawei pat ka kynhun. U bah Han u la ong ba ha katei ka kynhun la ia khleh lut bad ki don ki briew jong u bah Prestone ruh. U la ong ba haduh mynta ym pat sngewthuh sngewthaw naba u dang shu shimti dang mynhynnin ka sngi ia ka kam nongialam bad u dang sdang ban pynlum pynlang briew bad ban thaw ia ki komiti bapher bapher bad ia u kandidet ruh u la ong ba ym pat ioh haduh mynta.Haba pyrshang ban wad jingtip na kiba bun ki nongialam jong ka seng Congress kiba ju ia don ryngkat bad u bah Prestone kim don jingtip eiei ia katei ka jingpynduh pyndam ia ka Block Congress ha Pynursla hynrei u bah Han Khongtani u la ong ba naduh mynhynnin hi ka sngi baroh ki tnad treikam jong ka seng Congress ha Pynursla Block ki la iap lut bad yn sdang da kawei pat kaba thymmai. Hynrei kham hadien la ioh jingtip ruh ba ka kynhun jong u bah Prestone Tynsong kan lum jingialang lashai ka miet 4 tarik u nailur ban shong pyrkhat ha kaba la iathuh ba ka lah ban poi ruh ka jingiakren ban rai noh na ka Party aiu ban pyniakhun ia u bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka elekshon MLA 2018.
title: Pyndam ia ka Block Congress ha  Pynursla, thung President ia U Han

content: Shillong, 3 Nailur:Ka trok ki shipai BSF kaba dang hiar na Shillong ban leit sha Nongjri harum Pynursla, ka la kylla bad ha katei ka jingjia ki la don haduh 14 ngut ki shipai ryngkat u nongniah kiba mynsaw malu mala. Katei ka jingjia ka la jia mynta ka nohphai sngi ha ka jaka ba ju khot ‘Kyntiah kloiñ’ shuwa ban poi sha shnong Mawkliaw. La iathuh ba kitei ki shipai ki shu mynsaw malu mala bad la pynkit ia ki sha Pynursla CHC bad ki la ioh jingsumar. La iathuh ba mynta ka sngi ki la don haduh 4 tylli ki trok shipai kiba hiar sha Nongjri, hynrei kawei na ki ka la kylla hynrei ka jaka ba katei ka trok ka la kylla kam shym dei satia sha ka liang kaba don riat, kumta baroh kiba shong hapoh ki shu mynsaw malu mala.
title: Kylla ka trok shipai BSF, mynsaw  bun ngut harum Pynursla

content: Shillong, 5 Nailur:Kum shibynta ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 175 snem thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi, ka Khasi Authors’ Society ka la pynlong ïa ka symposium halor ka phang “ka Thoh ka Pule ka sdang na u ABK” ha Nabon Sawian Memorial Secondary School, Mawmluh kawei na ki skul ba byngkong eh ha Ri Khasi ba la seng da u Rev.Thomas Jones-I ha ka snem 1842. ?a ki lai tylli ki skul ba nyngkong eh ba la seng da u Thomas Jones la tip mynta da ka Nabon Sawian Memorial Secondary School ha Mawmluh, ka Larsing Khongwir Memorial Secondary School ha Mawsmai bad ka Sohra Twa Presbyterian Upper Primary School ha Sohra.La pynïaid ïa ka symposium da u Dr.D.R.L.Nonglait, President KAS bad ka jingkren pdiang I Prof(Kong) S.Dkhar. La plie da ki kyntien kyrkhu kyrdoh u Bah Tisosstarwell Chyne, MLA uba long u Kongsan jong katei ka sngi ryngkat, ka jingïadon lang ki Nongkitkam bad ki dkhot ka Khasi Authors’ Society, ki Nonghikai jong ki skul bad ka college ka thaiñ Sohra, ki dkhot Managing Committee jong kitei ki lai tylli ki skul u Thomas Jones, u Pastor bad ki Nongsharai ka Balang Presbyterian Mawmluh, u Sirdar ka Mawmluh, ki nongïalam jong ki seng treimon sngewbha jong katei ka thain lem bad ki paralok parajor.U Bah Titos, ha ka jingkren jong u, u la pynpaw ka jingsngewbynniaw ïa ka jingpynduh noh ka MBOSE ïa ka Subject Khasi kum ka subject kaba dei ban pule da baroh ki khun Khasi “Compulsory subject” ha ki class XI bad XII bad ailad ïa ki samla ban jied katba ki mon hi “optional subject/Elective subject”. U la bynrap da kaba ong ba kane ka jingleh jong ka MBOSE ka long ka dak jong ka jingma ïa ka ktien Khasi. Haba phai sha ka jingïaleh ban pynïoh jaka ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba Phra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India, une u Nongmihkhmat sha ka Dorbar Thawain ka Jylla u pynpaw ka jingsngewlyngngoh ïa ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban wanrah hapoh ka ?ing Dorbar ïa ka Kaiphod jong ka Committee ba la thung kyrpang na ka bynta kane ka kam na ka bynta ban ai bor ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban phah ïa ka kam sha ka Sorkar Kmie ha Delhi. Kumta u khmihlynti ba ka Sorkar jylla kan shimkhia bad leh noh kloi katba lah ban wanrah ïa kane ka kam ha ka ïing Dorbar bad u wer ïa ki para MLA ban ïa kyrshan lang ïa kane ka kam kaba kongsan jong ka jaitbynriew.Haba phai sha ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka SMS ha kine ki sngi, u Bah Titos u pynpaw ka jingsngewsyier ba ka rukom thoh Khasi kan sa pynbakla lut namarba ha ki SMS la shu ïa pynmlien ban thoh shiteng dak kum ‘fi’ ha ka jaka ‘phi’ bad kumta ter ter.Kum ka jingkitbok kitrwiang ïa ka Khasi Authors’ Society ha ka jingrakhe jong ka ïa ka jingdap 175 snem ka thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi, u Kongsan u kyntu ïa ki paid Khasi baïar ban pule ïa ki kot Khasi khnang ban im thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi.Ha katei ka symposium la ïoh ka jingkren na ki ar ngut ki riew khraw pyrkhat ka thoh ka pule u Khasi, u Dr.B.R.Kharlukhi halor ka phang tnat “Jingsdang u ABK ha ki skul Khasi” bad u Babu S.S.Majaw shaphang “Ka jingsan ka thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi” kine baroh ar ngut ki dei ki President barim ka Khasi Authors’ Society.U Babu B.R.Kharlukhi u pynshisha ba u khun Khasi um don la ki jong ki dak thoh. Haba phah kyrwoh ki ju pyndonkam da ki ksah shympriahkti. Kine ki dak kiba im, kiba la pyndonkam ha ka thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi haduh mynta mynne ki long ki matti u Thomas Jones. U Thomas Jones u la sdang ban saiñdur ïa ki dak thoh Khasi da kaba pyndankam ïa u “ABC” kham hadien la pyndonkam noh da u ‘K’ ha ka jaka u ‘C’. Ynda la ih bha ka thoh ka pule, ki rangbah Khasi kiba kynthup ïa u Bah Jeebon Roy Mairom ki la wanrah sa u ‘ ? ‘ bad u ‘ Ñ ‘ kum ki dak thoh Khasi.Kum uwei na ki dkhot ka Committee ba la thung kyrpang da ka Sorkar Jylla na ka bynta ka jingïaleh ban pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba Phra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India, une u rangbah u la pynpaw ka jingsngewlyngngoh ïa ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar ban phah ïa ka kam sha ka Sorkar India na ka bynta ban pynrung noh ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba Phra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.Haba kren halor “Ka jingsan ka thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi” Babu S.S.Majaw u la ai ka jingbatai kaba bniah bad ai jinghun ïa ka lympung baroh kawei. Une u nonghikai bad ruh kum u nongthoh ba paw khmat jong kane ka juk, u la pynpaw ka jingkmen ba ka jingsdang jong u Alexander B.Lish jong ka Serampore Mission ban wanrah ïa ki dak Bengali kum ki dak thoh ha ka ktien Khasi ka la duh ka la dam noh. Watdano te ki khun Khasi ki la dei ban pyndonkam ïa ki laiphew tam ki dak thoh Bengali ha ka thoh ka pule Khasi. U Babu S.S.Majaw, u la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewbynñiaw ïa ka jingslem palat ka Sorkar Jylla ban leit tied jingkhang ha Delhi ban ïoh rung ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit kaba Phra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.Ka lyngpung ka la buh ruh ka jingkylli halor ka kyrteng jong ka Khasi Authors’ Society kaba long ha ka ktien English. Ki Nongïalam ka KAS kim lah khlem da kdew sha ki Nongseng jong ka ryngkat ka jingkular ban sa nang ïa kren ïa kane ka kam kaba la ju ïa kren teng hapoh ka Seng.La pynrhem ïa katei ka lympung da ka jingrwai ba la ïa rwai lang ki khynnah skul jong ka Nabon Sawian Memorial Secondary School, Mawmluh, ka Larsing Khongwir Memorial Secondary School, Mawsmai bad ka Sohra Twa Presbyterian Upper Primary School, Sohra. Ki kyntien jong ka jingrwai “PYNNEH LA KTIEN LA JONG, WAT NYM AI LAD ÏA KTIEN RONGPHONG” ki la pynhun jrut ïa ka dohnud ieit ri jong u Kongsan bad ki kynrem ki lyndan ka Khasi Authors’ Society.Ka jingmih na kane ka Symposium ka la ai jinghun ïa baroh kawei ka lympung.La pynwai ïa ka Symposium da ka jingkren ai khublei u Bah P.Kharshiing General Secretary, KAS u ba la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa baroh kiba la ai ka jingkyrshan ban pynlong ïa kane ka Symposium kaba jop.
title: Ha ki SMS, kan bakla lut ka  thoh Khasi, kren diaw U MLA

content: Shillong, 05 Nailur:Ka Umden Development and Transport Association (UDTA) ka la dawa ba ka Airport Aurhority of India (AAI) ka dei ban shna noh mardor ia ka surok sha kane ka shnong shwa ba kan ker kper noh ia ka jaka dem liengsuin ha Umroi khnang ba ka shnong kan nym shah khang lynti.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, u President ka seng u Bah Apborlang Nongrum ba la don lang u rangbah shnong ka Umden u bah Pailang Kurbah ki la ong ba ka jingker kper ka AAI ia ka jaka dem liengsuin ha Umroi, kan pyndam surok kaba iaid sha ka shnong jongki bad ka long kaba donkam kyrkieh ba kan shna shwa ia ka surok na kawei ka jaka shwa ba kan khang ia kane ka surok.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, kine ki riew rangbah ki la ong ba nalor kane ka jingdonkam paidbah, ki la dep phah jingthoh ruh naduh u snem 2012 ba ka AAI ka dei ban shna ia ka jaka sumar ha katei ka shnong kaba la dep rai ban ai jaka sngewbha haduh 8000 sq ft bad na ka liang u MP u Bah Vicent H Pala ruh u la kular ba un ai pisa na ka skhim ban thied ia ka kali kit nongpang bad kumjuh ban shna ia katei ka jaka sumar, hynrei haduh mynta ka dang sahkut khlem pat poi shaei shaei ruh namar ba ka sorkar jylla kam shym la shim khia satia.Ki la ong ba ki la dep iakynduh ia ka myntri ba ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar jylla ka Kong Roshan Warjri bad u Bah AL Hek ha ka por ba u long myntri kane ka tnad kham mynshwa hynrei kane ka kam kam shym la iaid satia.Ha kajuh ka por, u Bah Nongrum u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la iakynduh ia u director ka AAI ha Umroi ba un ai kam ai jam ia ki samla khamtam ki trai jaka ba la shah ktah na ka jingshim jaka ban shna ia ka kad liengsuin hynrei um shym la ai kano kano ka jingkular ia ki.Ha kawei ka liang, ka seng ka la dawa ruh ba u dei ban ai lad ia ki kali kamai na katei ka shnong ba kin kit ki leit buh nongleit nongwan na kad liengsuin hynrei halor kane ruh, u heh ka AAI um shym la kular ban ai eiei bad u la ong ba un hap ban khot tender bad kane kan khang lad ia ki kali kamai .Hynrei na ka liang jongki, ki la ong ba kin nym aili ia kane ka jingthmu ban khot tender bana wan pyniaid kali ki briew nabar hynrei kin iakhun beit ba ki trai jaka ki dei ban ioh ban pyniaid ia ka kali kit nongleit nongwan na katei ka kad liengsuin.
title: Dawa surok bad pan kamai ka  UDTA, na ka AAI ha Umden

content: Shillong, 05 Nailur:Lai ngut ki kyrtong ba rem ha ka elekshon MLA 2013 na Mawryng kneng Constituency, mynta ka sngi ki la ia rung sha ka seng People Democratic Party (PDF) ha ka jingialang ha Sohryng kham. Kine ki kynthup ia u kyrtong ka UDP u Bah Highlander Kharmalki, u Dr OS Jyrwa ka KHNAM bad u Bah MP Muktieh u kyrtong shimet kiba la iakhun ha ka Election MLA ba la dep.Ha kane ka jingia-lang ha kaba la wan ban ia shim bynta da ki paidbah bun bha na kylleng ki dong bad ki shnong jong ka Mawryngkneng Constituency ha ryngkat ka jingiadon lang u President ka People’s Democratic Front u Bah Aiban-lumlang Marbaniang, u samla Auspicious Lyngdoh uba dei u General Secretary, u Bah HS Shylla u ba dei u MDC ka Nongkrem Constituency uba dang dep pyniasoh dang shen sha ka PDF lem ki 11 ngut ki MDC, u Bah Esron Marwein, u Bah Kynsai Dkhar, ki longkmie longkpa kumjuh ruh ki samla kynthei shynrang kiba la rai ban kyrshan ia u Bah Highlander Kharmalki ha kane ka kynti ba mynta.Ha kane ka jingialang la thung ruh ia ki nongkitkam ha ka shatri jong ka Mawryngkneng Constituency Zonal Committee jong ka PDF ha kaba la jied ia u Dr OS Jyrwa kum u President bad ia u Bah MP Muktieh kum u Working President. Nalor kine la jied ruh ia u Bah EK Wahlang kum u Secretary bad ia u Bah Riwan Sohtun kum u Assistant General Secretary bad kumjuh ruh la jied saw ngut ki Vice President ba kynthup ia u Bah Khraw Nongpluh, Dwing Myrboh, Shanti Nongspung bad u Bah Swan Sohtun lem bad kiwei kiwei. Ia kine. La thung ruh ia u Bah Esron Marwein kum u Chief Organiser bad ia u Bah Banstar Mawthoh kum u Assistant Chief Organizer kumjuh ruh ia u Bah Livingstone Thangkhiew kum u Publicity Secretary.U Bah Muktieh u la ong ba haba khein kyllum ia ka jingioh vote ki lai ngut ka la poi sha ka 12 hajar bad u MLA ba mynta u Bah David Nongrum u la jop da kaba ioh 6 hajar tam ka vote bad kan long kaba suk ban jop.U Bah Highlander u la pynpaw ba ka jingwan pyniasnoh jong u bad ka PDF ka long da ka jingiasngewthuh lang bad ki rangbah bad nongkyrshan jong u kiba ju don ha ka UDP bad kiba la kthang ia ka rai u Dr Donkupar Roy kaba long kum ka rai jong u shimet hi ban ailad ia ka HSPDP na kane ka Constituency hadien ka jingiatehlok hapdeng ka UDP bad HSPDP na ka bynta ka Election MLA 2018.
title: Thaw PDF Mawryngkneng

content: Shillong, 29 Nailar:Ha ka miet lah sngi u blei ki pulit ka Special Cell ka East Khasi Hills district ki la leit khynra ia ki Call Centre thok, kiba don ha nongbah Shillong, kiba dei ruh ka ktem ki runar kiba lute pisa im im peit peit na ki paidbah da kaba pyndonkam da ka Internet. Ki pulit ki la leit khynra ia kitei ki ktem shukor briew tang ban ioh pisa bad la kurup bun ki tiar ki tar bad ki kot ki sla. Ki don haduh 3 tylli kitei ki ktem kawei ka dei ka M/S IFA Enterprise kaba don ha Cleve Colony, kawei pat dei ka M/S BPO Zurich kaba don ha Lower New Colony bad kawei pat dei ka M/S Dasanbha Enterprise kaba don ha Jaiaw.Ha katei ka miet ki la pulit ki la ioh kem ia kitei ki briew kiba pyndonkam da ka Voice Over Internet Protocol (VOIP) da kaba thok ia ki nong Amerika bad ki pynithuh ialade kum ki Internal Revenue Service Agent (IRSA) bad kitei ki runar ki tip tiak pa tiak ia ka jaka shong jaka sah jong ki briew kiba don ha ka ri Amerika, hadien ki phone ia ki da kaba pyntieng ba ki hap ban siew ia ki khajna ba ki thied tiar thied tar bad ki ju byrngem ruh ban leit sha ingsah jong ki lada kim siew. Hadien katei ka jingbyrngem jong ki ki nongthied tiar kin sa batai ia ki 16 tylli ki nombar bad hadien ba la ioh ia utei u nombar da kaba suk ki lah ban se iia ka pisa jong kitei ki briew.Katei ka ktem ka dei ka kynja Call Centre kaba thok kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka IFA Enterprise bad ka la shim wai lai mala ia ka building jong ka SS Net Com kaba don ha Cleve Colony bad ia katei ka Call Centre thok la pyniaid sa u Amit Bhowmick bad u Sunny Mukherjee uba ju khot sin kum u Faisal, kitei ki dei kiba shong basah shabar Shillong bad ki ju wan teng teng sha Shillong ban siew tulop ia ki nongtrei ba ki buh. Kawei pat ka Call Centre thok ka dei ka M/s BPO Zurich kaba don ha phyllaw jong ka RBI ha Cleve Colony.Hadien ba ki pulit ki la ioh jingtip kaba thikna ba u trai jong ka IFA Enterprise Call Centre, u wan sha nongbah Shillong da ka kali Chevrolet jong u kaba don ia u nombar AS01AZ 0101 bad ba u don ha katei ka jaka ha Cleve Colony, ka kynhun Special Cell jong ki pulit ka East Khasi Hills ki la leit ban khynra ha ka por 7:30 baje mynmiet. Ha katei ka jingjia ki pulit ki la ioh kem ia u Amit Bhowmick, 24 snem karta uba dei na Tura, na jaka sah u Vivek Thapa uba na Cleve Colony bad ka Naina Gurung, 22 snem karta na Lower Nongrim hills.Ha katei ka jingleit khynra ki pulit ki la kurup 77 tylli ki Hard Disk kiba la sei na ki CPU, ka pisa T.1 lak tyngka bad bun ki kot ki sla. La kem ruh ia u Pynshan Mawthoh uba na ka shnong Madanrting, uwei na ki Manager ka IFA Enterprise. Na ka ing ba shim wai da ka M/s BPO Zurich kaba don ha Lower New Colony ki pulit ki la ioh kurup bun ki tiar Electronic ,ka pisa T.1 lak tyngka bad bun ki kot ki sla. Ha katei ka jingjia la kem ia u Rijo Christian Joseph, 26 snem karta uba na Ahmadabad,-gujarat bad ia ka Sweety Sutnga, 22 snem karta kaba shong basah ha Lower Nongrim Hills.Ki pulit ki la pynngat ha ki ar tylli ki kes kawei ha Laitumkhrah Ps C/No.134(8)17 u/s 120(B)/385/419/420/468/34 IPC bad Laitumkhrah Ps C/No.135(8)17 u/s 120(B)/385/419/420/468/34. Ia kitei kiba la shah kem la rah sha ing bishar jong u CJM, Shillong bad la ai bor 6 sngi ia ki pulit ba kin tohkit.Mynta ka sngi pat ki pulit ki la leit ban khynra ia katei ka ing kaba shim wai da ka M/s IFA Enterprise na SS Net Com bad ki la ioh kurup 85 tylli ki CPU bad bunbah ki Script IRS. La kem ruh 2 ngut ki ki nongtrei jong ka SS Net Com u bah Chritopher Kurbah, 23 snem karta na ka shnong Lawsohtun bad u Kiren Damai, 39 snem karta na Digboi Dibrugarh. Ki pulit ki la ioh jingtip ruh ba ka don sa kawei pat ka Call Centre kaba la tip kum ka M/S Dasanbha Enterprise kaba long trai da u bah Nicky War kaba don ha Jaiaw bad katei ka Call Centre ka la sdang ban khang noh.Ki pulit ki la khot hajir ia u trai katei ka dukan bad hadien ba la tohkit la lap ba nangtei na Call Centre ki ju phone ia ki briew ba sah ha Amerika ban kylli la ki don jingpang jingshitom ne-em bad la ki ju shah puid ne-em bad lada ki dei kiba kum kita ki briew ki ju tyrwa ban siew pisa kum ka bai lut bai sep hynrei shuwa ban siew ia kata ka pisa ba ki kular ki phah ia ki briew ba kin thep pisa shuwa $650 (650 dollar). Ki pulit ki la ioh kurup 63 tylli ki kompitor, ki seal bad 43 tylli ki hard disk bad la rejistar ha Laitumkhrah PS. La kem ia u trai katei ka Call Centre u Nicky War. Ki pulit ki dang tohkit ia katei ka jingjia.
title: Khynra ki pulit ia ki Call Centre  thok, shah 9 ngut; 4 ki Khasi

content: Shillong, 28 Nailar:Ka khubor ba rung BJP ar ngut ki MLA na Jaintia Hills, ka la pynkulmar bha ha kane ka janmiet sngi Nyngkong. Ki nongialam ka BJP ha Shillong ki la pynbna khubor ba u Bah Justine Dkhar bad u Bah Robinus Syngkon ki la iasoh bad ka BJP ha New Delhi, hynrei haba iakren bad ki, ki la kyntait ba ki la rung BJP.Kine ki dei ki MLA shimet na Jaintia Hills, ki la iakynduh mynta ka sngi, ia u president ka BJP u Amit Shah bad aiti ia ka dorkhas ban dawa pynlait khang dewiong ha Delhi.Katba u Bah J. A. Lyngdoh, u Vice President u la kam ba kine ar ngut ki la rung sha ka BJP, hynrei na ka liang u president u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh, uba synran lang ia ki sha Delhi, u la ong ba ki shu kular ban sa rung pat hadien.“Ha ka jingialang bad ki nongialam ka party ha Delhi ba don lang u Amit Shah, kine ki MLA ki la kular ba kin join sha ka BJP tangba ia ka tarik bad ka sngi ym pat pynbeit kaban long ha Shillong”,la ong u Bah Lyngdoh.Kumjuh u Bah Justine Dkhar uba don ha New Delhi, u la ong ba ha ka jingialang,ki nongialam ka BJP ki la ong ia u ba un rung noh sha ka seng.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Dkhar, lai ngut ki MLA kynthup ma u, u Bah Stephanson Mukhim, u Bah Robinus Syngkon ki la aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Amit Shah ban kyrpad ia ka sorkar pdeng ban pynlait noh na ka jingkhang dewiong ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya da kaba pyndonkam da ka Para 12 (a)(b) ka Sixth Schedule lyngba ka jingpynbna da u President ka ri.“Ngi la ong ia ki ba ngi long kiba la khreh ban rung BJP lada lah ban weng ia ki jingeh dewiong”, la ong u Bah Dkhar.U Bah Dkhar u la ong ba ma u lem bad u Bah Syngkon bad u Bah Mukhim ki dang kyrshan ia kane ka sorkar ba ialam da ka Congress.“Lada ngi iasoh bad ka BJP, ngin hap ban risain shwa na ka sorkar”, la ong u Bah Dkhar.Kine ki lai ngut ki MLA ka Jaintia ki bat mynta kum ki Parliamentary Secretary ha kane ka sorkar MUA-II ba ialam da ka Congress.Lah ban kdew ba mynta ka janmiet, u Vice President ka BJP u Bah John Antonio Lyngdoh u la kren sha ki nongthoh khubor ba u Bah Justine u dei u MLA shimet na Khliehriat katba u Bah Robinus u MLA na Mookaiaw ki la rung sha ka BJP ha ka jingialang kaba long hynne ka sngi ha nongbah Delhi ba la don u Amit Shah, u President ka Meghalaya BJP u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh,u Himanta Biswa Sarma, u Ram Madhav, u Nalin Kohli bad kiwei ki nongialam.Ia kine la synran lang ruh u Bah Thomas Nongtdu uba dei u nongialam jong kine ki MLA ba iasoh BJP bad u Bah Rollingson Dkhar.“Ki dang don shuh sa kiwei ki MLA na kiwei ki party kiban wan iasoh bad ka BJP ha kane ka jylla nalor kine”, la ong u Vice President ka BJP bad bynrap, “U Bah Stephanson Mukhim un sa rung shen ha kine ki sngi”.U Bah Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka BJP ka la buh thong ba lada ka duna palat kan jop haduh 12 ngut haduh 16 ngut ha kane elekshon ban wan bad kan shong syndon ha ka bor synshar. “Ngi la buh thong ba ka BJP kan jop la kumno kumno ruh 12 haduh 16 ngut ki MLA ha ka elekshon ban wan bad kan bat ia ka bor synshar ha ka jylla”, la ong u Bah Lyngdoh.U la ong ba lait na ka BJP kam don da kawei ka seng, kaba lah ban mih bujli ha ka ri ban ai ia ka jingsynshar kaba bha bad ka nongrim jong u myntri rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi, “sab ka sath sab ka vikas ne ka roi ka par ia baroh khlem niew shiliang ka la khring ia ki paidbah ka ri ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka BJP.Halor ka jingkylli balei kine ki MLA ki leit rung sha Delhi ym ha Meghalaya, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong kam don jingpher eiei ka jingrung jong ki na Delhi bad ka party ha kane ka jylla ka pdiang ia ki arti arjat.Haba iakren bad U Rupang, U Ma Balius Swer, uba dei u dkhot ba dang shu rung shen sha ka seng BJP, ula ong “Ngi kum ki nongtrei parti, ngi shaniah skhem ha ka jingstad jong U President, iano un ai tiket”. U Ma Balius, uba dei ruh uwei na ki nongialam jong ka seng, ki trai dewiong, ula pynsngew ba ka seng, ka la aiti ruh ia u, ba un long kum U President jong ka Scheduled Tribe Committee ha East Jaintia Hills District.
title: Pyniasoh BJP U Ma Justine & U Ma Robinus, ong U bah JA Lyngdoh

content: Shillong, 29 Nailar:Sa tang shi sngi ba ka jingkhot thep aplikeshon na ka bynta ki samla ban ialeh ia ka civil services kan kut noh, ka KHNAM Youth Wing mynta ka sngi ka la pynlong ia ka jingrah lama hakhmat ka Secretariat ban dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynjlan ia ka rta ia ki samla ban ialeh ia ki eksamin civil services na ka 32 sha ka 40 snem kumba leh ha kiwei ki jylla kum ha Tripura, Assam ia ki trai jylla.Ki dkhot ka KHNAM Youth Wing kiba don tang katto katne ngut ki la pynlong ia ka jingrah lama ha ka por mynstep, hynrei namar ba shah mana ha ka ain 144CrPC, ki la sangeh noh shwa bad ki la leit ban pan jingbit biang na u DC bad hadien ba ki la ioh, ki la wan biang ban rah lama ha ka por 3 baje eiei.U president ka KHNAM Youth Wing u Bah Thomas Passah haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor u la ong ba ka seng ka pynrem jur ia ka sorkar kaba sngap jar halor kane ka jingdawa ka seng kaba shong nongrim bha namar ba ha ka Meghalaya Service Rule ruh la ha ka para 9 ka kyndon ba ar,la kdew shai ba la shah ia ka sorkar jylla ba kan pynjlan ia ka rta thungkam ia ki trai jylla.“Ngi pynrem jur ia ka sorkar bad kumjuh ia baroh ki 60 ngut ki MLA kiba khlem kren eiei halor kane kaba dei ka lad ban plie ia ki samla ha kane ka juk kyrduh kam”, la ong u Bah Passah.Ka KHNAM ka la dep phah jingthoh kham mynshwa sha u Chief Secretary ka jylla halor kane ka jingdawa jongka bad ka la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynmih noh ia ka jingpynbna lashai ba kan pynjlan ia ka rta jong ki samla ban ialeh ia kane ka eksamin.
title: Tur ka KHNAM sha Secretariat,  dawa pynjlan rta ialeh civil services

content: Mawkyrwat, 29 Nailar:U General secretary barim ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) u Bah Diverland Lyngdoh u la pyniasoh bad ka Nationalist People Party (NPP) lem bad ki nongkyrshan jongu ha kane ka sngi Hatmajai ha ka jingialang kaba long ha mawkyrwat ba la don ki nongialam ka NPP kynthup u James K Sangma.U Bah Diverland Lyngdoh u dei u nongialam ka Congress uba dei ruh u para jong u MLA ba mynta u Bah Rowel Lyngdoh.Ha kane ka jingialang la thaw ruh ia ka NPP Mawkyrwat Block Committee ryngkat ki nongkitkam. Da kane ka jingphet jong u Bah Diverland lem bad ki nongkyrshan, ka sem Congress ka la pra phom mynta bad ka la buh ka jingartatien ia u MLA ba mynta la un dang neh ne em ha ka Congress.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingsngew tynnad ia ki nongialam ka NPP, u Bah Diverland u la kyrmen ba un sa lah ba pynrulong ia ki jingangnud jong ki paidbah lyngba ka NPP ban rah ia ka thong ha kane ka elekshon MLA ban wan.U James Sangma u la pdiang sngewbha ia u Bah Diverland bad ki nongkyrshan jongu sha ka NPP bad la thung ia u Bah Diverland kum u Chief Organiser.U James u la ong ba ka jingiasoh ki nongialam sha ka NPP kan sa lah ban pynurlong ia ki jingdonkam jongki paidbah bad u la ther ia ka Congress kaba la niew bein ia ki nongialam kiba don ka lawei hapoh ka jingialam jong u Mukul Sangma.La ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na ka Kong Diliancy Lyngdoh, kaba dei ka Vice President barim ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Mahila bad ka District President barim ka South West Khasi Hills Congress.
title: Twa ka Congress Mawkyrwat,  rung NPP ka kynhun Bah Rowell

content: Jowai, 29 Nailar:U Myntri khynnah ka sorkar pdeng uba dei peit ia ka tnad rel, u Rajen Gohain u la wan ban iuh kjat mynta ka sngi ha ka Nongbah Jowai ban pynsngewthuh paidbah halor ka jingthmu ka Sankalp Se Siddhi kaba dei ka prokram ban pynsngewthuh paidbah, na ka bynta ki jingiakhih ban ioh ia ka India ba Thymmai.U Rajen Gohain haba kren ha ka jingialang kaba la pynlong ha Tpep Pale Hall, hapoh ka jingpyniaid u President ka BJP ha West Jaintia Hills District u la ong ba u Myntri Rangbah Duh ka ri u Narendra Modi u laiaid shakhmat ban pynlong ia ka ri India kum ka ri kaba thymmai.U la iathuh ba lyngba kane ka program, ngin hap ban ialeh pyrshah ia ki jingsniew bahar rukom naduh ka bamsap, ka jingduk tasam, ka jingsngewiapher niam bad jaitbynriew bad ka jingjaboh jabain ki shnong ki thaw bad ban duriap ha ki kam ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot.“Lada ngi ieng lang ryngkat ban ia snohkti na ka bynta ban ialeh pyrshah ia kine ki jingsniew khlempep ka ri India jong ngi kan sa kylla dur”, la ong u Gohain.U la kyntu ia ki paidbah ka Jaintia Hills ba kin ai ka jingkyrshan jong ki ia u Modi na ka bynta kane ka New India Movement.“Nga da thrang ruh ban iohi ba baroh 7 ngut ki MLA na Jaintia kin jop na ka juh ka lama ha kane ka election 2018 khlem la jia ha u snem 1998”, u la bynrap.Ha shwa kane, u Gohain u la ialam khmat ban bam smai na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka India kaba thymmai. U Vice president ka BJP u bah JJA Lyngdoh haba kren u la pynkynmaw ia ka jingiakhih ban ioh laitluid lyngba ka Quit India Movement kaba la long ha u snem 1942.“Tang hadien 5 snem, ha u snem 1947, ka India ka la ioh laitluid bad ngam artatien bad ka Sankalp Se Siddhi ruh kan pynlong ia ka India ka ri kaba thymmai ha u snem 2022”, la ong u bah JJA Lyngdoh. Ia kane jingialang la pyniaid da u President ka WJH BJP, u ma Marki Mulieh bad la iadonlang ruh ki nongkitkam jong ka party khamtam u ma Sing Mulieh uba dei u State president ka BJP uba dei peit ia ki Scheduled Tribe.
title: Poi Jowai u myntri rel, na  bynta ka India ba thymmai

content: Shillong, 29 Nailar:Ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee ha ryngkat bad ki District Committee, ki la pynduh noh ia ka Mairang Block Congress bad la thung ia U Bah Rasor Rani, MLA barim kum U President ba thymmai jong ka Block Congress.La pyndam noh ruh ia ka Nartiang BCC bad la thung bujli da U Bah Apolynarius Kon, kum U President ba thymmai jong ka Nartiang BCC bad la pynduh ruh ia ka Mawkynrew BCC, ha kaba la thung da U bah Lamborskhem Kharpuri, ba un long U President thymmai jong ka Mawkynrew BC bad la pyndam noh ruh ia ka Mawryngkneng BCC bad la thung bujli da U Bah Banshalnag Lawai, kum U President ba thymmai jong ka BCC, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Charles Marngar, Secretary, MPCC, i/c Media.
title: Thaw Block thymmai ka MPCC

content: Nongpoh, 29 Nailar:Hadien ba kawei ka longkmie na ka shnong 20Mer, Ri Bhoi District, ka la shah jrongkti ha uwei u CRPF, uba la tip kyrteng kum u Pradip Nath, uba ap pahara ha katei ka shnong; na ka liang ka HNYF, 20Mer Circle, ka la pynrem jur halor katei ka jingjia ba ki briew kiba bat ia ka ain kin leh ia kiba kum kitei ki kam kiba da ktah shisha ha ka imlang sahlang.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, mynha ha ka 26 tarik ha ka por 9 shiteng eiei mynmiet, utei u u shipai CRPF u ba don duty ha ka Toll Plaza kaba don ha 20Mer, u la leit ban thied kwai na kawei ka dukan jong kawei ka thei Khasi bad ha katei ka por u la sdang ban leh kynshlein da kaba kylli ia ki jingkylli ki bym dei ban kylli bad sdang ruh ban tare bad ktah sha ki bynta ka shadem.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor, u Bah Paul Wahlang, President ka HNYF, 20Mer Circle, u la ong ba ka seng ka pynrem jur halor katei ka jingleh khlem akor da u tei u shipai ha katei ka shnong, ha kaba lyngba katei ka jingjia, ka la wanrah ruh ia ka jingsyier bad ka jingbym shnong shngain ia ki kynthei khynnah bad ki paidbah ba iaid ba ieng ym tang ha katei ka shnong, hynrei wat ha ki shnong ba marjan ruh kumjuh.Kumta haba iadei bad katei, na ka liang ka HNYF 20Mer Circle, ka la dawa na ka sorkar ba kadei ban weng noh mardor ia kitei ki shipai CRPF, kiba don duty ha katei ka shnong, namar ka jingdon jong kitei ki CRPF ka wanrah pynban ia ka jingtieng jingsyier ia ki kynthei khynnah kiba don ha katei ka shnong, u la bynrap.
title: “Weng ia ki shipai CRPF na 20Mer”

content: Shillong, 29 Nailar:U President barim ka Seng Khasi u bah Banteilang Sing Rumnong, u la shongthait noh na ka kam sorkar kaba u trei da kaba shim Voluntary Retirement Scheme (VRS) namar ba u la kut jingmut ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 na Sohra konstitwensi na ka Party BJP. Utei u rangbah u la shongthait noh na ka kam kaba u trei ha ka tnad State Institute of Rural Development ( SIRD) ka sorkar Meghalaya ha u naitung mynta u snem. Ha ka jingiakren kaba markhmat bad u Rupang u bah Bantei Rumnong u la ong ba namar ka jingthmu jong u ban iakhun elekshon u la shongthait noh na ka kam sorkar bad u la shongthait ruh na ka kam nongialam jong ka Seng Khasi khnang ban pyllait por ialade ban pynleit jingmut ha ka saiñpyrthei. U bah Bantei u dei u khun jong u MLA barim ka Sohra u bah Maham Sing Sawian.U bah Bantei u la ong ba la katto katne bnai mynta u la iaid kylleng ka Sohra konstitwensi ban pyn ithuh ialade sha ki paidbah bad ha katei ka jingiaid lynti jong u-u la ong ba ka jubab ba u ioh na ki paidbah ka dei ba ki la kwah jingkylla bad kim kwah shuh ban iohi ia ka thaiñ Sohra ba kan long kumjuh shi kumjuh. Ha katei ka jingiakren kaba jrong u rangbah Bantei u la kdew ia ki mat treikam bad ki polisi kiba u la pynkhreh lypa lada jia ba ki paidbah kin jied ia u kum u nongmihkhmat jong ki.Haba pynkynmaw ia ki kam kiba u kpa jong u, u la leh kum u nongmihkhmat , u bah Bantei u la ong ba kawei na ki kam radbah kaba u bah Maham u la leh ka dei ka jingwanrah ia ka Mawmluh Cherra Cement Limited ( MCCL) ha ka por ka sorkar Assam bad katei ka karkhana mynta ka dei ka pliang ja jong ki nong Sohra. U la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingduk jingkyrduh kaba ban mynta ia ka thaiñ Sohra hadien ka jingkhang dewiong ha kaba u la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ym don nonglam lynti ia ki paidbah ba kin bujli da kawei pat ka kam bad u la ong ba lada ki paidbah kin jied ia u kum u nonhmihkhmat u la pynkhreh ia kiba bun ki prokram bad ki polisi kumno ban rat diengkhong ia ka jingduk jingkyrduh ha ka thaiñ Sohra.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka Sohra ka dei ka thaiñ kaba khring bha ia ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei na kylleng ki jaka hynrei ki lad ioh kam ioh jam ki samla kim pat don bad kumno ban wanrah ia katei ka ioh kam ioh jam u la ong ba donkam da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti kiba ki nongmihkhmat ki hap ban leh. Haba phai sha ki surok, ka rep ka riang bad kiba bun ki mat u la ong ba ka Sohra ka dang sahdien bad ka donkam ia ki jingkylla.Ha kine ki khyndiat bnai u MLA barim ka Sohra u Dr.P.W Khongjee u la leit ia soh sha ka seng BJP bad ki khubor ki la saphriang ba un ia khun na katei ka seng ha u 2018. Halor katei ka bynta u bah Bantei u la ong ba la kham slem ka la don ka jingiakren hapdeng ka BJP bad u Dr.Khongjee hynrei u la buhteng ia katei ka kam bad dei hadien ka jingpynduh kot T.500 bad kot T.1000 u Dr.Khongjee u la pyntikna ba um treh ban rung sha ka seng BJP, ong u bah Bantei. Ha kum kane ka por ba ka elekshon ruh ka la jan u bah Bantei u la ong ba ka Party ka la donkam ia ki briew ki ban iaid noh shakhmat khamtam ban pynkhlaiñ Party kumta ki nongialam ka BJP ki la phah ia u ban iaid shakhmat. “Dei haba nga la iaid shakhmat ban pynkha ia ki Unit jong ka seng BJP ha Sohra konstitwensi ngi iohi ba la mih ha ki kotkhubor ba I Dr.Khongjee i la wan ia soh sha ka BJP” u la ong biang. La kylli hato un leh kumno lada jia ba um tiket bad lada ka tiket kan leit sha u Dr.Khongjee hato la un dang mih shakhmat ban ia khun , u bah Bantei u la rkhie bad u la ong “Nga la iaid shakhmat, nga la pynkhreh, ngam don jingartatien eiei ban ioh ia ka Tiket”.Katba ka jingiakren hapdeng u Rupang bad u bah Bantei ka dang iaid , kyndit kyndit la wan poi sa ki nongialam jong ka BJP na Sohra konstitwensi ban ia kynduh ia utei u rangbah. U Rupang u la ioh ban ia kren ruh bad kitei ki nongialam ba kynthup ia u bah Rothel Khongsit u Organising Secretary ka Sohra Mandal. Utei u nongialam ka BJP u la ong ba haduh mynta ka Sohra Mandal kam don jingtip ia ka jingrung BJP u Dr.Khongjee bad kam pat ithuh hi ruh ia u Dr.Khongjee kum u briew jong ka Party. “Ngim lah ban tip ioh u rung nangno nangno namar ha ka Party jong ngi tang shu ai Miss Call ruh phi la lah ban long dkhot, hynrei ha Sohra ngim pat ithuh ha ka Party ia u Dr.Khongjee” ong u bah Rothel Khongsit.Halor ka jingmih khubor ba u Dr.Khongjee u la ong ba ka jwat bha ban pynsngewthuh ia ki paidbah ia ka seng BJP kaba u don mynta, u bah Rothel Khongsit u la ong “Ka dei ia u ba pli ban jwat haba um dei tang u dkhot ka BJP ruh kumno un sngewthuh ia ka nongrim jong ka seng”. Katkum katei ka jingiakren bad ki nongialam jong katei ka Party na Sohra Mandal la sngewthuh ba u kyrtong ka BJP na Sohra konstitwensi un dei u bah Bantei Rumnong, wat la kam pat don ka jingkhot aplikeshon haduh mynta ruh namar kiba bun ki nongialam ba hakhmat katei ka seng ki la kyntait ia u Dr.Khongjee.
title: Shongthait u President barim ka  Seng Khasi, na ka kam sorkar

content: Shillong, 30 Nailar:U bah Sanbor Shullai u la ong ba katkum ka jingkheiñ ba la ioh na ki tnad sorkar ha kane ka jylla ki don haduh 60 hajar ngut ki samla pule na kane ka jylla kata tang ki Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo kiba leit trei ia ki kam bapher bapher shabar jylla, namar ka jingkyrduh kam ha ka jylla lajong. U bah Sanbor u la kylli, balei ba haduh 60 hajar ngut ki trai jylla ki poi shabar jylla bad ka daw, ka long na ka jingiaknieh kam sorkar ha kane ka jylla ka jur bha ha kaba wat ia ka kam Grade IV kaba lait tang 9 tylli, ki la don haduh 20 hajar ngut tam kiba thep kam.U bah Sanbor u la kren ia kitei ki ktien ha ka jingialang pynkupburom jong ka Greater Laban Communitty Development Society ia ki samla kiba la dep ban shah hikai ha ki kam bapher bapher ba kin lah seng kam lajong kiba la pass na ka Subham Skill Development Centre kaba don ha Rilbong, Shillong. Katei ka dei ka jaka ai jinghikai ha ki kam suhjaiñ, kam pynbhabriew, kam pynwandur ia ki shniuh, ka kam shna mobile bad kiwei pat ki kam.U bah Sanbor u la ong ba ha ka pyrthei kyrduh kam mynta ki samla kim dei ban khmih lynti ia ki kam sorkar hynrei ki dei ban pynleit jingmut ha ki kam lajong bad shuwa ba kin seng ia ki kam ki dei ba nda ioh jinghikai shuwa ba kan long ka jingioh nong ia ki. U la kyntu ia kitei kiba la pass ba lada ki donkam, ka jingkhang ka ing jong u ka plie rynghang ia ki ban ia syllok ia ki lad ki lynti kumno ban iarap ia ki. Ha katei ka sngi ki la don haduh 200 ngut ki samla kiba la pyndep ia ki jinghikai bapher bapher jong ki ha katei ka shlem ai jinghikai.
title: 60 hajar ngut ki samla kiba trei  shabar jylla, ong u bah Sanbor

content: Nongstoiñ, 30 Nailar:Ki pulit ka Chahlang Police Station ha ryngkat ki pulit SF 10 mynta ka step kila hiar sha ka thain Riangdim Nengdawak ban leit khynra ia ki lehnoh GNLA bad katei ka jinghiar kynsan kynsan jong ki pulit sha katei ka thain ka long hadien, ba ki la ioh jingtip kaba tikna ba ki ehrang GNLA ki ju buhrieh ia ki tiar ialeh ki jong ki ha katei ka thain.Shuh shuh ka khubor na ki heh pulit jong ka District ka iathuh ruh ba katei ka jingleit khynra GNLA jong ki pulit kala poi shaduh ka khlaw Wakphamrang bad ha katei ka jingleit khynra ki pulit kim shym la lap dien shuh ia ki dkhot jong ka GNLA, pynban na katei ka khlaw ki pulit ki la lap bad ioh kurup ia shibum ki tiar ialeh jong katei ka kynhun kaikhlaw ia kaba la buhrieh bha da katei ka kynhun ha katei ka khlaw.Ha katei ka jingleit khynra ki pulit ka Chahlang bad ki pulit SF 10 kila ioh ban kurup noh ia ki tiar ialeh jong katei ka kynhun kaikhlaw kiba kynthup ia kawei ka Insas Rifle, kawei ka AK 47 rifle, u wei u bom hand granite, 1 KG ka Gelatine Stick, 10 tylli ki kuli SBBL ki bym Pat pyndonkam, 86 tylli ki kuli AK 47 ki bym pat pyndonkam, kawei ka suloi magazine pouch, kawei ka patlun Shipai (comoflage).Shuh shuh ki heh pulit ka Chahlang kila iathuh ruh ba ka jingkhynra ia kitei ki kynhun kaikhlaw ka GNLA da ki pulit ka dang iai bteng ha katei ka thain khnang ban lap dien ia ki ehrang ban pyntikna ia ka shong suk shong sain ha ka thain Chahlang hi baroh kawei.
title: Hiar ki pulit Chahlang, khynra  GNLA ha Wakphangram

content: Umiam, 30 Nailar:U Myntri khynnah ka tnad rel ka sorkar pdeng u Rajen Gohain, u la kynnoh ba ka jingdkoh ka jingshna ia ka lynti rel ha Meghalaya ka dei namar bym shim khia ka sorkar jylla ba synshar da ka Congress hapoh ka jingialam u Myntri Rangbah u Mukul Sangma.U Gohain u la pyn-shai ia kane haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingialang ha ICAR Umiam mynta ka sngi. “Ka jingshna ia ka lynti rel ka dkoh ha Meghalaya namar bym shim khia ka sorkar jylla”, la ong u Gohain.U Gohain uba dei u MP na Assam, u la kam ba ka kam ha kaba iadei bad ka lynti kan sa iaid kham bha ynda la wan da kawei ka sorkar ha kane ka jylla ha ki bnai ban wan.Ka jingwan ka lynti rel kan ai kam ai kam da ki lak ngut ia ki samla ha kane ka tnad nalor kiwei pat ki kam”, la ong u Gohain.“Ngam sngewthuh balei ki pynsangeh ia ka lynti rel, hynrei ka elekshon kan long ha u Rymphang lashem snem bad ka sorkar kaba thymmai kan wan bad nga kyrmen ba kan leh eiei halor kane”, la ong u Gohain.U la kyrmen ba kan don beit ka jingkylla ha ka sorkar ha kane ka jylla bad kano kano ka sorkar kaba wan ha ka bor kan sa shim khia ban pyniaid shakhmat ia ka lynti rel ha kane ka jylla.U la ong ba lada dei ba la dep lut ban shim jaka, kane ka kam kan nym sangeh bad ka dei na kane ka daw ba ka jingtrei ia ka lynti rel ka la hap ban sangeh.U la ong ba lada ka sorka jylla ka shim khia kan plie lad ia ki samla ha ka ioh kam ioh jam ha kane ka jylla.“Ki ophisar ki la iakynduh bunsien bad ka sorkar jylla halor kane ka kam, hynrei ka sorkar jylla kam shym la leh eiei haduh mynta watla ka ju kular man ka por”, u la ong u Gohain.U la ong ba ka sorkar pdeng ka kwah ban pyniasoh da ka lynti rel ha baroh ki jylla ha ka ri khamtam ki jylla ki bym don lynti rel ha kane ka dong mihngi ka India.U la ong ba ka jingwan ka lynti rel, kan pyntad ia ki mar ki mata ba wanrah nabar bad kan pynsuk ia ki mar ban kit nangne shabar jylla ruh.Lah ban kdew ba ka jingshna ia ka lynti rel la hap ban pynsangeh shwa shipor da ka sorkar jylla hadien ba ka KSU ka la pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ban pyrshah jur ha ki Bnai ba la dep.Ka KSU ka la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pyntreikam shwa ia ki lad jingiada na ka jingwanrung ki briew nabar sha kane ka jylla.Dang shen u myntri ka tnad Statistic Programme and Implementation u D.V. Sadananda Gowda u la ong ba ka sorkar pdeng ka sngewthuh ia ka jingeh jong ki briew kane ka jylla ban pyrshah ia ka lynti khamtam ka KSU hynrei ka donkam ban pynbeit ia kane ka jingeh.U la ong ba halor kane ka jingeh ba iadei bad ka lynrel, un sa leit ban iakren bad ka tnad ba dei peit ynda la poi ha Delhi ban pynbeit noh ia ka.U Gowda uba la wan ban bishar bniah ia ki jingiaid ki kam ki jam ba la bei pisa ka sorkar pdeng ha kane ka jylla, u la iathuh ba ka sorkar pdeng ka la mang pisa T. 6000 klur ban shna ia ka lynti rel ha kane ka jylla kynthup ba pyniasoh na Assam bad haduh mynta T.590 klur lah dep pynlut kynthup 250 klur ban siew ia ka bai jaka jong ki briew, T.390 klur ha ka jingpyntrei ia kane ka projek kaba dang shu sdang.
title: Pynsangeh ka sorkar jylla  ia ka lynti rel, ong u myntri

content: U Jairam Ramesh, u nongialam jong ka seng Congress, ula pynsngew mynta ka sngi, ba ka sorkar BJP, ka don jingthmu ban pynduh noh ia ka National Green Tribunal (NGT). “Ngi don ha ki por kiba eh shibun ha kine ki sngi bad lada pynduh ia ka, kan dei ka jingktah kaba khraw shibun eh” ong U Ramesh, uba dei u myntri barim ba peit ia ka tnat khlaw bad ka tnat pynneh mariang bad ula ong shuh shuh, ba kane ka sorkar kam peit satia, na bynta ka jingbha jong ka India ia mynta bad ia ka lashai, hynrei ki peit, na ka bynta ban pynmyntoi ha ka kam khaii pateng jongki.Halor ka kam tih Uranium na Wahkaji, U Ramesh, u ong ba ka sorkar kam lah ban shu pynkut jyndat ia katei ka projek tih Uranium bad ula ong ba kaba kongsan, ka long ba ki nongialam ha ka sorkar, ki dei ban shim ia ka rai ban iada ia ka mariang bad kam myntoi ban shu thaw ia ki surok, ki nanum bad ki jaka sam bor ding bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Meghalaya, ka wan ba lai ha ka jingdon Uranium ha India bad ka wan hadien jong ka Jharkhand bad ka Andhra Pradesh bad ka jylla, ka don 16 percent u Uranium. Ka UCIL, ka khein ba u don haduh 375,000 ton u uranium rew bad uba lah ban khlong kumba 1,500 ton ha ka shisngi.
title: Thmu ka sorkar BJP, ban pyndam  noh ia ka NGT, ong U Ramesh

content: Shillong, 30 Nailar:12 ngut ki MDC jong ka KHADC ki la pyniasoh sha ka seng saiñpyrthei kaba thymmai ka People’s Democratic Front ( PDF) ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Comunitty Hall ha Jaiaw, Lumpyllon. Ki 12 ngut ki MDC kiba la pyniasoh sha ka PDF ki long u bah H.S Shylla MDC ka Nongkrem konstitwensi, u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh MDC ka Mawkynrew, u bah Latiplang Kharkongor MDC ka Nongthymmai, u bah Hadrian Lyngdoh MDC ka Mawkyrwat, u bah Arbinus Lyngdoh MDC ka Umroi, bah James Sylliang MDC ka Mawhati, kong Grace Mary Kharpuri MDC ka Nongshken, bah L.G Nongsiej MDC ka Nongstoiñ, Morningstar Mawsor MDC ka Mawshynrut, Blanding Warjri MDC ka Mawthadraishan, Victor Rani MDC ka Jirang bad u bah James Ban Basaiawmoit MDC ka Mawkhar-Pynthor.Ia katei ka jingialang la pyniaid da u President jong ka PDF u Aibanlum Marbaniang, la donlang ki nongialam katei ka seng ba kynthup ia u ba Auspicious Lyngdoh Mawphlang General Secretary, u Working President bah Emlang Lyttan bad kiwei pat. La don ruh ki riew pawkhmat ha ka sain pyrthei kum u bah C.B Syiem na Nongpoh, u bah Teibor Pathaw na Mawlai bad kiwei pat. La pdiang sngewbha ia kitei ki MDC sha ka PDF ha ryngkat ka ksing ka dhah ka put ka tem naduh na khyrdop ban rung sha katei ka ïng dorbar Jaiaw.Ha katei ka jingialang la ailad ia baroh 12 ngut ki MDC ba kin kren lyngkot, ha ka jingkren jong ki ki la ong ba shen u nongialam rangbah jong katei ka seng u bah Pynshngaiñ N syiem ( CEM ka KHADC) un sa wan ban shimti ia ka kam nongialam. U bah James Ban Basaiawmoit u la ong “Shen u nongialam jong ngi uba long u maji jong ka PDF un sa wan ban shimti ia u boitha ban king ia ka lieng, uta u maji u dei u bah P.N Syiem”. U bah Arbinus Lyngdoh u la ong ba baroh 12 ngut ki MDC kiba la wan ia soh sha ka PDF ki dei kiba la Pass ia ka Training na ka seng Congress, UDP bad HSPDP, “Baroh ngi dei kiba la pass Training na ka Congress, UDP, HSPDP, ngi long kum u sohphlang katba nangkynruh nang bhabriew, dei tang sa ha phi ki paidbah ba phin Pass ia ka Training ha u 2018 kumba pass ma ngi, u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem un dei u nongialam jong ngi” ong u bah Arbinus.U bah Victor Rani u la ong ba mynta u nongialam jong ka PDF u dei CEM jong ka KHADC, hynrei ha u 2018 yn weng noh ia uwei u dak E bad un long u CM jong ka jylla. U bah H.S Shylla u la ong ba mynta u President jong ka PDF u dei u bah Banlum Marbaniang bad u la lah ban lum katne, hynrei hadien yn sa wan shimti pat da u bah Pynshngaiñ, “Ka dei shisha ka kam phylla ba mynta u lum u bah Banlum yn wan pynshngaiñ pat sa ia u bah Pynshngaiñ,Ynda la dep lum ioh jingshngaiñ” ong u bah H.S Shylla. U bah Hadrian Lyngdoh u la ong ba kitei ki 12 ngut ki MDC ki long kum ki 12 ngut ki Apostol bad u la ong ba roh kitei kin ia ieng lang ban iasaid ha ing dorbar thaw-aiñ ka jylla, “Ki 12 ngut ki MDC ki long kum ki 12 ngut ki Apostol” u la ong.
title: 12ngut ki Apostol, ong U bah  Hadrian ia ki MDC rung PDF

content: Shillong, 30 Nailar:Ka kong Sarita Lyngdoh Nongpyiur ka lok jong u MLA barim ka Mawlai uba la khlad noh u bah Founderstrong Cajee ka la pynbna paidbah mynta ka sngi ba kan ia khun ia ka elekshon MLA 2018 na Mawlai konstitwensi kum ka kyrtong shimet. Ka Kong Sarita ka la pynbna ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Mawlai Phudmuri ha ka jingiadonlang ki nongkyrshan jong ka seng Congress bad ki dkhot jong ka Greater Mawlai People Union (GMPU).Ka kong Sarita ka la ong ba ka shim ia ka rai ban ia khun ha ka elekshon ym ban shu pynlong kum ka tamasa hynrei ka dei namar ba ka don ka mynsiem ba sngewkhia ban trei na ka bynta u paidbah ka Mawlai. Lah ban kdew ba khyndiat bnai mynshuwa ki khubor ki la saphriang ha Mawlai ba ka kong Sarita kan kyrshan ia u MLA ba mynta u bah Embhah Syiemlieh, hynrei kham hadien la saphriang ba kan kyrshan ia u bah Teibor Pathaw, hynrei mynta pat ka rai kaba shai ka la mih ha kaba ka la pynbna ba kan ia khun da lade hi.
title: Yn ia khun marwei ka lok u bah Founder

content: Shillong, 30 Nailar:U Ward Commissioner ka Cantonment Board u Vikash Gupta u la bitar jur ia ka jingkhang ki shipai ia ka lynti iaid paidbah na Anjali, na thain Lady Keane bad ka ban mih sha Civil hospital, kaba la khang lad bad pynthut ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi, u Vikash Gupta bad u Pares uba dei u vice president ka Shillong Cantonment Board, ki la kam ba ki shipai ki la pynkhein ia ka kyndon ain 258, kaba kren shaphang ka jingailad ia ki paidbah ban iaid ha ki lynti jong ki jaka shipai.Ki la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba ki dei ban kren lem ia kane kum ka sur jongki khnang ba ka bor ba dei peit kin ioh sngew ia ka jingleh ki shipai.Kine ki la ong ba ha ka jingialang mynta ka sngi, u commandant jong ki shipai 101 Area, ha jaka ban iakren pynkut ban iapynbeit ia kane ka jingeh, u la phet noh pynban bak na jaka ba long jingialang khlem pat kut satia ka jingialang. Katkum ka jingong jongki, u commandant ula shu kren lyngkut beit ba ka jingkhang ia ki lynti dei namar ba ka don kata ka jingma ia ki bor iada.Haba iakren kham bniah halor kane, u la phet noh bak na ka jingialang khlem ap shuh shuh, la ong u Vikash. Ha kane ka jingialang la don lang u CEO ka Shillong Cantonment Board, Ward Commissioner ba la khot khnang ban iapynbeit ia kane ka kam.“Ngi kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin kren lem ia kane khnang ba ki bor ba dei peit shalor kin tip bad ioh sngew”, la ong u Vikash.U Vikash u la ong ba ki bor shipai ki la khang ia kine ki lynti iaid paidbah la lai snem mynta bad ka don ka por ba ki shu plie teng khat eh bad kane ka jingkhang ia ki khyrdop bad ki lynti ka la pynlong ia ki paidbah ka thain South Shillong, West Shillong ban iakynduh jingeh haba iaid kjat ban leit sha Khyndai Lad, bad ban iaid lyngkot khlem da donkam ban shong kali.U Pares u la ong ba ia ka jingiakren ha kane ka jingialang yn sa phah sha ka sorkar pdeng jong ka tnad Iada ri ba kan tip ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: Phet bak u heh shipai, haba  iakren bad ki heh Cantonment

content: Shillong, 31 Nailar:Ka jingkhot apli keshon ka Congress na ka bynta ki briew ba kwah ban iakhun ia ka elekshon ka la sdang mynta ka sngi ka 31 tarik Nailar bad kan kut ha ka 15 tarik nailur kaban long 16 sngi.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum na ka MPCC, ka jingkhot aplikeshon na ka bynta kiba kwah ban aplai kyrtong la aiti ha man ki Block Congress ba kin pyndep shwa katei ka por.Ka party Congress ka la khot ia kane ka aplikeshon ban ioh jingkhein katno ngut ki MLA jongka kiba khlem aplai tiket ban iakhun ha kane ka elekshon bad kane kan pynthikna ia ka party ba kan nang ban wad briew da uwei pat u kyrtong.Kumba ka paw haduh mynta, saw tylli ki Block Congress la dep pynwai kynthup ka Nartiang Block Congress kaba long MLA u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, ka Umroi kaba long MLA u Bah Ngaitlang Dhar, ka Mairang ka bym don MLA bad ka Mawkyrwat kaba mihkhmat da u Bah Rowel Lyngdoh.Ka jingpynwai noh ia kine ki Block Congress Committee kiba dang don ki MLA, ka pyni shai ia u dak ba ka party kam shaniah shuh ha ki MLA jongka, kiba dang don ha ka party bad ka thew ba ka lah ban bujli da kiwei ki briew ha jaka jongki.
title: Sdang khot aplikeshon  kyrtong ka Congress

content: Shillong, 31 Nailar:Ka bor Hima Mylliem lem bad ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council bad ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board (MSPCB) ki la shim ia ka sienjam kaba tyngeh ban pynlong ia ka Iewduh kaba khuid bad don nam biang kum ka mynnor.Mynta ka sngi ka Hima Mylliem, ka la lum ia ka jingialang jong baroh ki nongshong iew ha Madan Student, Jaiaw kynthup ki Khasi bad dkhar ban pynsngewthuh ia ki kumno ban bat ia ka jingkhuid jong kane ka iew.Ha Iewduh ki don kumba 2000 tam ki dukan ba dei longtrai ki Khasi bad dkhar.Haba kren ha kane ka jingialang u Environmental Engineer ka MSPCB, u Bah Wanshan Kharkrang u la maham ba lada ki paidbah khamtam ki nongshong iew kim patiaw mynta ban leh khuid, kan sa poi ka por ba kin hap ban jaw ummat kthang ynda la wan tuklar ka National Green Tribunal (NGT),kumba la jia ia ka jingtih dewiong ha jylla.“Hato phin ap haduh ban khang ka NGT ia ka jingjaboh ka Iewduh bad kan bthah ia phi ban bud ia ki kyndon ba ka buh”, la ong u Bah Kharkrang.U la ong ba ka MSPCB ka la mana pyrshah katkum ka ain ban die ia ki plastik kiba palat 50 micron ka jingrben bad kiba die plastik ki dei ban rejister bad ka Board lem bad ka ophis u Syiem Mylliem bad ym shah shuh ia ki bym rejister ban die plastik.“Kiba die plastik ki dei ban wah ia ka rejister ha Dukan bad ki paidbah ki dei ban thied beit ia ki plastik tang na ki bad kiba pynkhein ia ka ain, kin shah dain kuna T.1 lak bad ka shong along hynriew B’nai”, la ong u Bah Kharkrang.U la ong run ba ka Board kan pynlong ia ka jingjurip man ka por bad lada lap ba ki nongshong Dukan bad ki trai kin ngat lang ha ka jingpynshitom bad u la kyntu ia ki nongshong iew ba kin sngewbha iatreilang ban wanrah ia ka jingkhuid ka iewduh.U Bah Kharkrang u la ong ba ka jingpynkhuid ia ki niut dei ban long ha u nongpynmih niut bad ban pyniakhlad ia ki niut ba pyut bad bym pyut.“Lada phim burom ia ka jingbthah u Syiem bad ka KHADC kan poi ka por ba kin pyntip sha ka NGT ba kin iathuh ba kila dep bthah ia phi ki nongshong iew hynrei phim bud bad hangta phin sa kynduh jingeh kaba jur”, u la long.Katba u Syiem u Paiem Ricky Nelson Syiem ula ong ba ka jingthmu ka jingialang ka long ban iatreilang ban pynlong ia ka Iewduh kaba khuid.U la ong ba lada don kiba iathuh ia ki nongbret niut, ka Hima kan ai buskit mar shiteng na ka bai kuna kaba long T. 8000.U la ong ba ka jingkhuid kan long ban khring ia ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei. U Paiem ula ong ba ym shah shuh ban sah briew ha Iewduh bad ban pynlong ktem die kyaid bad ka bor Hima kan leh da kaba tyngeh ia kiba leh pyrshah halor Kane.Ha ka jingialang la wan iashim bynta ki nongshong iew, ki Myntri, u EM u bah Latiplang kharkongor .Ha kajuh ka por, u Myntri C Kharkongor haba kren kyrpang hadien ba la wai ka jingialang u la iathuh ba ka jingkhot ia kane ka jingialang ka long ban pynshai paidbah ba ki nongshong iew ki dei ban leh khuid hadien ba la mih ka jingud jingnam na ki paitbah ia ka jingjaboh bad kawei pat ka dei ka jingbthah na ka NGT ba ka Iewduh dei ban long ba khuid ki nala, ki lynti syngkien.
title: Byrngem ban ai sha ka NGT,  ia ki nongiew ba saitlah

content: Shillong, 31 Nailar:Mynhynnin ka sngi u samla John Hashah Asst. General Secretary ka KSU Mawlai Circle u la lait jamin na Shillong District Jail. Haduh mynta ki dkhot ka KSU kiba la lait jamin ki long 14 ngut bad kiba dang don pat ha phatok ki don sa 17 ngut. Na kitei ki 17 ngut tang uwei uba dang don ha Shillong District Jail katba ki 16 pat ki don ha Ri-Bhoi District Jail. Kane ka long kat kum ka jingpyntip, na u General Secretary ka KSU u samla Donald V Thabah.Lah ban pynkyn-maw ba ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai 6 ngut ki dkhot ka KSU ki la ioh jamin bad ki la lait phatok ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai, kitei ki dei kiba shah pynngat mukotduma ha Rynjah bad Sardar PS. Kitei ki dkhot ka KSU kiba la lait phatok ki kynthup ia u Alkwis Kharbani, u Regain Mawri, u Seiborlag Pakyntien, u Shanbok Kharmawphlang bad u Kynpham Marbaniang kiba ngat mukotduma ha MMPO bad kiwei ki kyndon IPC na Rynjah police station, katba u Shanbor Lyngdoh u ngat mukotduma ha Sardar Police station.Lah ruh ban pynkynmaw ba ia kitei ki dkhot ka KSU la pynlait jamin da kaba siew ia ka pisa mar T. 30 hajar marwei ryngkat ki kyndon ba la teh ba kim dei ban leh biang ia ki kam bad ruh ki dei ban leit mih haba donkam ka kashari ne ki pulit. Kitei ki dkhot ka KSU kiba la shah kem baroh ki dei kiba la shah kynnoh ba ki donkti ha ka jingjia kaba la mih jingkulmar ha Ronghana ha ka jingiakhih lynti rel.
title: Lait phatok 14 ngut ki KSU,  dang shong patok sa 17 ngut

content: Shillong, 31 Nailar:Ka Hima Mylliem ha ka jinglum jing ialangbah jong ka mynta ka sngi ka la rai ban pynshitom ia kiba bret jaboh pathar ha iewduh da ka kuna bad da kaba shong phatok bad ka la thong ruh ban aid a ka buskit ia ki briew kiba bat ia kita ki nongleh jaboh. Halor katei ka rai jong ka jingialang ba la lum da ka Hima Mylliem u Rupang u la twad jingmut na ki nongiew kumno ki sngew halor katei ka rai lehkhuid ka Hima Mylliem ban pynpaw nam ia ka ïewduh.U bah Korbar Lyngdoh Nonglait President ka Nongiew Association, u la ong ba katei ka rai ka Hima Mylliem ka dei kaba biang eh, hynrei hap ruh ban peit la ka lah ne-em ban pyntrei ia katei ka rai. U la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ki don tang ar tylli ki jaka bret jaboh ha iewduh kawei ha Standjeep bad kawei pat ha Iew Mawlong. “Kat ki nongshongiew kiba bun ha Iewduh hato kin ieh la ki jingdie ki mar ki mata jong ki, kin ieh ia ka dukan jong ki ban leit bret jaboh khnang shaduh sha Stand Jeep bad Iew Mawlong, ka Dustbin ruh ym don ha iewduh” ong u bah Korbar da kaba buh jingkylli shano ki nongiew kin bret ia ki jaboh jong ki , “Hato kin pynlang ia katei kaba sma baroh shisngi shimiet hapoh dukan jong ki, ki nongwan lum jaboh ruh kim ju wan mynmiet ne janmiet, ki lum jaboh tang mynstep” u la ong.Nangta utei u President ki nongiew u la ong ruh ba kat ka iewduh baroh kawei ki don tang 4 tylli ki jaka leit shabar bad kitei ki jaka leit shabar ruh kim plie ha ka por mynstep, ki plie haduh ka por 8 ne 9 baje, “Ha iewduh naduh ka por mynstep ki nongiew ki la poi, ki Daju lei dang step ki la poi, shaei kin leit shabar, kin set haduh da plie ki jaka leit bar haduh katei ka por, kim banse ban leit sha kyndong kynshrot” ong biang u bah Korbar. U la ong ruh ba kitei ki jaka leit bar ki plie haduh ka por 8 baje mynstep bad mynmiet ki la khang katba ha iewduh pat ki don kiba sahmiet ruh, “Kitei kiba sahmiet shano ki leit shabar, dei na kata ka daw ngi dawa na ka Hima Mylliem ba kan pynkhuid ia ki nongsah miet be-aiñ ha Iewduh” u la ong.Shuh shuh utei u President ki Nongiew u la ong ba ka jingkren ka Hima Mylliem ban leh khuid ia ka iewduh kam ia hap satia bad ka kam, “Kumno kein lah ban lehkhuid haba tang ka nala ruh ym don, ki lynti iaid kjat kiba la jot la pei ruh ym don ba maramot, ka eh palat ban lehkhuid lada ym pat lah ban pynbiang ia kitei baroh ki jingdonkam” ong u ba hkorbar haba ia kren bad u Rupang.
title: Ki daju dangstep, ki la poi, kin set leit  shabar, ha ban da plie painkhana?

content: Jowai, 1 Nailur:Ka Jaintia Students’Union (JSU) bad ka kong Phidalia Toi ka longkmie ba pawkhmat hapoh ka Rilum Jaintia, hadien bala ia pyrkhat sani bha halor ka jingmih ka jingiashrut bad ka jingiabein niam hapoh ka face book kaba la ktah mat iong iaka imlang sah lang baroh kawei, mynta ka sngi ki la ia kynduh ia u SP bad DSP jongka West jaintia Hills ban kyrpad ia ki ba kin shimkhia halor kane ka mat, namar lada shu sngap bad ailad kumne khlempep kan wanrah iaka jingsngew iapher niam hapoh ka bri u hynniew trep, bad kane hi kan wanrah iaka jingjot jingpra hapoh ka imlang sahlang baroh kawei.U president jongka JSU haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u ong ba ‘ ymdon mano mano ba lah ban khang iaka jingngeit niam jong u/ne ka briew hapoh ka ri jongngi namar ka ka dei ka Secular Country, hynrei sngewsih ban iohi ba ki briew jongngi kim kheinkor ia kane, bad nalor ka iabein niam sa ka iatim ia tla bad timsih timsang, kane ka thad madan bad pynhiardor iaka jaitbynriew baroh kawei kaba bgi tip kum ka Ri tip briew tip blei.Kumta, daka jingsngewkhia iaka bha ka miat, ka JSU ryngkat ka jingai mynsiem jong ka kong Toi, ka la kyrpad ia ki bor jong ka ain bam tem noh ia kane ka jingia kynad ioh kan poi sha ka rem ka rai bad ka jot ka pra jong ka jaitbynriew.Shuh shuh ki kyrpad ruh ia ki Samla baroh ban kiar noh na kane khnang ban imsuk bad don ka jingiatylli.Ha kane ka sngi SP u la kular ban shimkhia bad tuklar mardor ia kane, bad ka bor jongka ain kan kan leh iala ka jongka kamram.
title: Na ka ia bein niam, ia  kynduh ka JSU ia U SP

content: Shillong, 31 Nailar:Ka jingkyntiap seng ki MDC ha kane ka samoi treikam jong ki kaba mynta ka la jubor bha ha kaba u wei u MDC u la kyntiap kumba 3 seng eiei kata tang hapoh ka 4 snem. Ha KHADC ki la don bun ngut ki MDC kiba kyntiap seng bad katei ka sdang naduh ka por ka ARPA haduh ka por jong ka PDF mynta.Ka jingphet seng ka la sdang na uwei na ki MDC ba la jop na ka seng UDP u bah Hadrian Lyngdoh MDC ka Mawkyrwat bad utei u la phet sha ka seng Congress ha ka por jong ka ARPA hynrei utei u MDC mynta u la phet biang na ka seng Congress bad hadien ba la kylla MDC shimet shipor u la leit ban ia soh pat sha ka seng People Democratic Front ( PDF). Nalor u bah Hadrian u bah H.S Shylla u dei u MDC u ba la jop ia ka elekshon shiteng samoi na Nongkrem konstitwensi na ka seng UDP hynrei ute ruh mynta u la phet seng bad u la leit ia soh sha ka Party PDF.Ha ka jingphet seng ki MDC kaba la sha ktah eh ka dei ka seng Congress bad ka HSPDP. Ki MDC kiba la jop ha ka elekshon na ka seng Congress kiba la phet seng noh ki long u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh na Mawkynrew konstitwensi, u bah Arbinus Lyngdoh na Umroi konstitwensi, u bah Antonio War na Laitumkhrah konstitwensi, u bah Victor Rani na Jirang konstitwensi nalor u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem uba la shah sospon noh. U bah Antonio u la phet sha ka seng BJP, u bah Arbinus sha ka UDP hadien sha ka PDF, kiwei pat ki la phet sha ka PDF.Kiba la jop na ka seng HSPDP, hynrei kiba la shah beh seng noh ki kynthup ia u bah L.G Nongsiej MDC ka Nongstoiñ, u bah Morning Mawsor ka Mawshynrut, u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ka Sohryngkham. Ka kong Grace Mary Kharpuri ka Nongshken, ka dei kaba jop kum ka MDC shimet bad mynta ka la leit sha ka PDF bad u bah Blanding Warjri ka Mawthadraishan, ula jop na ka seng HSPDP bad mynta ula leit ia soh sha ka PDF.Ka KHNAM kaba don 4 ngut ki MDC mynta la sah sa tang marwei u bah Adelbert Nongrum, ki MDC jong ka KHNAM kiba la phet seng noh ki long u bah Process T Sawkmie sha ka seng Congress, u bah Latiplang Kharkongor sha ka PDF bad u bah James Ban Basaiawmoit sha ka PDF.
title: Ki MDC PDF, bun ki kyntiap  sha ki 2,3 seng hapoh ka 4 snem

content: Shillong, 21 Nailar:Ki bor shnong jong ka Mylliem Madan ïng Syiem ki la kyntait ba ki pan mab na ka Seng Khasi Mylliem bad mynta ka sngi hapoh ka jingialam jong u Rangbah Shnong u bah H.Khyriem ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingmih khubor kaba la ong ba ka shnong ka pan mab na ka Seng Khasi Mylliem. “Ngi khlem pan mab,” ong u Rangbah shnong haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor ha kaba u la ong ba katei ka jingong pan map kam pynsngewtynnad ia ka Dorbar shnong. Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingong ka Seng Khasi ba ka jaka ba ka shnong ka tyrwa ka jngai palat, u Rangbah Shnong u la ong ba ka jaka ha Lum Nongkhlaw ka dei ka jaka kaba dang pdeng bad kam jngai, naba ka don tang kumba 2 kilomitar tam na ka shong Madan ïng Syiem. Lah ban kdew ha ka dorbar bah jong ka Seng Khasi kaba la long ha ka sngi u Blei ka la dawa ba kat bym pat lah ban pynioh jaka thang ia ka Seng Khasi Mylliem, yn dang thang briew beit ha ka jaka ba thang ia u bah Kulam ha Kper Phatok.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka Dorbar shnong kam shym la pyrshah satia ban thang ia u bah Kulam ha ka 11 tarik, hynrei ka dei tang ka dak ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih ba ka Seng Khasi ka khlem burom ia ka bor shnong. Ha kaba ia dei pat ka jingdawa ka Seng Khasi ban pynshitom ia ki briew kiba donkti ha katei ka jingiakhih u Rangbah Shnong u la ong ba hap ban bishar bniah shuwa ia kane naba ka Seng Khasi Mylliem ruh ka khlem kynjoh ktien ia ka Dorbar shnong ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingthang briew.Lah ban kdew ba shisngi hadien ka jingiakren ha ophis u DC ka Secretary jong ka Seng Khasi Mylliem ka kong L. Kurkalang ka la phah kyrwoh khubor ban pynpaw ba ka kam pat don kano kano ka rai ha ka jingiakren hapdeng ka Seng Khasi Mylliem bad ki bor shnong ka Madan ïng Syiem, bad ha katei ka jingthoh ka la ong ruh ba ki nongialam shnong ka Madan ïng Syiem ki la panmab halor ka jingjia ba pyrshah thang ia u Rangbah K.Nongrum bad ki la tyrwa ban pynwad ia u lum thang uba biang.Nga la pyrshang ban wanrah sha ka jingiasuk, ong ka kong TeiliniaKa MDC ka Mylliem konstitwensi ka kong Teilinia Thangkhiew ka la ong ba ka la pyrshang ban wanrah sha ka jingiasuk hapdeng ka Seng Khasi Mylliem bad ka ki bor shnong ka Madan ïng Syiem halor ka jingjia kaba la jia ha ka 11 tarik u nailar kaba la wanrah ia ka jingiapher jingmut hapdeng ki bor shnong bad ka Seng Khasi.“Nga la pyrshang ban wanrah sha ka jingiasuk, nga la ia kren bad u President ka Seng Khasi Mylliem ruh, nga khlem pat ioh ia kren ia ki bor shnong jong ka Madan ïng Syiem hynrei nga la ia kren ia ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar shnong ka Mylliem kumno ban wanrah ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ hapoh shnong poh thaw” ong ka kong Teilinia kaba la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih ban iohi kum kitei ki jingjia.
title: Kyntait ka Madan ïng Syiem ba  ki “pan mab” na ka Seng Khasi

content: Shillong, 22 Nailar:Ka Khun Hynniew-trep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) State Youth Wing ka la leit buddien ia ka jing-dawa ban pynjlan ia ka rta ki samla wad kam da kaba leit ban iakynduh biang ia u Chief Secretary, u Y. Tsering mynta ka sngi.Haba ai jingkren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Thomas Passah u president ka KHNAM SYW ula ong “Ngi la buh ia ka jingdawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pyntrei kam noh ia kane ka hukum da kaba kyntiew ia u trai jylla sha ka 40 snem khnang ba u trai jylla yn lah ban ia khun ia ka eksam.Ula ong, ka MPSC ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna ba ka tarik ba khatduh kan long 31 tarik mynta u bnai kaba baroh ki samla kiba hapoh 32 snem ki lah ban aplai ia ka kam ia kaba ngi la buh ia ka jingdawa ba dei ban kyntiew noh ia ka karta sha ka 40 snem karta ia ki trai jylla.U la iathuh ba na ka liang u Chief secretary ula iathuh ba u la dep phah sha ka sorkar halor kane ka bynta.U Bah Thomas u la ong ba kane ka jingbuddien jong ka seng ka long ban pyntikna ia ka jingshim khia ka sorkar ban pyntrei kam ia kane ka jingdawa.
title: Sha U CS, dawa ban pynjlan  40snem ia kiba leh Civil services

content: Shillong, 22 Nailar:U MLA ka UDP na Mawthadraishan u Bah HB Nongsiej u la pdiang sngewbha ban iakhun ka HSPDP na Mawthadrai-shan ha kane ka kynti, watla ka la don ka jingiateh hapdeng ka UDP bad ka HSPDP.Haba iakren mynta ka sngi, u Bah Nongsiej u la ong, “Ngam don kano kano ka jingpyrshah ban iakhun paralok bad ka HSPDP na Mawthadraishan”,.U Bah Nongsiej u la jop ia ka MLA elekshon ha u 2013 da kaba khur 8 hajar votes tam na ka UDP bad kumjuh ha ka MDC u kamai 10 hajar vote.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Nongsiej ka jingiakhun kan long kaba biang bha namar ba kum u MLA um don kano kano ka jingartatien ba un poi sha ka thong bad kumjuh sha kiwei ki jaka.“Nga kyrmen ba ka sorkar ban wan kan long beit bym dei Congress”,la ong u Bah Nongsiej.Ha kawei ka jingtip, ka jingmih ka HSPDP kan long ruh ka jingai bor shuh shuh ia u MLA namar ba mynta ki don kumba ar ngut kiba la angnud ban iakhun tiket na ka HSPDP.Kumba ka paw, ar ngut kiba la iapan tiket na ka HSPDP ki kynthup ia ka Kong Biolynda Nonglait bad u Bah Damian marshangbai.Hynrei kiwei pat kum u Bah Blander Warjri uba dei u MDC bad u Bah S Nongkynrih ki lah ban kyrshan ia u kyrtong ka seng thymmai ka People Democratic Front(PDF) khamtam ba u Bah Warjri u la kyrshan ia ka Executive Committee ka People Democratic Forum (PDF) kaba ialam da u bah Pynshngain N Syiem kum u Chief Executive Member (CEM).La ioh jingtip ruh ba u MLA barim ka Mairang uba dei u nongialam ka Congress u Bah Boldness Nongum, u lah ban leit ai jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong ka PDF namar ba ki la don ka jingiapher jingmut bad ka Kong Irene Lyngdoh kaba dei ka MLA barim ka Pariong.Ka thymmei khubor, ka la iathuh ba ka Congress ka don ar ngut kiba pan tiket na ka Congress kynthup ka Kong Irene Lyngdoh bad u Bah Pius.
title: Pdiang U Bah Brol ban iakhun  ka HSPDP na Mawthadraishan

content: Shillong, 06 Nailar:U nongniah ka kali kawei Mahindra DI (ML05 0731) u Bah Kwostar Diengdoh, 45 snem na Mawkyrwat uba kum tynrah ia ka kali ba synran ia u Lat ka jylla u la shah pynngat ha ka kyndon thmu pyniap kumba jia ia uwei u nongniah kali, uba tynrah ia u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma ha u snem ba la dep.Ia une u nongniah la pynngat haduh san tylli ki kyndon Indian Penal Code kaba iadei bad ka jing-thmu ban shim ia ka jingim.U Superintendent of Police (Traffic) u Bah NK Syiem u la iathuh ba ia u nongniah katei ka Mahindra Pick-up la pynngat ha kine ki kyndon ka IPC kiba iadei bad ka jingthmu ban shim ia ka jingim.“La pynngat ia u ha ka kyndon U/S 307/279/337/338/427 IPC bad mynta u dang don ha ka jingbishar ka Kashari”, la ong u Bah Syiem.Ka kyndon 307 ka IPC ka kren shaphang ka jingthmu ban shim ia ka jingim, katba ka 239 ka kren ia ka jingniah kali khlem akor, 337 bad 338 ki kren ia ka jingniah kaba lah ban wanrah ia ka jingma ia kiwei, bad ka 427 ka kren ia ka jingshah pynjulor jong ki mar.Ha kane ka sngi Balang, san ngut ki nongbud pahara ia u Lat ka jylla ki la mynsaw hadien ba ka kali Scorpio (ML10B-0227) kaba ki shong, la kynnoh ba ka la shah rat ha ka Mahindra (ML05 0731) ha ka por 12:48 minit ha Mawlai Mawiongrim.Kane ka la jia ha kaba ki wan synran ia u Lat ka jylla u Banwarilal Purohit uba dang wan na Guwahati sha Shillong. Kiba la mynsaw ki long u Hav. Gopal Gurung, ABC Mankhraw Sawian, ABC Anil Kr. Rai, ABC Ranjit Monungdar, ABC. Mantu Madok bad la pynkit ia ki sha Civil Hospital Shillong.Ka kali kiba synran ia u Lat ynda la poi ha Mawiongrim NH 40 hajan No Entry Point, kawei ka kali Mahindra DI (ML05 0731) ba niah u Bah Kwostar Diengdoh, 45 snem na Mawkyrwat kaba wan na ka liang marpyrshah kynsan kynsan ka la rat ia ka Scorpio ba niah da u Rinaldo F Khyriem 26 snem, haduh ba ka la kylla pyrdet.Namar kane, kine san ngut ki la mynsaw tangba kam da long kaba jubor haduh katta. Ia kane ka kali ba rat ka Scorpio la bat noh da ki pulit.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ba U Jeskalur L. Mawdoh, uba niah ia ka Max, kaba kamai kit briew, ula kum syllud ia ka kali u myntri rangbah ha ka 9tarik Rymphang 2016 bad ula shah pyn ngat ha ka kyndon307 IPC, kaba kynnoh ba u thmu ban pyniap ia u myntri rangbah; hynrei kham hadien, la weng noh ia katei ka ain bad la pynhap ha ka sekshon 279 IPC bad kaba dei ka jingniah kali thurmur, ka 336 IPC, kaba buh jingma ia ka jingim jong u briew bad sa ka 427 IPC, kaba leh thurmur bad kaba pynjot kaba shongdor palat ia ka T.50 shaneng.
title: 5 kyndon, ia uba tynrah ia ka kali u  Lat, kum uba tynrah ia kali u Mukul

content: Mawshun, 8 Nailar:Mynta ka sngi U Bah Prestone Tynsong MLA jong ka Pynursla, u la plie ia ka krem, kaba don harud shnong Mawshun, kaba dei ka shnong, kaba iaid lynti sha Dawki.Haba kren ha ka jingialang plie ha ka iing dorbar Shnong Mawshun, U bah Prestone, u pynsngew ba ka krem, ka dei ka kabu ksiar ia ki nongshong shnong, ba kin khring ia ka kam shang pyrthei ha katei ka shnong. U MLA, ula ong “Ngi shu peit jawdud ia ka AS 01, kaba iaid sha Dawki, hynrei ki don ha katei ka shnong, ki don ter ter, tangba tang shiphew tyngka ruh ym lah die”. La ong biang U bah Tynsong, ba ka jinghiar jong ki nongshang pyrthei sha ka thain Pynursla, Dawki, ka la sdang tam, ban ia kaba ki leit sha Sohra ha kine ki sngi, hynrei, u kren bynniaw pat ba ka jingmyntoi sha ki trai shnong jong ka thain, ka long ba tang shi percent ruh kam don.Ula ai jingmut ia ki trai shnong ba kin phai sha ka kam shang pyrthei, namar ba ula pynsngew ba ka rep synsar, ka la duna bha bad kaba lah ban duh syndon ha ki snem ki ban sa wan bad U Bah Tynsong, u kren bynniaw, ba ka jingpyniaid iew ia ka kam shang pyrthei sha ka thain Pynursla, ka ka dang duna shibun eh.Nalor U bah Tynsong, la ioh ia ka jingkren, na U bah Mak Diengdoh, u ophisar jong ka tnat shang pyrthei ka sorkar Jylla, uba pynshlur ia ki samla, kiba la pas Class VIII, IX ba kin shah hikai ialade ban long ki nongialam ia ki nongshang pyrthei, ba kin shet jingbam ia ki nongshang pyrthei, ha kaba ka jinghikai, ka don kaba 3taiew, 4 bnai bad haduh hynriew bnai bad nangta ba ki don sa ki skhim ban ai jaka sahmiet ia ki nongshang pyrthei.U Bah Hawson Khongsit, uba dei uwei na ki trai jong katei ka Krem, ula pynsngew ba ki nongshong shnong ha Mawlynnong, Goa bad ha kiwei ki Jylla, ki don kiba iohkam haduh 70percent na ka kam shang pyrthei bad u iathuh ruh, ba ula pynleit jingmut ialade, ha kine ki lai snem duna, na bynta ban trei ha katei ka kam kaba khring ia ki nongshang pyrthei.Ha katei ka jingialang, la ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na U Sachin Chaudhari, uba na ka Explore Globe, Mumbai bad uba dei uwei na ki nongialam lynti ia ki briew, kiba kwah ban kai sha Ri Khasi, ban peit ia ki krem bad kiwei ki jaka shangkai pyngngad.La ioh ruh ia ka jingrwai ha katei ka sngi, na ka kynhun Nang Ai Mynsiem, na Pynter bad ka jingkren na U Sordar ka Raid Mawshun, U bah Lamiki Khongdkhar.Katei ka krem, ka don ka thliew kaba rit ha khmat jongka bad la iathuh ba ka don ka jingjngai kaba 50,60 metre ban rung iaid kai, katba kito kiba kwah ban leit rung peit bniah, ki lah ban rung haduh 200,300 metre. Hapoh jong katei ka krem, ka don ka um, kaba jylliew, ha kaba kito kiba leit ngam ki iathuh ba ka poi haduh syngkai bad ki don ruh ki dohkha ha katei ka pung. La iohi ia ki maw, kiba long rong ksiar, kiba don ha katei ka krem bad kiba nep kiba noh sha madan. Ki don ruh ki krem kiba kynjang bad la iohi ba ka don ka um ha ka pung, ha kaba la iathuh ba ki don bun tylli ki lad, ynda la rung shapoh.
title: Plie U MLA Pynursla, ia ka  krem ha shnong Mawshun

content: Shillong, 8 Nailar:Lashai ka sngi ki bahaing hasem jong u Dajied Kynsai Syiemlieh (u samla uba la shah rahbor sha Bangladesh) kin leit ban shimti ia u na khappud ka India bad Bangladesh na Dalu kaba don ha West Garo Hills District. Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u kpa jong u Dajied u bah Rijoy Basaiawmoit u la ong ba u khun jong u mynta u dang don ha kti ki shipai Bangladesh bad lashai ka sngi yn aiti ha ki shipai BSF bad ki shipai BSF pat kin aiti ha ki pulit ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki bahaing hasem bad yn wan ialam noh ia u sha ing. U bah Rijoy u la ong ba lashai ka sngi kin hap ban leit shuwa sha Tura PTS bad nangtei kin leit sha Dalu , “Ngin poi ing la shisngi eiei tharai” u la ong.
title: Mynta yn leit shim, kiba  ha ing ia u Dajied na Dalu

content: Shillong, 3 Nailar:Ki 3 shnong ki la byrngem ban tur sha Secretariat lada ka sorkar kam lah ban pynbiang bording ia hapoh ka sngi thohdieng jong kane ka taiew ba mynta. Kitei ki 3 shnong ki long ka Pepbah, ka Mawlyngngad bad ka ka Mawiong Diengpasoh. Kitei ki shnong ki mshym la ioh bording mynta la kumhba ar bnai eiei.Shisngi shuwa ban kut noh katei ka por ba ki la buh ia ka sorkar ha ka jingiakren bad u Rupang u MDC ka Sohryngkham u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la ong ba haduh mynta ym pat poi bording satia ha kitei ki shnong bad yn ap sa lasha ika sngi thohdieng-ka sngi ba la buh bad lada jai ba ka sorkar kam lah ban pynpoi bording lashai kin shong jingialang ha ka lah sngi u blei ban shim ia ki rai ia khih.
