title: Ha ka lah sngi U Blei, yn rai ia khih  ki 3 shnong bym ioh bording

content: Shillong, 3 Nailar:Uwei u rangbah u la khlad noh katba 4 ngut ki la mynsaw; katei ka la jia katba kitei ki 5 ngut ki dang trei ban tan bording thymmai ha ka shnong Laitkor-Maw-arliang.Uba la khlad noh la tip kyrteng kum u Samborlang Nongspung, 43 snem karta na ka shnong Laitlum-Smit. Kiwei pat kiba mynsaw ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Brosstar Warbah,32 snem karta na ka shnong Laitlum-Smit, u Boseng Momin-26 snem karta na Goalpara, Assam, u Sengrik Marak-21 snem karta na Goalpara bad u Sukumar Sangma-40 snem karta na Goalpara-Assam.La iathuh ba katba kitei ki 5 ngut ki dang ring bording, ki dang rah ia u nar ilektrik bad dang ia tan sainar kynsan kynsan uwei u nar ilektrik u la khyllem bad u la hap na khlieh jong u Sambor bad katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 10:30 baje eiei mynta ka step. La pynkit ia u mar-mar sha Civil Hospital, Shillong hynrei haba la poi ha hospital u la khlad noh na ka jingjur palat ka jingmynsaw. U bah Sambor la ong ba u la don 5 ngut ki khun.Kiwei pat kiba la mynsaw ka dei namar ka jingbat ilektrik bad la ong ba ka don ka jingbakla jong ki ha ka por treikam. Kitei kiba mynsaw ki don mynta hapoh Civil hospital, Shillong.Haba ia kren bad u kontraktor uba shim kontrak ia katei ka kam na ka sorkar u bah German Syiemlieh na ka shnong Nongspung uba donlang ha Civil Hospital, Shillong u la ong ba u la shim kontrak ban tan bording thymmai ha katei ka shnong ha Laitkor bad u la ai wai kylla ha u Brosstar uba don mynta ha Hospital ban pyndep ia katei ka kam bad u Brosstar u la ialam ia kitei ki nongtrei jong u baroh. U bah German u la ong ba wat la kim pat dei kiba la ioh laisen na ka sorkar, hynrei ki dei ki briew kiba la ju trei borabor ha ka kam bording, u bah Brosstar la ong ba u la don laisen. U kontraktor u la iathuh ba katei ka jingshim kontrak jong u ka dei ia ka kam kaba wan na ka Deendayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti jong ka sorkar pdeng.
title: Iap uwei, mynsaw 4, khyllem  u nar, shah bat ilektrik ha Laitkor

content: Shillong, 3 Nailar:Ka trok, kaba leit sha Shillong, mynta ka step, ka la leit ban tynrah ia ka kynroh jong ka Sunny Side, ha 4mer, Upper Shillong, ha ka por 5.40 baje mynstep. Katei ka dei ka trok khadar shaka, kaba wan na Nongstoin bad kaba la kit mar khia bad ka la leit kylla beit ha kynroh jong ka Sunny Side Theological College. U Bupul Sarkar 45, uba niah ia ka kali lem bad U John Islam 20, uba bud ki mynsaw jur bad ki don mynta ha Hospital. Uwei pat u mynsaw malu mala bad baroh kiba don ha katei ka kali, ki long 3ngut. Katei ka trok khad ar shaka, ka don ia u number K25 C8817.
title: Kylla ka trok khad ar  shaka, ha surok bah 4mer

content: Shillong, 3 Nailar:Ka seng FKJGP seng kmie hapoh ka jingialam jong u bah Marbud Dkhar, Chief Organiser ryngka bad ki dkhot jong ka seng, ki lah ia leit ban ia kynduh ia ki heh jong ka DHS kiba kynthup ia ki Director(MI) Dr. Budnah bad Dr. War ban pan jingshai bad dawa ban pyn sangeh mardor ia kawei ka briew kaba kyrteng ka Meghna Das kaba shong ba sah hapoh New Delhi, ka ba ioh ia ka bhah jong ka sorkar Jylla, ban leit pule MBBS, BDS 2017-2018. Ka seng ka lah mih shakhmat namar kane ka mat ka long kaba ktah ia ka jaitbynriew bad ha ka por kaba biang ban kynduh ia ki bor DHS ban dawa ban weng ia kane ka bar jylla shwa ba ka DHS department kan phah ia ki kyrteng jong kiba shah jied sha ka sorkar ban ban leit pule MBBS, BDS.Ka seng ka buh jingkylli ba ha kano ka nongrim ba kane ka Meghna Das na New Delhi ka ioh ia ka bhah na Meghalaya.Ka seng ruh ka dap da ka jingkyndit kaba khraw ban lap ba kane ka Meghna Das ka lah ai ia ka jaka sah jong ka na Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, Road Meghalaya house staff quater no. 9 New Delhi, East Khasi Hills.U bah Marbud Dkhar u lah ong ba shwa ba ka sorkar lyngba ka DHS department kan ai jingmynjur sha kine ki khynnah ban leit pule, ki dei ban dei ki trai shnong bad kiba don ka jaka sah ba pura ha ka Jylla.Ka seng ka tip bad dap da ka jinglyngoh ba kane ka Meghna Das ka lah ioh ia ka sertiphiket na u P. Sangpath Kumar, Resident Commisioner (IAS)ban ioh ia kane ka bhah. Ka seng ruh ka tip ba u Ganesh Das, kpa jong ka Meghna Das u ba trei ha Meghalaya house Delhi u lah shong naduh ka 31tarik Nohprah 2016 hynrei kumno pat une u briew u dang ioh ban sah ban shong haduh mynta. Ka seng ka kyntu ia ka DHS bad khamtam ia ka DC ophis, ba kam dei ban ai ia ka PRC sha ka Meghna Das namar kam don hok bad ka dei tang ka briew kaba shong ba sah sha New Delhi.
title: Bitar ka FKGJP, ba ioh pule  doktor bniat ka nong Delhi

content: Jowai, 3 Nailar:Uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Thianghun Biam, uba dei na ka shnong Mihmyntdu ha West Jaintia Hills u la thmu ban pyniap ia ka lok la jong da kaba mait da ka wait bnoh na ryngdang syndon.Donbok ba ka jrong u shniuh ka la mynsaw jur bad la pynkit ia ka sha NEIGRIMS ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba paka namar ba la shimtom jur palat.Kane ka la jia mynta dang step phyrngap ha ka por kumba 3 baje eiei ha kaba utei u tnga jong ka, u la sei da ka wait ban pom na ryndang ia katei ka longkmie.Hadien ba utei u runar u la leh ia kane ka kam, u la set ia lade sbak hapoh katei ka iing hi bad bat sah ia ka wait bad ia u mawshut wait.Katba u dang shut pynneh har har ia katei ka wait, u la kren kop artad ia ki paidbah ka shnong kiba la lumlang khrui sawdong katei ka iing ba lada don ‘Mano mano ba nud ban rung maki ruh kin shah mait haduh ban da dkut u ryngdang’Ym don mano mano ba nud ban pynpait jingkhang ban rung bad ban bat ia utei u briew wat ki VDP Shnong.Hadien ba la pyntip dier por sha ki pulit, ka kynhun ki pulit ki la wan sha katei ka shnong ki la pynpait ia ka jingkhang ban kem ia utei u runar da kaba kurup ruh ia katei ka wait.Haba pyrshang ban wat bniah shaphang utei u briew, ki don kiba iathuh ba u la ju dawai teng na Sanker,hynrei haduh katno kane kadei kaba shisha ym pat lah satia ban pynshisha wat da ki pulit ruh.
title: Da ka wait bnoh mait u lok ia ka lok

content: Shillong, 4 Nailar:Ka jingïakynduh kaba ar sngi jong ki nongthoh na ki Jylla bapher bapher ka thaiñ Mihngi ka Ri India kaba la sdang ha ka 3 tarik u ‘Nailar, 2017 bad kaba la pynlong da ka Sahitya Akademi ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ka IQAC, ka St. Edmund’s College ka la kut noh ha ka 4 tarik u ‘Nailar, 2017.Ïa kane ka jingïakynduh ki nongthoh la plie da u Dr. Ananya S. Guha uwei na ki nongthoh uba paw jong kane ka thaiñ. Ha ka jingkren jong u, u la ïaroh ïa ka jinglah ka Akademi ban wanrah lang ki nongthoh ba kin ïapeit bad ïohsngew ïa ki jingthoh jong ki para nongthoh na ka thaiñ Mihngi ka Ri India.U shim ba kane ka jingïakynduh kan plie lad plie lynti ban nang pynroi. U Dr. Kailash C. Baral haba kren kum u symbud kongsan u la ong ba ha shwa ban wan ka Sahitya Akademi ki nongthoh ki la don ha Ri India bad ïa ki jingthoh jong ki la pule; kaei kaba ka Sahitya Akademi ka la leh ka long ban lum lang ïa ki nongthoh bad da kata ban nang pynroi lyngba ka jingpynkylla na kawei ka ktien sha kawei pat.U Dr. Ramkumar Mukhopadhyay ha ka jingkren jong u, u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen namar ba ki ‘riewlum ki dei kiba ‘riewspah ha ki jingïathuh khana tynrai bad u pynpaw ba kum u nongthoh u la shim ïa ki bad u la pynrung ïa ki ha ki jingthoh jong u ha ka ktien Bengali.U Dr. Sylvanus Lamare haka jingkren jong u, u la pynpaw ba ka Sahitya Akademi ka la wan ha St. Edmund’s College bad ha Shillong ban rakhe bad pyndonburom ïa ki literature bapher. U ong, ka dei kabu ksiar ba ki nongthoh ha Shillong bad ki samla kin shim ban ïoh ïakynduh bad ki nongthoh kiba paw ha ki ktien kiba pher.U Goutam Paul, ha ka jingkren jong u, u la pynpaw ka jingkmen ba ka Shillong ka dei ka jaka kaba bun ki nongthoh kiba pawnam ki la wan ïuh kjat ha ki por kiba la leit bad u ngeit skhem ba kane kan dang ïai bteng.U Prof. Monotosh Chakravarty, ha ka jingkren jong u, u khot ïa ki samla ban wan bad thoh, ban sei la ki sap ki phong.Ka jingpoi ki nongthoh ha Kolej bad ha Shillong ka dei ka kabu kaba ki dei ban pyndonkam da kaba ïakynduh ïa ki.Ki nongthoh kiba la ïapoi ki dei na Assam, West Bengal, Sikkim, Darjeeling, Jharkhand, Darbhanga ha Bihar, Bodoland, Odia, Manipur bad Shillong.Ki nongthoh ki la pule ïa ki jingthoh jong ki ha ka dur ka poitri, ki khana lyngkot, ki jingrwai, ka histori bad ki jingbishar bniah. Ka la long ka jingïakynduh kaba ishongkun bad kaba ai jingmyntoi.
title: Pynhap pyrda ia ka jingïakynduh  ki nongthoh ha Shillong

content: Shillong, 03 Nailar:Ar ngut ki myntri sorkar kata u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ki la shah pynhiar shuki noh ha u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma mynta ka sngi. Ha jaka jongki, yn pynrung thymmai da u Bah Coming One Ymbon bad u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh.Kane ka jingleh jong u Mukul, ka la pynkyndit thret ia ki paidbah ha ka jingkylla ka sain pyrthei ha kane ka jylla khamtam ia ka seng Congress.Ia kine ar ngut ki myntri thymmai yn pynbam smai lashai ka sngi por 10:30 mynstep ha iing u Lat ka jylla.U Dr Celestine Lyngdoh bad u Bah Coming One Ymbon, ki la bat kum ki parliamentary secretaries ha kane ka sorkar MUA-II.Haba iakren bad ki nongialam ka Congress,ki la pynthikna ia kane ka jingshah pynhap shuki jong kine ar ngut. Wat la um iathuh ia ki daw, hynrei la sngewthuh ba ka jingshah pynhap shuki jongki, ka long hadien ba ki lah ban don ka jingthmu ban phet noh ha shwa ka elekshon.U Bah Prestone u dei u myntri ka tnad PHE katba u Bah Sniawbhalang u bat kum u myntri ka tnad bording nalor kiwei par. Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum, ka daw ka jingshah weng noh jongki na ka shuki myntri sorkar, ka long hadien ba la mih ka khubor ba u Bah Prestone lem bad u Bah Sniawbhalang, ki don ka jingthmu ban leit iasoh noh bad ka National People’s Party (NPP). La kam ruh ba kine ar ngut ki dei ki nongkynshoit ia kiwei ki MLA ka party ban iamih noh shwa ka elekshon hadien ba ki shem jingeh ban pynkhyllem ia u Mukul SangmaU Bah Tynsong u dei uwei na ki MLA ba ju pynkhih shuki bha ha kaba u la shah weng teng kum u myntri kham mynshwa hynrei la pynrung biang hadien ba u la leit pyndem ha u Dr Mukul katba u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u dei uba la shah ujor ha ka Jowai Block Congress Committee, halor ka jingialeh pyrshah jongu ia u Dr. Roytre Christopher Laloo da kaba u la pyrshang ban buh kyrtong da u kynum train na Jowai.Hynnin ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ki paidbah kin sa tip mano ba phet bad mano ba rung bad mynta ka la pyni shai ba iano u pynmih bad iano u pynrungKane ka jingshah pynhap shuki kine ar ngut ki nongialam ka Congress ka long hadien ba u Bah DD Lapang bad u Dr Mukul Sangma ki la wan iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka AICC kynthup ia u Rahul Gandhi ha kane ka sngi ba la dep, kiba la ai bor ia ki ban shim ia kane ka rai.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ba ha ka 26tarik Nailar 2016, U Mukul Sangma, ula pynhap shuki ia u bah Rowell Lyngdoh (MLA ka Mawkyrwat) na ka kam symbud myntri rangbah bad u bah A.L Hek (MLA ka Pynthor) na ka kam myntri ka kot ka khiah bad ha ka jaka jong ki la wan mih bujli u Martin M Dango MLA ka Ranikor bad u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh MLA ka Mylliem konstitwensi.
title: Pynhiar shuki U Mukul, ia U Bah  Prestone, U Bah Sniawbhalang

content: Shillong, 04 Nailar:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma mynta ka sngi u la kam ba ki kam pyntriem ha ka jylla ki la hiar bha ha kine ki sngi namar ka jingtrei shitom jong ki bor pulit. Haba kren hadien ba la wai ka jingialang pynsmai myntri mynta ka sngi, u Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ki kynhun kieng atiar ha ka jylla ki la sngewthuh ia ka bym lerkam ki kam leh jubor pyrshah ia ka ain bad ki la sdang ban wan shakhmat ban shim kabu ia ki lad ki kabu ba ka sorkar ka la ai ia ki.Katkum ka jingong u Myntri Rangbah ka jingpyniap, ka jingpyntieng ia ki briew bad kiwei ki kam runar kim lah ban shan bad kim lah ruh ban pynurlong ia ka jingthmu jong ki da kaba ialeh pyrshah ia ka ri.Kumba ka long mynta ka jylla ka la sakhi ia ka jinghiar ki kam pyntriem ha kine ki snem wat ha ka thaiñ Garo Hills ruh.U la ong ba nalor ki skhim ba ai ka sorkar pdeng ia ki dkhot seng lehnoh ba wan pyndem, ki don ruh ki skhim ba la bei ka sorkar jylla.Ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri ka la pynbeit pali ruh ia ki myntri sorkar ban leit pynher lama lai rong ka ri India ha ka sngi laitluid ka 15 tarik Nailar ha ki jaka bapher bapher ka jylla.Ha nongbah Shillong, yn pynher lama da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma katba ha kiwei yn leit pynher lama da i myntri.
title: Ki kam pyntriem ki la hiar  ha ka jylla, ong u MR

content: Shillong, 4 Nailar:U Ma Marki Mulieh MDC, ula ujor sha U Lat ka Jylla, halor ka jingthung kam beain jong ka Executive Committee jong U Ma Thombor Shiwat ha Jaintia District Council, ha kaba 79ngut ki nongtrei, ki la ioh kam kum ki Junior Engineer Grade-I , Grade-III bad Grade-IV khlem da pynbna paidbah ha ki kotkhubor.U Ma Mulieh, ula ia kynduh ia U Lat ha ka 3tarik Nailar 2017 bad ula iathuh halor katei ka jingjia, ha Jaintia District Council bad U Lat ula pyntip, ba un sa leh ia kaba donkam bad ba U Lat ruh, u sngew ba ka dei ka jingjia kaba sniewbok shibun bad ba un sa tian bishar, ia kito kiba leh buhrieh ia katei ka jingthungkam ha katei ka Council.U Ma Mulieh, u pyni ruh ba ka jingthung ia ki Dalloi/Sirdar bad ki Waheh Shnong, ka long kaba beain, ha kaba ki don na kitei kiba la shah weng bad ba la thung da kiwei pat, kat kum ka jingsngew bit jong ka JHADC.
title: Yn tian bishar U Lat ba thung kam  beain ha JHADC, ong U MDC

content: Shillong, 4 Nailar:Ha ka step 31 tarik u naitung ki paidbah ka shnong Umdihar ki la ioh kem ia u bah David Lyngdoh Marshillong uba la ju tip kum u bah Jyllud bad ki la aiti noh sha ki pulit hynrei ha katei ka sngi hi u bah Jyllud u la lait phet na kti ki pulit ha ka por ba ki dang mut ban phah leit eksamin ia u shapoh Civil Hospital, Nongpoh.Tang mar ia lait phet na kti ki pulit Ri-Bhoi u bah Jyllud bak u la poi sha Shillong ban prong ing briew ha kaba ia kane la ioh jingtip lyngba ka jingujor jong u bah Rajesh Diengdoh sha ki pulit uba la ujor ba ha ka 31 tarik u naitung ha ka por 12:30 pm u bah Jyllud u la prong tuh ha ing jong u ha Law U Sib, Lumbatngen-Shillong bad u la pyrshang ban leh kam sniew.U Banskhem Kharbihkhiew u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 5:45 baje mynstep u bah Jyllud u la prong tuh ha ing jong u ha Madanrting, Shillong bad u la roing tuh ia kawei ka mobile phone bad ka pla pisa (Wallet) kaba don ia ka ID treikam bad ka pisa T.700 tyngka.
title: Mar ia lait phet na Umdihar,  leit prong ing briew u bah Jyllud

content: Jowai, 4 Nailar:Hynnin ka sngi, u pulit ka 3rd Battalion uba la phet rieh hadien ba u la siat iap ia u para pulit ba iatreilang, u la wan ban pyndem noh ia lade ha khmat ki pulit jong ka North Garo Hills.Utei u pulit u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Lusen Marak uba la siat Iap ia u Havildar Litsing Inghi uba na Ribhoi haduh 6 kuli bad u la siat pathar ruh haduh 24 kuli.Hadien ba u la wan pyndem ialade, ki pulit na Jowai ki la leit ban shimti ia u bad la wanrah ia u hynnin ka meit sha Jowai na ka bynta ban tohkit.Ha ka jingtohkit u la phla ba u la bret ia ka suloi SLR shapoh khlaw bad u la ialam lynti ia ki pulit ban leit wad ia katei ka suloi. Ka la shimpor slem bha ban lap ia katei ka suloi namar utei u pulit um kynmaw bha ia ka jaka ba la bret ia ka.Hadien ka jingwad shitom la lap ia katei ka suloi kaba dang don satang 10 kuli namar 30 kuli la dep siat ha katei ka meit ba la jia katei ka jingjia.Ki pulit ki la kem ia u bad ki dang tohkit bniah ia u mynta.
title: Hadien 4sngi, wan aiti u pulit  langrut ba siat ia u Havilder

content: Shillong, 4 Nailar:U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma ha ka sngi palei jong ka taiew ban wan un leit ban plie ia ka Ranikor Administrative Unit ha Ranikor kaba hap hapoh jong ka South West KHasi Hills District.Ha dien ba ka sorkar ka la kyntiew kyrdan ia ka Mawshynrut Administrative Unit sha ka Civil Sub Division na ka liang jong u Martin M Danggo u ba dei u myntri ba dei peit ia ka PWD u ba dei ruh u MLA jong kane ka thain u la dawa na u myntri rangbah ba dei ban kyntiew noh ia ka Ranikor sha ka Administrative Unit.Da kane ka jing kyntiew ia ka Ranikor C&RD Block sha ka Administrative Unit kan iarap shibun ia ki paidbah ha kiba bun ki liang ha ka jingiadei bad ki kam ki jam kiba ia dei bad ka sorkar. Ha kaba bun ki kam ki paidbah ha ka jaka ba kin leit sha Mawkyrwat ki lah ban pyndep tang hapoh Ranikor.Katba ia ka Nonghyllam Police station yn leit ban plie da u myntri kam poh iing ka jylla u Bah HDR Lyngdoh ka sngi thohdieng jong kane ka taiew ban wan. Da ka jingplie ia kane ka police station kan ai ka jingshngian ia ki paidbah katei ka thian kaba la shah ktah ha ki kam sniew kiba lai phet jaid.
title: Sngi palei, ka Ranikor Administrative Unit

content: Jowai, 4 Nailar:Hadien ba ki seng kali kamai Jowai- Ladrymbai Alto Tourist Association bad ka Jowai-Mowkaiaw Tourist Association kim shym la lah ban ai pisa ia ki pulit ka Jowai Traffic Cell, ki la shah beh noh na ka jaka, kaba ki ju ieng ban thep briew man ka por.Kumba long mynta ha katei ka jaka, ki pulit ka JTP ki la buh ne pynieng syndon da ka jaka bym bit pynieng kali.Halor kane, ki nongniah bad ki Nongialam jong ka Jowai Ladrymbai Alto Toursit Association bad ka Mowkaiaw Toursit Taxi Association haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ki la iathuh ba na ka por sha ka por, ki pulit ka Jowai Traffic Cell hapoh ka jingialang u In charge u ma DH Pde u la pan donation na ki.Ngi la ju ai man ka por hynrei ha kine ki sngi ba la dep ki la dawa 1000 tyngka na kawei kawei ka Association bad namar ba kim lah ban siew ki la khangnoh ban ieng ki kali kamai ha katei ka jaka.Katei ka jaka ieng ki kali ka dei ha Iew Thymmai Ladthadlaboh bad naduh ki por mynshwa da ka jingia sngewthuh jingmut bad ki pulit, la shah ban ieng tang 6 tylli ki kali ha ka por ba ki ienglain ban thep passenger- 3 tylli kiban leit sha Ladrymbai bad 3 tylli pat kiba leit sha Mowkaiaw hynrei mynta pat tang namar ka jingdawa 1000 tyngka na kawei kawei ka seng ki kali kamai ha ka dur ka donation ki la shah pyndik ha ki pulit ka JTP.Ka JTP ka la pynlong ia ka jingpynkhuid iew, ka jingthung dieng kaba na ka por sha ka por bad ban pyllut ha kane ka program ki la leit dawa pisa ha ka dur ka Donation na kylleng.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, na ka liang kitei ki nongniah bad ki nongialam ki kali kamai, ki la kyntu jur ia ki bor ba halor ban peit lem ia kane ka jingeh jong ki.
title: Bym ai pisa pulit, shah beh  ki kali kamai na Iawthymme

content: Shilllong, 04 Nailar:Mynta ka sngi, u MLA ka Umsning u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh bad u Bah Comingone Ymbon na Raliang ki la bam smai kum ki myntri sorkar ha jaka jong u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar kiba la shah pynhap shuki noh na ka kynhun myntri ba ialam da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr. Mukul Sangma.Ia kine ki MLA la pynbam smai da u Lat ka jylla u Banwarilal Purohit ha ka Raj Bhavan ba la don lang u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul, u president ka MPCC u Bah DD Lapang, u Lamphang u AT Mondal,ki myntri sorkar, ki heh sorkar bad kiwei.Kine ar ngut ki la shong ruh ia ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri kaba long mynta ka janmiet ha ka sien ba nyngkong hadien ba ki la shimti iaka kam myntri jong ka sorkar.Hynnin ka sngi u Myntri Rangbah u la pynhap shuki noh ia kine ar ngut hadien ba la mih ka khubor ba ki lah ban phet noh na ka party shwa ban wan ka elekshon lashem snem.Shen hadien ba ki la dep bam smai, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la pynbna ruh ia ka tnad ba kin bat. U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ia ka tnad Public Health Engineering (PHE), Border Area, bad District Council Affairs yn bat da u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh katba ia ka tnad pynroi nongkyndong, bad bording yn bat da u Bah Comgione Ymbon.Kiwei ki tnad kin sah kumjuh ia baroh ki myntri bad kam don satia kano kano ka jingpynkylla.
title: Bam smai U Dr Celestine bad U  Bah Ymbon kum ki myntri sorkar

content: Jowai, 4 Nailar:Hynnin ka sngi, u pulit ka 3rd Battalion uba la phet rieh hadien ba u la siat iap ia u para pulit ba iatreilang, u la wan ban pyndem noh ia lade ha khmat ki pulit jong ka North Garo Hills.Utei u pulit u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Lusen Marak uba la siat Iap ia u Havildar Litsing Inghi uba na Ribhoi haduh 6 kuli bad u la siat pathar ruh haduh 24 kuli.Hadien ba u la wan pyndem ialade, ki pulit na Jowai ki la leit ban shimti ia u bad la wanrah ia u hynnin ka meit sha Jowai na ka bynta ban tohkit.Ha ka jingtohkit u la phla ba u la bret ia ka suloi SLR shapoh khlaw bad u la ialam lynti ia ki pulit ban leit wad ia katei ka suloi. Ka la shimpor slem bha ban lap ia katei ka suloi namar utei u pulit um kynmaw bha ia ka jaka ba la bret ia ka.Hadien ka jingwad shitom la lap ia katei ka suloi kaba dang don satang 10 kuli namar 30 kuli la dep siat ha katei ka meit ba la jia katei ka jingjia.Ki pulit ki la kem ia u bad ki dang tohkit bniah ia u mynta.
title: Hadien 4sngi, wan aiti u pulit  langrut ba siat ia u Havilder

content: Shillong, 04 Nailar:Da kaba pynthanda ba ka jingpynhap shuki ia ki kam nym don kano kano ka jingktah ia ka lawei jong ka party, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka jingpynhap shuki ia ki, ka long ba ka party kan pyndonkam ha kiwei ki kam bad kumjuh kan pynioh por ia ki ban leit iakynduh ia ki briew jong ki konstitwensi kham bun por nalor ki kam ba ka party kan pyndonkam ia ki. U Bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ki la shah pynhap shuki ha u Dr Sangma halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki la pyrshang ban pyntlot ia ka party khamtam ba ki la thmu ruh ban leit iasoh sha kawei ka party shwa ka elekshon.“Ha ka jingshisha, ki jingthung myntri kam dei kaba thymmai ka dei kaba ju leh khnang ban pynlah ia ngi ban treikam kham bha kumba la khmih lynti u paidbah. Hynrei haba don ka jingpynhap ne pynkiew myntri ka ju don beit ka jingmutdur na ki paidbah ba ka don kaei kaei ka daw”, la ong u Dr Sangma haba kren hadien ba la kut ka jingpynbam smai mynta ka sngi ha Iing u Lat ka jylla.U la ong ba ka donkam ban ai jaka ia baroh lada ka don ka lad khnang ba pynlah ban trei ia ki kam ban shakri ia ki paidbah ha ka rukom kaba dei. “Ngi donkam ia ki paralok hapoh ka party ban ai da kiwei ki kam na ka bynta ban pynkhlain ia ka party “, u la ong.Katkum ka jingong u Myntri Rangbah, ia ki kam ba ka party kan sa bynshet ha u Bah Tynsong bad u Bah Dhar yn sa leh hadien hynrei kawei kaba donkam ka long ba ka jingweng noh ia ki na ka shuki kam mut ba ka don ka daw ha ka sain pyrthei hynrei kan pynsuk ia ki ban leit sha ki konstitwensi jongki ban pynkhlain ia ka party.U la ong ba u kwah ba kin don shuh ki myntri kiba kwah ban pynlait noh na ka shuki khnang ba kin lah ban leit iakynduh ia ki paidbah khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba ka elekshon ka la jan.Halor ka jingkylli ba kine ar ngut ki dei kum ki shiah ba thar ia u, u Myntri Rangbah u la kyntait da kaba ong ba ka dei tang ka jingmut dur jong ki paidbah. “Nga la ong ba kum kane ka jingleh ka ju don beit ka jingkren na ki paidbah hynrei ngam kwah ban kren jrong halor kata”, u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ka rai jongu ban pynhap shuki kam dei namar ba ki pyrshah party hynrei namar ba u dei ban pyndonkam ia ka jabieng kumba ju leh teng ha ka por mynshwa ruh.U la kop ia ka jingkop ka BJP, NPP bad kiwei ki party da kaba ong ba ka thong jongu, ka long ban wanrah biang ia ka jingjia kumba long ha u snem 2013 ha kaba ki la liem lut.“Kane ka dei kaba ngi la leh ha ki por mynshwa bad ngi tip ia ka kam jong ngi kumno ban leh”, u la ong bad bynrap, ‘phi iohi, kam dei kaba thymmai, phi iohi ha u snem 2013 kaei kaba jia bad phin sa peit biang ia ka por kaba la dep kumno ngi la leh bad ngin sa leh ha u 2018″.“Ki ong nga pyrshah Party, ngam sngew eiei” ong u ma SniawbhaU myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma u la pynhap shuki ia 2 ngut ki myntri sorkar -ia u bah Prestone Tynsong MLA ka Pynursla bad u bah Sniawbhalang Dhar MLA ka Nartiang. Haba ia kren bad u ma sniawbha lyngba ka phone hadien ba u la shah pynhap shuki u la ong ba um sngew eiei bad kiwei ruh ki dei ban ioh bynta lang bad ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh na bynta ki paidbah. “Ngam sngew eiei, kam lei lei ngi hap ban ia sam bynta lang” u la ong.La kylli biang na u Ma Sniaw hato la u myntri rangbah u la pyni daw eiei ne-em halor katei ka jingpynhap shuki kaba kynsan kynsan, “Ki ong ba nga pyrshah Party hynrei kam don eiei kaba kum kata” u la ong.La kylli biang hato la pyntip ne-em sha u bad la don ne-em ka jingiakren hapdeng jong u bad u myntri rangbah shuwa ban pynhap shuki ia u, “Ki shu ong ba hap ban ai bynta lang ia kiwei ruh” u la ong . La pyrshang ba nphone ia u bah Prestone Tynsong MLA
title: Kyntait U MR ba pynhap shuki,  naba leh phoi 2 ki myntri

content: Shillong, 4 Nailar:U pulit CID barim jong ka Meghalaya, U Anjan Chakraborty, ula shah kem mynta ka sngi, ha ki pulit jong ka nongbah Shillong, ha ryngkat bad ki pulit jong ka Kolkata na Khyndailad, hajan ka State Bank of India, Evening Branch, na ka daw ka jingleh thok pisa ha Kolkata.U Anjan, u donkti ha ka jingthok pisa kaba shongdor T.2.5klur, ha kaba ula thok pisa ia shibun bah ki briew ha Kolkata, da kaba kam ialade kum U Assistant Commissioner of Police.Ka jing ujor, la buh ha Ekbalpore PS ha Kolkata, ha kaba la ujor ba ha shwa ka 19tarik Naitung 2017, U Chakraborty, ula leh thok ha ka kyrteng jong ki pulit ka Kolkata bad ula pynbor ia shibun ki briew ban siew pisa ia u, ha kaba don kiba hap siew T.2.5lak, don kiba hap siew T.1lak bad kumta ter ter na shibun ki briew.Kane kam dei ka sien nyngkong ia U Anjan, hynrei kham mynshwa ha u snem 2014, la ujor ha Shillong Sadar police station, ba utei u juh u briew, u donkti, ha kaba thok pisa kaba shongdor T.19,50,000 bad sa kiwei de ki jingshah thok ha ki dor bapher bapher.Ha U Nohprah 2015, la kem ia U Chakravorty, halor ki jingdonkti pyniap briew bad ha ka 27tarik Naitung 2017, la sospon noh ia ka jing ai identity Card ia utei u pulit, uba la shongthait. La iathuh da ka khubor ba la kit noh mar mar sha Guwahati mynta ka sngi ia U Anjan bad ban ialam ia u, lashai ka sngi sha Kolkata.
title: Shah kem u pulit barim ka  CID, ba thok pisa T.2.5klur

content: Shillong, 4 Nailar:Ki samla pule ka Sohra kolej kiba don hapoh ka lama jong ka Students’ Union of Sohra Govt College (SGCSU) ki la pynpaw ka jingsngew nguh ia ka jingkitkhia jong ka myntri kaba peit ia ka tnad DHTE ka kong Roshan Warjri kaba la lah ban pynpoi nonghikai ha katei ka kolej ha ka sobjek Education kumba la dawa. Ka la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewnguh ia u MLA uba la ai bos bad kumjuh ruh u MDC ka Sohra u bah Donevan Kharwanlang uba ju don ryngkat bad ki ha ka por ba ki donkam khamtam ha ka jingiakhih ban wanrah nonghikai ha katei ka kolej.Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh khubor na u Public Secretary katei ka Union u Shanbor Shati.
title: Kmen ki samla pule ka Sohra Kolej

content: Nongstoiñ, 4 Nailar:Ban ai jingpynshai ia ki paidbah halor ka jingdon kam na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla halor shibun ki jingeh ki ba ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ka ia kynduh, ka ‘Campaign for Change’ ne ka jingialap ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla mynta ka sngi kan wan ban ai jingpynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah hapoh sor Nongstoiñ West Khasi Hills District.Katkum ka kyrwoh khubor na u bah J. Kharit Secretary Campaign for change u la ong ba katei ka CFC kadei ka lympung na baroh ki liang kynthup ia ki nongrep, ki samla, ki nongniah kali, ki nongbylla sngi bad kiwei kiwei bad ha katei ka jingialang yn iatai bad ia phylliew jingmut halor ki jingeh kiba ia kynduh bad ia katei ka jingialang yn pynlong ha Iew Nongstoiñ naduh ka por 11:00 baje mynstep.Kumta na ka liang jong u bah Kharit u la wer bad khot sngewbha ia baroh ki paitbah jong ka thain Nongstoiñ sha katei ka jingialang paitbah bad ha katei ka jingialang na ka liang jong ka kynhun kan pynshai ia ki jingdon kam ban wanrah kajingkylla halor shubun ki jingeh ki ba ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ki ia kynduh ha kine ki sngi.Shuh shuh katei ka kyrwoh ka ong ruh ba ha katei ka sngi yn ioh sngew ia ki jingkren bad ki jingpynshai, kiba kynthup ia u bah P.N.Syiem MLA/MDC bad ki wei ki wei.
title: Mynta ka sngi ka Sur Jingkylla ha Nongstoin

content: Shillong, 4 Nailar:Ki shipai BSF, ki la ioh kurup 29 tyli ki masi na Tuka, kaba shongdor T.5.5lak bad ha kawei pat ka jingjia, la ioh kurup 24 tylli ki masi kiba shongdor T.4.9lak na Nayabazar, ong ka khubor ba la pyllait da ki shipai iada khappud.
title: Kem masi ki BSF 53 tylli

content: Shillong, 6 Nailar:Ka surok na Lum Shyllong, kaba iaid sha Pomlakrai bad mih ha Kseh Bilat bad pyniasoh ia ka surok bah Shillong Jowai, ka dei ka surok, kaba pynsuk shibun ia ka leit ka wan jong ki kali, kiba mut ban iaid lait ia ka dheng kali sha Shillong bad kiba mut ban leit sha Jowai, lane kiba mut ruh ban leit sha ki thain Madanryting, Nongthym-mai bad ban mih sha Umpling bad leit sha hospital NEIGHRIMS bad ki bynta jong ka thain Mawdiangdiang.Ka jingjngai ban iaid na Lum Shyllong sha Kseh Bilat, ka long tang 20 minit eiei bad lada iaid na lad 5mer ban poi sha Kseh Bilat ruh, kan long hi tang kumba shiteng kyntai eiei; hynrei ha kine ki sngi, ka leit ka wan, ka la pynthut jubor , namar ka surok naduh na Lad Lum Shyllong, na ktem ki shipai suin, ka long kaba sniew haduh katta katta bad kumjuh sha ki bynta jong ka Shnong Liewlong, Pomlakrai bad lynter haduh ban da mih ha Kseh Bilat, ka surok, ka dap da ki thliew kiba jylliew bha bad kiba khohruh khohram shibun bad kiba buh jingma ia ki kali rit kiba iaid, khamtam ha ka por mynmiet.Ki nongshong shnong ha Rngi Shyllong, haba iakren bad U Rupang, ki iathuh ba ki don ki nong pyndap khyndew malu mala ban tap ia ki thliew kiba jylliew ha surok, hynrei ha kine ki sngi, namar ba ka jur ka jinghap slap bad lang um, kumta kim lah satia ban maramot thikna, namar ba katei ka dei ruh ka surok, kaba bun bha ki kali, kiba iaid naduh ki trok bad ki kali rit, kiba iaid da ki spah tylli ha ka shisngi shisngi.Katei ka thain naduh na Rngi Shyllong ter ter haduh ha surok bah Jowai, Shillong, ka dei ka thain, kaba bun bha ki shnong bad ki dei ruh ki shnong kiba im ha ka rep bad ki pynmih da ki hajar kwintal, naduh u phan, u kubi, u muli bad kiwei ki mar rep, hynrei da ka jingsniew ka leit ka wan, ka pynthut shibun ia ki nongrep, ba kin leit ban kit ia ki mar jongki sha Iewduh man la ka sngi bad kumta ki hap ban shaniah ha ki mahajon, kiba don ki trok heh bad ki trok rit ban thied duna dor ia ki mar bad kiba leit khaii kylla sha Iewduh lane sha Assam ruh.
title: Sangsot ki kali, ba sniew ka surok  na Lum Shyllong sha Kseh Bilat

content: Shillong,4 Nailar:Mynta ka step ha ka por 4:40 baje mynstep u we u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Willson Hynniewta , 35 snem karta na Laitryngew u la khlad ha Civil Hospital, Shillong bad la ong ba u la khlad lypa shuwa ban poi sha Hospital hynrei ka khubor pulit ka la ong ba la suba sniew ba ka don ka jingleh buit tuh u MO uba shimti ia katei ka kes. La pyndep ia ki jingdonkam baroh bad ki pulit ki dang tohkit ia katei ka kam.
title: Suba ia u doktor, ba khlad u rangbah

content: Nongpoh, 06 Nailar:Ka KSU North Khasi Hill District, lyngba u samla Vincent Makri, Vice-President, ka la pynrem jur halor ka jingkuman bad jingieh khun swet ka sorkar ia ka Shnong Madan Umwang bad kiwei pat ki shnong ba don ha thain khappud bad ka Assam, ha kaba kane ka jingiehbein ka sorkar ia kitei ki shnong ha ki thain Khappud, ka pynlong ia ka kynhun lehnoh KPLT bad Pulit Assam ban shim kabu ha ka ban pyndik bad pynthut ia ka shongsuk shong shngain ha kitei ki thain Khappud bad ka Assam.Ha katei ka kyrwoh, ka KSU ka la pynkynmaw ba dang myn ha ka sngi Palei ki Pulit ka Assam na West Karbi Anglong District, ki la hiar sha shnong Madan Umwang ban pynsangeh jubor ia ka jingtei kaba la mang tyngka da ka tnat Sericulture ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ha katei ka jingwan ban pynsangeh jubor ia katei ka jingtei, ki la byrngem ruh ban kem bad ban pynshitom ia u Bah Blikshon Mukhim uba long u Rangbah shnong ka madan Umwang.Shuh shuh, ka seng ka la kynnoh ruh ba kum kitei ki jingjia, ki iai jia na ka por sha ka por ha katei ka shnong Madan Umwang, ha ki thain Amjong lem bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong kiba don ha ki thain border bad kiba hap ha ka Mawhati Constituency, ha kaba kine baroh ki jia tang namar ka jingkhein sting ka sorkar jylla bad ka jingbym lerkam ki Bor pyniaid Distrik ka Ri Bhoi.Ka seng ka buh jingkylli bad pan jingpynshai na u Deputy Commissioner bad u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi District, namar ka jingtreikam jong ki ka long beit thik tang na ka bynta ban thwet ban kem bad pynshitom ia ki dkhot ka KSU, ha kaba kane ka jingthwet ka la pynthut pyndik wat ia ki ba haing ha sem ki dkhot bad nalor kata ki rah ruh wat ia ki kali shi met jong ki dkhot ka seng bad ia ka Ambulance jong ka seng ruh, kumta haba iadei bad kane ka seng ka la ong ruh ba u DC bad SP, ki la dei ban sngewthuh ialade ba ki dei tang ki shakri jong u Paidbah ha ka Distrik.Hato ka Sorkar jylla bad ki bor pyniaid district ki la phah pyrton Pulit bad CRPF na ka bynta ban thwet bad ban kthong ia ki dkhot KSU, la kum ba thwet ia ki Lehnoh ba shyrkhei tam hapoh pyrthei bad haba kum katei ka jingjia kaba la jia ha shnong Madan Umwang, balei ka sorkar bad ki bor Distrik kim lah ban phah ia ki pyrton Pulit, na ka bynta ban thwet bad kem ia ki Lehnoh KPLT kiba ju pyndik bad dawa pisa jubor bad ban ai jingiada ruh na ka jingshah thombor ha ki Pulit ka Assam, la buh jingkylli ka KSU.Kane ka pawshai ba ka rukom treikam u DC bad SP ka Ri Bhoi ka long kaba shah shiliang khmat bad ka rukom treikam bymkhuid bad lehse lah ban don bun kiei kiei na sha lyndet, kumta haba iadei bad kane ka seng ka maham ruh ia u SP bad u DC ba ki dei ban pyndep hok ia ka kam kaba la bynshet ha ki, ym ban tuklar ia ki kam jong ka seng bad kane ka dei ka khubor kaba shai tam na ka liang ka seng ia u DC bad ia u SP, pynkut ka kyrwoh u Samla Vincent Makri.
title: Pynrem ka KSU, na ka jingjia ha Madan Umwang, maham ia u DC bad SP

content: Shillong, 6 Nailar:Ka KSU South West Khasi Hills ka la pynpaw ba ka kyrshan ia ka Garo Hills State Movement Committee ba kin ioh la ka jong ka Garo Land, hynrei ka la ong pat ba ki dei ban dawa ia ki bynta ki jong ki hi ym ban mushlia wat shi inshi ruh ia ka khyndew kaba hap hapoh Khasi Hills.Katei ka seng ka la ong ba kam don hok ban tuklar ia ka jingdawa Garo Land jong ki Garo hynrei ka la ong ba ki Garo kim don hok ruh ban pyniar ia ki thapniang shabar jong u pud jong ki. Katei kakyrwoh khubor na ka KSU SWKH ka dei halor ka jingpaw kyrteng jong kiba bun ki shnong Khasi khamtam ha katei ka District ha ka Map Garo Land ba ka ANVC ka la tyrwa sha ka sorkar pdeng ha u snem 2006 ha ka por ba long myntri rangbah duh u Dr.Manmohonan Singh.Ka KSU ka la ong ba katei ka kynhun jong ki Garo ka GHSMC dang shen ka la leit ban ia kynduh ia u myntri rangbah duh ka Ri u Narendra Modi, u myntri ka tnad pohing u Rajnath Singh bad ia u President ka ri u Ram Nath Kovind ban ia kren ia katei ka kam, “Ho,oid na ka liang jong ngi ngim pyrshah ia phi hynrei tang kawei ngi ong ia phi ba phi la bakla lada phin nud ban wan tam pud sha ki bynta ka South West Khasi Hills District, sha kiwei ki District ka Khasi Hills bad lada phi bud ia ka Proposed Garoland jong u snem 2006 ka ANVC” ong ka kyrwoh na u President ka KSU SWKH u samla Forwardman Nongrem.Ka kyrwoh khubor ka la ong ba kat kum ka Proposed Garo Map jong ka ANVC ka SWKH kan duh shibun ki jaka ba kynthup naduh ka Pommudar, Maheshkhola, Khonjoy, Nongjri, Nongkulang haduh Borsora bad ki bynta ba hajan Ka Ranikor bad haba kheinlang baroh kan ym duna ia ka 100 square kilomitar. “Ngi kyntu ia ki Garo ba kin nym lah ban ong ba tang ba la shong shnong ki Garo Ka dei ka jaka jong ki naba ia kine ki jaka kiba bun hi la longtrai hi da ki Khasi kum ki riewshimet bad Ki Hima bad Ki Garo ki dei tang ki nongshongwai” ong katei ka kyrwoh.Ka KSU ka la kyntu ia ki Garo ba ki dei ban kynjohktien lang na ki syiem ne ki Sengbhalang jong ka Khasi bad Ri-Bhoi halor katei ka bynta ban ia shai khnang ba kan ym mih kano kano ka jingiakynad hapdeng ki Khasi bad Garo , “Namar tang na kane ka ishuh na ka liang jong ngi ki Khasi da lei lei ruh ngin ym ai suk tang shi inshi ruh ka khyndew kam pher watla kan poi haduh uno uno u pud ruh” pynkut ka kyrwoh na u President ka KSU SWKH.
title: Bitar ka KSU, ba paw ki shnong  Khasi ha ka Map Garo Land

content: Shillong, 6 Nailar:Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM), Mawlai Circle ka la kular ia ki ASHA ba kan leit rah ia ka jingeh jong ki sha ka sorkar jyllas bad sorkar pdeng khnang ba ka sorkar kan leh eiei, halor ka jingeh ba ki ia kynduh. Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew ka KHNAM ka la lum jingialang ia ki ASHA ha Mawlai Basic School ban ia kren ia kiba bun ki jingeh ba ki ia kynduh bad ha katei ka jingialang ki nongialam ka KHNAM ki la pynpaw ka jingsngew kyndit ban tip ba ia ki ASHA la siew tulop tang ha ka dor T.1000 tyngka shibnai katba ka kam ba ki hap ban trei pat ka long kaba khia haduh katta katta.Kumba ka long mynta ka jylla ka don 6000 ngut ki ASHA bad kumba 300 ngut ki nongpeit ia ki kiba ki ong ki supervisors kiba trei hapoh ka National Rural Health Mission (NRHM). Ka KHNAM ka la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia naba ka tulop ba ki ioh kam pat lah ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka ing ka sem jong ki bad ka sorkar ka donkam ban pynkiew noh ia ka tulop jong ki. Ha katei ka jingialang la don u President ka Youth Wing ka KHNAM u bah Thomas Passah, u kyrtong ka KHNAM na Mawlai u bah Ban L Nongbri, ka kong Happy Pyrtuh President jong ka Union ki ASHA bad kiwei pat.
title: T.1000 shibnai ioh tulop ki  ASHA, yn ia khih ka KHNAM

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:Ki nongkhaii mawshun ha ka jylla, ki la sngew dukha mynsiem namar ba kim ioh lad shuh ban shalan mawshun ba la dep sei na par sha Bangladesh, wat hadien ba ki la ap slem ia ka jingkular ka sorkar ban pyllait.U Bah Stodar Dkhar ha ka jingkren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi u la ong ba naduh mynshem snem u Myntri Rangbah, u la ong ba hapoh shi bnai ka sorkar kan pyllait noh ia ka jingshalan mawshun ba la dep tih hynrei haduh mynta khlem lorkam satia.U Bah Stodar uba dei u president ka Meghalaya Minerals Exporter Chambers of Commerce (MMECC)u la ong ba ka seng ka dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban ai noh ia ka jingmynjur haba iadei bad ka Mining Lease ia baroh kito kiba la dep aplai. U la ong ba ha ka jingshisha dei ka sorkar hi kaba bthah ban shna ia ka plan ban sei ia kitei ki mar, hynrei wat hadien ba ki la leh ruh ka sorkar kam shym la lah satia ban ai ia ka jing mynjur, haduh kine ki sngi.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Stodar, kumba 50 lak ton u mawshun ba la dep sei na par u don mynta tang ha ki bynta jong ka East Khasi Hills khlem da khein sha Garo Hills.U la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka la bthah ban shna ia ka plan tih mawshun, katkum ka Meghalaya Minor Minerals Concession Rules 2016, hynrei hadien ba la dep pynbiang, ka sorkar kam shym la lah ban pyntreikam.U la ong ba kane ka jingpynslem ban ai ia ka jingmynjur, ka dei ka jingpynshitom bein ia ki trai par ki nongkhaii ruh kumjuh kiba iakynduh ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam ha ing ha sem.
title: Sah 50 lak ton u mawshun ha par,  bym shah shalan ka Sorkar

content: Shillong, 28 Naitung:Ka ripod na ki pulit ka la pyni ba ki la don haduh 345 tylli ki mobile jong ki riew paidbah kiba shah tuh bad kiba shah knieh ha ki runar. Katei ka dei tang ka jingjia kaba ki ai jingtip sha ki pulit bad katei ka jingjia ka jia naduh u snem 2015 haduh mynta. Kartkum ka khubor pulit la iathuh ba ha u 2015 ki la don 127 tylli ki mobile ba shah tuh, ha u 2016 ki don 158 tylli ha u 2017 haduh mynta ki don 60 tylli ki jingjia. Na kitei kiba la shah tuh ki la don 77 tylli kiba ki pulit ki ioh biang. Ki pulit ki la ong ba kitei ki runar ki pyndonkam da ki buit tuh jong ki ban ioh tuh mobile na jaka paidbah kum na iew bad kiwei ki jaka bun briew ka nongbah Shillong.Hadien ba la dep tuh la ong ba ki leit ban die tad, kumta ki pulit ki la maham ia ki paidbah ba kim dei satia ban thied ia ki mobile rim na kino kino ki briew kiba kim ithuh lane kim dei ban thied ia ki mobile ki bym biang ki kot ki sla, bad la pyntip ba kitei ki briew kiba thied ia kum kitei ki mar lada ioh kem kin ngat ha ka section U/S 411 IPC bad ka jingpynshitom kan long 3 snem ha phatok.Ki pulit ki la ong ba ki briew kiba ju ngat ha katei ka apot ki dei kiba na nongkyndong. La maham ruh ia ki dukan ba shna mobile ba kim dei ban plie ia ki pass word lane ki briew kiba wan ai ia ka mobile ha dukan kim tip ia ka pass word bad shuw ban plie ia ka pass word ki dei ban phah pyni shuwa ia ki kot ki sla ban pynshisha ba u dei u trai mobile.
title: Wat thied mobile rim na ki  bym ithuh, 3 snem ha phatok
